1b1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a wa lo ki te shwar te s+ya koSh+Na gu h+ya
1b2(rgyud): pra tI ha ta tsit+taHkra hU~M dA ya nA ma d+h+ye N+DI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras
1b3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor
1b4(rgyud): la'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
1b5(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
2a1(rgyud): ldan 'das drang srong gi re la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs mang
2a2(rgyud): dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
2a3(rgyud): phyug stan las langs te/ gos chags btsos nas pus mos la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nus bcom ldan
2a4(rgyud): 'das lnga 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das pa dag la pad+ma du ma chen po'i tsan dan gyi skye
2a5(rgyud): zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen mo smon cing bgyi ba thams cad mngon par 'a grub par bgyi ba mchis te/ gal te de bzhin
2a6(rgyud): shegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos bdag gis bshad par gnang na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs
2b1(rgyud): mthus sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par 'tshal lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'din gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas
2b2(rgyud): ying bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po dang / yid bzhed kyikye sngon sheng bzhin du smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa
2b3(rgyud): sbyar ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ khyod kyis snying brtse ba'i phyir sems can gyi ched du 'di ltar zhugs pas na khyod thogs pa med pa'i
2b4(rgyud): gzungs 'di 'ashad par gnang bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sman ras gzigs dbang phyug de ltar bkal gnang ba dang / langs nam thal lo sbyar te phyag byas nas slar stan la 'du
2b5(rgyud): se bal rtse gcig tu 'khor 'dus pa dag la rnam par bltas nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sngags 'di smras so// na mo tra tra lA ya~M/ namam smar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA mA pA r+b+ha
2b6(rgyud): sad+g+ha sa/ ma hA satwA pa/ ma hA kA ru Na kA ya/ nAHthA/ aM tsakra ba ti tsanA ma NaM/ ma hA ba dum/ rdar tiSh+Tha ta/ badz+ra thA ra A kar me hUM swA hA/ 'di ni lus kyi sngags lags so// oM ba dz+ra/ 
2b7(rgyud): tsan+da Ne/ ma d+da badra b+har hU~M/ 'di ni snying pa'i sngags lags so// ma~M b+ha ra ta'i dum hUM/ 'di ni gling gi snying po'i bsngags lags so// de'i tshe byang chub sems pa
3a1(rgyud): spyan ma gshegs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin 'kho pa'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / sarjen po yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yas par gyur/ lha dang / klu dang
3a2(rgyud): 'od sbyin dang / dri za dang / l+h+wam yin dang / na ril kha' lding dang / mi'am ci la/ lco chen po la sogs pa'i khab kyis nam med pa tug thos par gyur bdud kyi rgyal po
3a3(rgyud): la bar rnams kyang shin tu skrag cing 'jigs pa chen pa skyes par gyur/ bdud kyi rgyal po'i gnal med khang yang rab tu 'bang bar gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pa
3a4(rgyud): gzhan rnam pa sna chags kyang dang po ning skrag pas gdong bkab ste/ sa la 'gyel bar gyur/ sems can dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad kyang phye nas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams thar
3a5(rgyud): 'i bde ba mchog myong bar gyur to// de'itsha lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chur mngon bar bab par gyur/ lha'i rol mo rnam
3a6(rgyud): nga bar snang la sgra sna tshogs byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par gyur to// de nas bcwobo ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyisna tshigs su bcad de// bya
3a7(rgyud): bas dpa' sems dpa' chen po srin ras gzegs lung phyug la/ rigs kyi za/ khyod sems can pa snying brtse ba'i phrer gzungs 'di bshad pa nyid kyis sems cad rnams kyis
3a8(rgyud): chen po thob par 'gyur ba lags mo legs so zhes pa sngags pa brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' spyad ngam gzeg sa dbang phyug la 'di skad ces
3b1(rgyud): snul to// rigs kyi sems can rnabs kyi phya rdza 'phrul gyi rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di chog rkad cig de na bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs da'ang ga
3b2(rgyud): ge sa 'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu ma/ rigs kyi bu mo'im dge slong dam dge slong ma 'am/ dag bsnyen nam/ dge 'asnyen ma 'am/ khye ma/ bu ma gzhon nu gang sngal ma
3b3(rgyud): tshe 'di nyed la rnam par smin pa mngon du spong bar 'dubar/ gdugs mtshan sems kyi gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus kyis gzungs 'di'i bskyed par bgyis te/ gdugs dring dus me 'dam par
3b4(rgyud): cang yang rung / mi gtsang yang rung ste/ ga bar ston du bzlas par gyur na bkye ba rnams ngan dang ldan par 'gyur ljags so// ci yang rung ste/ don du bgyi zhing gnyer ba zhig mches na la
3b5(rgyud): brgyan 'argyang bzlas brjod pa kyis don brgya stong dum 'grub par 'gyur bas rigs sngags gnyen gang yang bzhin gyi gzar lo'i gzung la 'di dang bskrin par bzod pa gang yang ma mchis lags
3b6(rgyud): so// de ci'i slad du ne na/ 'das pa dang / daltar gyi las dar ba dang / sgrib pa lci ba rnams rab tu 'joms pas so// gang la la zhig gzung 'di bsres brjod bgyis na mdar ma mchis pa
3b7(rgyud): dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs pa dag kyang thar bar 'gyur la/ mnyams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur na/ las ngan pa dang / gdon bgegs dang / 
3b8(rgyud): rad ga zhan thams cad lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ gang dag re ba dad nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin pa'i ba dang / gen mtshan du bro 'tshal ba 'am/ 
4a1(rgyud): rlung dang / rakhris pa 'am/ bad kan la sogs pas po 'tshal ba dag la rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis par gyur na thams cad 'byang zhing sos pa pa gyur lags so// gang
4a2(rgyud): gdub dang byad sems kyis phog par gyur tam/ ldeg pa dang / g.yan pa dab mdze nad dam pa'i mgags/ rlung nad ngam/ smyos pa'am/ klad pa bro 'tshal ba'am/ rna ba dang / sna dag/ mchu dang
4a3(rgyud): stedang / ming pa dang / kha dang / gdong dang / gtsug dang / klung rgyas dang / brang dang / rtseb logs dang / snyid dang / lto ba dang / rkeng pa dang / rtsu ba ba rba dra pa dang / lag pal sogs pa thams bro 'tshal ba
4a4(rgyud): ngan yang thams cad sos par bgyid / ji tsam du lus kyi bro nad ci mchis pa thams cad kyang sos par bkyed lags so// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bI na ya ka dang / bdud sdig can dang / 'dreg don dag
4a5(rgyud): makyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// mtshon cha dang / dmag tshogs dang / cha ba dang / zhug sa dang / rlung dang / char pa dang / ser ba ma rung ba dag gis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// dgra rab chom
4a6(rgyud): na drang / rdul po mdungs pa das suni po ma rungs pa dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// glo bur du 'tsho ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ milam ngan pa ni bar me 'gyur/ cangs pa dang / sbrul dang / sdug pa
4a7(rgyud): dab srin du gyi med dang / rkang ma dang / gcan zan gdug pa ma rungs pa dang / sang ge dang phrag dang / spyang gi dag gis kyang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// kha yul dong 'thab pa'i tshe thams cad du rgyal pa
4a8(rgyud): gyu lags so// gal te bu'i bkye bdag gis rtsod par gyur na yang 'du ba bar 'gyur te/ gzungs 'ang mar cig bzlas na kong du bstan pa de dag rnams cad ring bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gang pal
4b1(rgyud): ga kle sa gdugs re gzungs 'phel na bcu rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 'gyes na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad du/ rigs kyis bu khyod ma 'jigs shig ci zheg
4b2(rgyud): da cing ci zhig langs su gnyer bar byed/ thams cad khyo sa skyed de nas brtse bar 'gyur/ de bzhin ga shogs pa tshed ngag med kyang mu mngon du ston par 'gyur/ mdo las gsungs pa bzhin du 'jig rten/ 
4b3(rgyud): khams ba ba can gyi bkod pa'i dngos po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams bad ba can gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs
4b4(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ byang cha ba sems dpa'arnyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri bo po ta la yab mthong bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyi lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur rag rtag
4b5(rgyud): par rgyal po dang / blor po rnams kyis bkur zhing rim gro brjing par 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur bar 'gyur/ smra ba thams cad du ma'i mngal du me skye zhing pad+ma'i steng du skye bar 'gyur/ 
4b6(rgyud): bko pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgrub rnams cad du sngon sti gnas rjes su dran par 'gyur/ 'di nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du na ma yang ngan pa grornams su mi myong zhing rtag
4b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur lags te/ 'di ni sdig pa'i las thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bgyi ba lags so// sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gezungs kyi
4b8(rgyud): gdong pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug sems cad la snang bca pa'i phyir yang yid bzhir gyi 'khor lo'i snying po'i gzungs gsang pa'i cho ga bstan pa su yang rang ba
5a1(rgyud): gce sa pa'i don grub bzheg mchis na/ thams cad rang na par 'gyur lags so// de yang rnam pa gnyis te/ dIdi m+b+ha ste/ 'jig rten gyi nor dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor
5a2(rgyud): gang lags so// dal 'dzag rten pa'i nor ni gser dang / dngul la sogs pa'i rin po chen mas so// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor na bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi bkod par ma bag
5a3(rgyud): dang ldan zhing lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang / byams pa'i sems rgyas nas blo dang ldan
5a4(rgyud): rnams bde ba sdom pa dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phel zhing mthu stobs rtag pa gang lags pa'o// gsang ba'i mdzod kyi spyod yul 'di ni gzhan dag la brjod par pe bgyi'o// gang lal zhig bdag gi
5a5(rgyud): lang bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dngos grub mchog thob par 'tshal na/ sems rtse gcig tu dus thams cad dang / gnas thams cad du gtsang yang rung / mi gtsang yang rung ste/ rtag par bzlas
5a6(rgyud): brjod pa kyis na nongs pa ci yang ma mchis pas bzlas brjod bkyi ba'i grangs chang bar bgyis na nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming dang / yid bzhin gyi 'khor
5a7(rgyud): zungs ba mang dang / gang zag pa'i ming nas brjod de/ gal te rgyal po'am/ rgyal bu 'am/ btsun mo'am/ sras sam/ rgyal po'i ba mo 'am/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ dmangs rigs so// 
5a8(rgyud): gdol pa'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bung mang ngam/ khye'u'am/ bu mo gzhon nu ma ma/ mu stegs sna tshogs dag la brtan cing / mdza' bar 'tshal na de dag gi pad nas brjod de rtag par po rangs
5b1(rgyud): gal te ngos kyab mchog gtar zhing rgya mngal brtan par 'tshal na/ dpung dag bdun gyi bar du dag par sa rangs kyi tshol na stong rtsa brgyad
5b2(rgyud): bzlas na mjal bar 'gyur lags so// gal tu btsun mams na par 'tshal na lan dgu brgya bzlas par brtsi'o// 6 bul brten par tshal nalan brgyang brgya bkrus par brgya'o// pus dag
5b3(rgyud): mthong bar 'tshal na lan bdun brgyab zla bar bkye'o// rgyal po'i bu mo la brtan par 'tshal na lan drug brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// bram thul brtan par 'tshal na lan lnga 'argya bzla par bgyi'o// 
5b4(rgyud): la rigs la bden par 'tshal na lan bzhi brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// dmangs rigs la ni sum brgya'o// gdol pa la ne nyis brgya'o// dge slong dang / dge slong ma la na lan brgya'o// dge bsnyen dang / 
5b5(rgyud): ge bkar ma la ni lan dgu bcu'o// lce'u gzhon nu dang / bu mo gzhon nu ma la ni la drug cu'o// 'di ni brten cing mdza' bar bgyi ba'i chos zhes pakye ste/ nor dang / bran dang/ ha dang / bde ba'i
5b6(rgyud): thams cad 'byor par bkrung lags so// 'angal la nag kyang du sdug cir mdza' ba dag ring por mi ba dang mngal bang 'tshal na yid la bsams pa bzhin du rung bzhin du mche bar 'gyur lags so/ 
5b7(rgyud): lde'o 'tshal bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshar bar 'gyur ba den de dag 'a grub par 'gyur lags so// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sbyar ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong b.ranga'atshal na la na stong rtsa bcwa
5b8(rgyud): zlas brjed pa kyis na nga'i lus yang dag pa cing mthong mer bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par bgyid lags so// gal te la gar rdo rje mthong bar 'tshal na pa nas brjod la na khri bgyis dbus mngan/ 
6a1(rgyud): bum du bathun na/ de la ba zhing bas rdul byams pa bzhin du sems ni sngon pa rnams stol bar 'gyur lags sa// gal te sangs rgyas dgal bar 'dun pa yang mdzang bar 'ar
6a2(rgyud): bresum stong bzlas brjod bgyis na de ba nan du mthor bar 'gyur lags so// gal te gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis pang bzlas parjod ba gyis na reg sngags 'chang rnams
6a3(rgyud): mngon sum du ston cing / so so nas rang rang gi sngags kyi mthu ci mchis pa gang zag de la stsal nas yongs su bslang bar bgyid de/ zhag 'dun pa la ni stong gsum gyi spyod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham
6a4(rgyud): dbang po dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po rnams 'khor dang bcas te mchis nas de'i smon pa rnams stol bar bgyid do// bzlas brjod kyi chog gong du bstan pa bzhin du bgyis na smon pa rnams so
6a5(rgyud): rdzogs par bgyid da/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bsang ba'i mdzod las thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga zhes pabya ba lagapa so// bya
6a6(rgyud): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug she gas pa'i mdzod las thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' gyu
6a7(rgyud): zags dbang phyug gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ gang zhes mthong ba dag byabs shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i klan sbyar nas lus la thogs te bgron mchog tu mngan
6a8(rgyud): 'grub cing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i cho ga bstan pa/ 'gi'u wang dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gum dang / gzung dang / kra rtsi dang / 'dza' tib langag yi shing ga
6b1(rgyud): pa dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / gser gyi gyi ma bag rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te/ brdungs nas sbrang rtse dkar pos sbrus te/ snga ma'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas lus la bdugs
6b2(rgyud): sam/ gos la bdugs sam/ mig la bslus sam/ dpral ba la thig le bgyis sam/ lus la byugs na rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / blon po rnams dang / gra mA rnams dang / skyes pa dang
6b3(rgyud): bud med la sogs pa byams shing dga' ba dang / lam gyi chos la bkur zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lus kyi no sha dang nor rdzas dag pangs pa ma mchis par gtong zhing rim
6b4(rgyud): dgying bar 'gyur te/ brjod kyis mi yang lags so// ji ltar nyi zla thams cad kyis mthong bar mos pa bzhin du sgrub pa'i don rnams 'byor cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gang par zhig blan
6b5(rgyud): de sogs par 'gyur na kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa rnams du byung nas bgegs thams cad las thar par 'gyur lags so// rgyal po'i mthu sa nan gyis 'phrog pa dang / chab kyis deng ba dang / zhugs kyis tshig pa
6b6(rgyud): nga/ mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dug dang / 'chang ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur lags so// bsam pa thag pa nas sman a kra ta skyer ba'i cho ga 'di bgyi stan thams cad kyis
6b7(rgyud): las shing dga' bar 'gyur lags so// sman 'dis bdugs 'phalab chol du galar khar sprul par bgyi ste/ 'de ni spyan ras sa thalas dbang phyug gis banan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyu
7a1(rgyud): 'i gran gyi chos nas bkyi lags so// byang na ba sems dpa' spyan ngas gnags dang byug gi ying bzhin gyi 'khor po'i gzungs las gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman la/ 
7a2(rgyud): sbyor ba'i cho ga re le'u ste gsum pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' skyon ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gzhan yang sems can rnams la nyid bca pa'i phyir thams cad kyi yid du'o ba'i dga' 'ang
7a3(rgyud): / gyur ba'i slar khar mur pa'i cho ga bstan pa/ ga bur dang / gra rtse dang / gur gum nab mor btags te/ 'bi'u wang dang bsres na gong du bstan pa'i sngags rnam pa gsum re re yang lan tor rtsa bcad bzlas te/ 
7a4(rgyud): chab rnams sbyang nas de lu cha chung shing mgo slong gi 'bas bu tsam du sres te/ yang thul pa gang ma gsum lan bcu rtsa brgyad bzlas nas grib ma sa skams te/ gdugs dang / rlung gis ma phog par
7a5(rgyud): nanas snga ri la yang gong ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum lan bdun 'dun kyi ta te/ de lu gcag khar mur nas rgyal po'im/ blon po rba pan nam/ skye 'i tshogs mang po dgal gtam pa gyes par gyur na
7a6(rgyud): 'gyur sti bgyis nas/ nor dang / rin po che dag phangs pa ma mchis par n+ya dang rtsa 'chal pa thams cad sdol bar 'gyur/ tshig tu smras so 'tshal thams cad kyis yid chas shing nyan par 'gyur// 
7a7(rgyud): bsgo ba zhog mches na yang rnam pa cad nyan cing bgyid par 'gyur lags so// bar blan mu ba'i tshe rtag par grags 'akra tshal te// spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug gis smon pa rnamapa 'grub pa / 
7a8(rgyud): mags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du spos chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru ba'i rgya zheng klu bzhis 'khong ba gcig bkyes te/ dkyil 'khor
7b1(rgyud): nang / shang na mato/ rnam pa cwa rmugs ci byu ba bza' shing ca dar dkar ba bsregs nas sman gyi lu snga ma blangs te dkyil 'khor kye nang du banaganas/ rgyam mtshan bzhi gzugs shing / yo/ 
7b2(rgyud): dkar po bres te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du pad+ma dkar po bzhi yang bris te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzegs dbang phyug la ba tshang ba bgyis lags pa'i rjes la snying po'i sngags dang / 
7b3(rgyud): dgi snying po'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bkye'o// lus kyi sngags kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas naswa tsan dan dkar po bsregs te/ me tog gtor na de'i tshe smon pa thams cad kyang
7b4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur la// dkyil 'khor gyi nang na mchis pa'i sman blangs te/ lus la btags na phyags gang du mchi yang ru ste bciganyid pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ tshig du smras pa rnams
7b5(rgyud): cang gyi ba yang ches shing nyan par 'gyur/ don du nub pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur sngags so// sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtegab te/ 'di ni yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las sman phung ba'i cho ga
7b6(rgyud): zhes bkyi la mas so// byang chub sems dpa' sbyin ngas gzigs dbang phyug gi yi bzhin gyi 'khor molas rgan blang ba'i tshe ba'i se sa ldan pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyin ras gzigs
7b7(rgyud): dbang phyug gas gzhar yang sems can rnams pa stang brtse ba'i phyir skye ba mang ba thams cad kyis mthong na byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa/ man ni dkaku shu ba pad+mal brgan dang / 
7b8(rgyud): po dang / rgya mtsho'achab kyang bub dang / brdzun ma dag po'i rus pa dang / babral dang gakun pa na bya dang / 'ge'u mang dang / su ba dang / rgya'i bu dgus dang / pi pi langang man pa sha mi dag bca'
8a1(rgyud): rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te/ brdungs nas zhib mar batshags ta skad snga bsang cag mchis natha rtse dang / gapur sradang phyed dral nas nab tu bdang ta/ spyan ras gzugs pa
8a2(rgyud): phrag gi gzugs kyi mdun du sbyar bgyis lags pas/ snga ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum re re yang lan stod rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ sems car thams cad la byams pa dang / sring pa rtsa ba'i sems
8a3(rgyud): bskyed nas sman de dag byang chub sems dpa' sbyan pa gzegs dbang phyug gi rkang pa drung du gzhag par bgyi'o// de'i rjes la rag par bgyis nas// khang 'the thu mas blangs te migatu
8a4(rgyud): rimig dang / klung pa bri' tshal 'dang / lid tog gis bsgribs pa thams cad dang / spen dkar dang / ma cher 'dzag pa dang / sprin dmang dang long ra da dang / klang ba bro 'tshal ba thams cad
8a5(rgyud): gyur lags so// rtag par gdugs ra bzhin du sman 'di mig tu sbrul na mig rang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// gdugs gnyis sul na lus kyi bro nang thams cad 'byang bar 'a
8a6(rgyud): gdugs gsum sus na skyo ba'i bro nang rnam pa brgyad cu rtsa 'on 'byung ba gakyang 'gaso// gdugs bani sbas na phyin dwagi sgrib pa thams cad rjes sleb par mi 'gyur ro// gdugs lnga su'o na dgra dnga'am
8a7(rgyud): pan thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// gdugs drug sbal na sdig pa'i las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lte ba bzhi dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / rme la ma ngan pa dang / byad snyoms
8a8(rgyud): cad rnam pa sa jims shing / ngan la tshwarnams sun ma yang srung bar mi 'gyur lags so// gdugs bdun stsal na rgyal po dang blun po chen po dang / skye bo mang po thams car ngasas
8b1(rgyud): nga sdegargyas nas yang chas shang byams pa ga dun phrag gnyis bya ba du samun rang dbang chen pa thob par 'byung ngo // zhag bdun phrag gsum bya bar du stsam na rgyam
8b2(rgyud): sbo mo chen po dag dang mdza' bar 'gyur ro// nag bdun phrag bzhi'i bar du stsal na gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rim gro bgyed par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag lnga'i bar du stsal naH
8b3(rgyud): na dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag drug gi bar du stsal na nam mkha' ldi dang pa srin po mthu chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis mngon
8b4(rgyud): rdzogs pa d+ma 'tshang rgya 'i bar du yongs su bsrung bar brjed pas/ byad snyams dang / 'drig don rnams kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// nag bdun phrag bdun gyi bar du stsam na lhanag pa chen
8b5(rgyud): dang / 'ad srin brgyad rnams nye bar lhags nas rjes su 'brang zhing g.yog bgying bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag brgyad kyi bar du stsal na an+d+ra da nar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag dgu'i bar
8b6(rgyud): sbal na gtad byams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdud phrag bcu'i bar du An lhas yin ma kyi rtse sgo dang byen pa don ci tshim pa tham sa cad mthong bar 'bya/ bzung ni
8b7(rgyud): 'jug pa la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig gi bar du stal na sman zhug pa ltar 'bar ba ji snyed pa thams cad mngon sum du dka' bar 'gyur ba
8b8(rgyud): par 'gyur 'tshal lam/ mthu chen po dang ldan par 'tshal na de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhig bdun phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du stsal na drang srong mang po rnams kyis rin po che'i
9a1(rgyud): rnams phye/ nye bar bstan nas yid bzhin du langs spyod par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum gyi bar du stsal na/ klu'i gzhal med khang rnams sgo rang bya nas la byang/ 
9a2(rgyud): ga byangs mchis par 'thung du zhag bdun phrag brgya ba 'i'i ba du na dod pa'i sa kyi rnarnams kyigasasu mye khang dge nor dang bya bar 'gyur bas thams na mad pa
9a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcwa lnga'i bar du saldan mtshan mo mun nag gi nang du yang gdugs bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu drug pi bar du stsal na sI'i 'og gi rdo
9a4(rgyud): rjerje sa gzhi dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu bdun gyi bar du stsal na gling bzhi po rnams su sems can dmyal ba'i sems can ji snyed mchis pa yang
9a5(rgyud): thams cad mthong bar 'gyur la/ de'i mthu'i dbang gis sdug bsngal myong ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang thar par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun drug bco brgyad kyi bar du stsal na gang zag de nyis m+b+ha
9a6(rgyud): li thu thob par 'gyur ro// nag bdun phrag bcu dgu'i byar du stsal na lugan rdo rje'i lus yang dag pa nyid mthong bar 'gyur byas smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// nus bdun phrag nyi shu'o/ 
9a7(rgyud): bar du stsal na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po dang ldan pa mthong bar 'gyur ba sna smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs byar bgyid do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du smras na/ 
9a8(rgyud): 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur/ gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhas med khang gi sgo rnams dadabyenas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems/ 
9b1(rgyud): pa rgyas ci mas su dgagasas kyang mamang ba ga ro// lan gage ba bya na yongs su da pa'i miga' 'thab par mamasas so// gangs sa zhen spyod pa'i cho
9b2(rgyud): 'di mngon par 'grub par 'chal pa gang lags pa ngas bstan pa 'di ba shin tu mngon par yed ches par 'gyi zhing sems can la sId la bar bgyi ste/ the tshom ma mchis na gong du bstan pa ba
9b3(rgyud): thams cad 'grub pang 'gyur lags so// gal khe tshom 'chal par 'gyur nam rnams grub ba 'a/ 'di ni spyan ras bzigs dbang phyu nam ngan nor bu'a'i tsha ma
9b4(rgyud): rigyi che ba rjes brtsa ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan dus gzigs dbang phyug gi sems kyi 'khor la pas/ mig mo smam gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de'i cha byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gce
9b5(rgyud): dbang phyug gis gzhar yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ sgrub pa'i don thams cad grub par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa dang las ngan pa thams cad rnam par
9b6(rgyud): / dgra thams cad 'dul ba/ bI nA ga ka khro ba'i bebs snye ga bzhi nas skye bo mang po la gnod pa mi byed cing / byams pa'i sems mya bar 'byung ba/ sbyin sreg hi bkra shis kyi cho ga bstan pa/ dogs pa
9b7(rgyud): zhugs thab lnga gang kru bzhi ba cig bgyis nas me tog ma len tsa su dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rdzi dang / chab mang cha mnyam par bsres te/ eg du dang tsan dan dang / shad dri can so so nas srid
9b8(rgyud): sor badra ga nyes med du sor gcig mchis pa gadrabs te/ thab tu bsgrag par la 'ang spyan tha za cig blangs nas lan cig sngags ces btab ste/ lugs rtsi nang du dang 'a bar spong rtsa bcud tshar bar la
10a1(rgyud): nalas kyi shes pa thams cad rnam par 'joms shing / tshe lo baN+Di nyi shu thub par 'gyur lags so// nag bdun gyi bar du rgyun rang bum mches par ni ci chog bzhin brgyas
10a2(rgyud): tsha le stong thub cang lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du cho ga bgyes na rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / rlatso pa chen po'i phan dang / skye 'ophal po rnams kyang
10a3(rgyud): mchis nas bsnyen pakur bgyid par 'gyur ro// nab 'dun phrag gsumacha bar du chog bzhin du bgyis na sum tu rtsa gsam ci lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dag tu dri lha dang / rgyam
10a4(rgyud): khor dang bcas pa yang nye bar lpags nas yongs su spang bar 'gyur/ lag mardo rjes kyang dngos grub na ba stsol bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gas
10a5(rgyud): napa chen po rnams yongs su stong bar 'gyur lags so// gal te/ dmas su char dkon par gyur na/ khungs kar dang / chab mar la sngags 'das bta bste/ gdugs gsum gyi bar du zhug
10a6(rgyud): bar du bsregs na char pa 'bab par 'gyur/ gal ta char ches te mi khums ca thab de'i thal ba blangs nas sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste/ gnam du gtor na char pa khums
10a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// ka/ te ser ba ma rungs pa babs sam/ rlung drag po glo bur du langs par d+ha ra na yang thal ba de blangs nang pan brgya rtsa btung sngags sdes bta bA ste/ sden mchis pa'i phyogs su ga
10a8(rgyud): mnapar 'gyur la sapas// sngags 'ang rtag par bzlas pa dzad ba kyis namathu slobs mthu ba chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur bas/ lus 'di spangs nas 'jig tar khams bang ba can drim par
10b1(rgyud): ngan par rdzogs par 'chang rgya pa'i bar ngadu skya ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur lags sa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
10b2(rgyud): dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces garol to// bcom ldan 'das tsan dan kI snying po'i 'khor lnga'i gzungs 'di bdag gis bstan pa bzhin du dag sred dam/ dge slong mA 'amA dag bsnyen nam
10b3(rgyud): dgra bsran ma 'am/ skyes pa'am/ bud med gang la' zhig gis lan gcig 'chang bar bgyid na gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur bas the tshom gyi bdam pa bskyed par mi bkye'o// yid la ba
10b4(rgyud): pa'i den thams cad thob par 'gyur bas shin tu mngon par yed ches par bgyi zhing the tshom bskyed par mi bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzangs
10b5(rgyud): dbang phyugang khyod snying rje chen pos yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi cho ga gya nom pa 'di yang dag par bshad de/ 'dzam bu'i gli dmi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar byas pa
10b6(rgyud): legs so lags so zhes bsngaga' ba brjod do// gang la la zhig gis sems bskyed de khya nas bzlas brjod byas na dngos grub theb bur 'gyur ro// de ltar yin mod kyi ras bstan pa btson du
10b7(rgyud): sems can rnams yang nang yang du nan tan brtson 'grus kyis rjes su bstan nas dngos grub thob par bya
10b8(rgyud): re ngas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzag dbang phyug gipa'ang skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag na bskal pa dpag tu ma mchas pa nas
11a1(rgyud): byam 'a bu la cwa pa'i ma leg sems can la rjems ston cing / rtag par yongs su bsrungs nas dngos su bstsal bar ni bcom ldan 'das nyid mkhyen cing dpong du gyur pa
11a2(rgyud): so// sems can rnams kyi slad du ying bzhin ci 'khor lo'i gzungs bde bo shad ba lags papa/ gang la zhig gis len cing 'char ba dang / rtag par bdag nyid bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i klungs tsha
11a3(rgyud): byang ba kre na smon pa rnams grub par 'gyur te/ bdag ni de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi bzlab sems can thams cad sdug bsngal pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa rab kyed pa
11a4(rgyud): so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad rab
11a5(rgyud): dga' nas mngon par yang ches pas yang dag par blangs te smod par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' spyar ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yang bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las/ sbyin sreg tom
11a6(rgyud): smad sbyor ba'i lalus drug pa'o// 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan nas gzigs dbang phyug li gsang ba'i mdzod thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i
11a7(rgyud): gzungs rdzogs so// zhu chen gyi mkhan po dang lo ts+tsha ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa ban+de ches grub kyi brgya'i dpe las bskur cing zhus te gtar la phab pa'o// grub dag/ yang zhus te
11a8(rgyud): padabyang rgya ring chos bas// 6/ rgya gar sma du/ a byas pa thog te shwar nAm d+her rje/ bo skad du/ 'phags pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs zhes bya ba/ 'phags
11b1(rgyud): ras gzigs thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byams pa'i ngang las snying rje'i shugs kyis byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed nas/ pad+ma dang
11b2(rgyud): nyi ma dang / zla ba'i gdan la hrIH'i 'phro 'dulas zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ dang po gnyis thal mo sbyar ba/ g.yas 'og man bkrang phreng mu tag dkar po/ g.yon 'og ma na pad+ma dkar po bsnam pa
11b3(rgyud): skumadog dkar po zhabs rdzogs pa'i skyil krung bcas pa/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis mdzes pa/ ma lha mo drug ma ba/ yab nor bu rin po ches brten pa/ byang chub
11b4(rgyud): sems dpa' dang / sems ma rab tu mang pos bskor te 'di skad ces gsungs so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos sngags 'di lar gcig tsam brjod dam dran zhing yid la byas sam/ bris nas lus
11b5(rgyud): la bcangs sam/ mos shing gus par byas na mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba'i sdig pa'i las thams cad byang zhing / ngan song gsum dang / myi khom pa brgyad dang / sdug bsngal dang bcas par ma skye
11b6(rgyud): drang me mA yin pa dang / gcan zan gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// nang dang / gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// oM ma Ni pad me hUM/ zhes brjod pas 'phags pa spyan ras
11b7(rgyud): gzegs kyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur zhing / tshe 'phos nas kyang bde ba can du bri ste/ 'dil the tshom mam som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis ma bzhig/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs
11b8(rgyud): dgas 'o// sangs rgyasas phyag 'tshal lo// chosas phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags baspyad ras gzigs kyi dbang po byong chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
12a1(rgyud): 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas reg pa 'di brjod kyis reg pa 'de bdag la grub par gyur cig/ tad+ha thA ha ha ha sa nan pas ma/ ta pa ta pa ne/ dz+wa lA dA la ne/ tsa la tsal na/ 
12a2(rgyud): buza yig smar pad ma ta stA ya swA hA/ gang gis rig pa 'di bklags pa de me bas brgya stong du skya ba dran par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur
12a3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po rdzogs so// dag yang zhus/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a pa lo ki te shwa ra e ka da sha mu kha nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
12a4(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
12a5(rgyud): dpa' cher po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngagasuM 'chang du mas yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der spong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la malo pos phyag
12a6(rgyud): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rjes na bral len gsum bskor ba bya sa nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ be com ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das snying po gdong
12a7(rgyud): bcwa ga cig pa nas bgyi bA 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig gis gsungs pa lags te/ de sems can thams cad la sman pa dang bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar brdze
12a8(rgyud): pa dang sdin pa dang bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad zlog par bgyid pa dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad zlog par bgying ba dang ma zhugs pa rnams dang pa
12b1(rgyud): da / bshegs pa yog 'den rnams rab tu zhi bar brdze ba'i gang du bshad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das snying po 'angs bsrung ba bgyis pa dang / yongs su rgyab pa dang / yongs su
12b2(rgyud): 'grus pa dang / zhi ba dang bdi legs su bgyur ba bgyis pa dang chad pa spangs pa dang / mtshon cha spangs pa dang / dug gzhal pa bgyis pa dang / gang pal zhig 'gas pa bgyid pa de ma
12b3(rgyud): ta/ de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa na bdag gis ma mthong ste/ sngon gyi la shA kye rnam par smin pa ni ma gtag
12b4(rgyud): lags so// sring po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bstod cing dgo a ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das pa dag gi snying po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
12b5(rgyud): rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran lags te/ brgal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi snga rol na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma brgya'i spyan pa
12b6(rgyud): gis chags pa'i dus 'joms pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes pakyi babyung ste/ pad/ drang srong du myur pas de bzhin gi shegs pa de las 'di mnos lags te/ thos ma thag tu phyog sna bcu'i de
12b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gyur/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang thob ste/ da ltar bdag gi snying po 'di ni gces spras bgyid pa lags so// de ltar lags pas rigs kyi bu'am dag
12b8(rgyud): kyibu me dad pa dang ldan pas gus par bgyis la snying po 'di brjed par bya'o// gzhan yid la mi bgyid par rtag tu brjod par bgyi'o// nang par langs nas brgya rtsa brgyad pa ton na tshe 'di lang
13a1(rgyud): tan brgya yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ dron dam mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ngabazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba dang / nges
13a2(rgyud): bsgrim me 'tshal bar nor dang 'bru dang dbyig dmas rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / dgra thams cad zhugs shing rnal bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po'i tshigs rnams gsong por smai bar sems pa
13a3(rgyud): ba dang yu la dug gis mi rmugs pa dang tubyeg drug gis mi tshugs pa dang / rims kyis mi rmugs pa dab mngon gyis mi tshugs pa thu ba dang / tshub 'dus pa
13a4(rgyud): bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / zhugs kyis 'bum pa'i dus bgying bar mi 'gyur ba dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur 'phags so// 
13a5(rgyud): bzhi yongs su 'dzin par bskur te/ 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / ngan song rnams su skye bar me 'gyur ba dang / yang ba ma spangs pas 'gum pa'i
13a6(rgyud): dus babyed par ni 'gyung ba dang/ 'di nas shrI 'thos nas kyad 'jig rten gyi khams bad ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran lags te/ 'di nas
13a7(rgyud): skal pa gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed dag gi snga rol gyi yang ches snga rol na de bzhin gshegs pa man dA ra ba'i bsung zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ de na bdag khyim par gyur pas 'di gzung na
13a8(rgyud): bral ba bani khri'i 'khor ba phyir bsgris lags so// bdas gis nying pe'ad bdan pas byang chub sems pa'i rnam par ma dag rgyal pa thams cad kyi snying rje 'jug pa ye shes kyi snying
13b1(rgyud): kyid cwo ldan so// gang dag bcing bas bcangs pa rnams dang / gang dag bcing pal zag pa rnams dang / cha ba dang / zhugs dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs rjes nyen pa'i sems can thams
13b2(rgyud): dnga' padag gi snying po 'dis gnas dang bslab pa dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen bkye'o// gnod sbyin dang / srin po snang pa rnams kyang snying po 'dis bkug la byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems
13b3(rgyud): ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi phreng po 'di ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba lags so// lan gcig 'arjod pas rtsa pa'i ltung ba
13b4(rgyud): po dag kyang byang bar 'gyur/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga pa dag kyang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur na/ ji skad bshad pa bzhin du nan tan bgyid pa lha smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba
13b5(rgyud): bre 'bum phrag du ma la dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba lags ma bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang / sgrub pa lta smos shing tsha 'tshal te bas ma pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs pa
13b6(rgyud): rdzi'o// sA nag bdaga'i slad du chos bcu ba ni 'am bco lnga la snang ba bgyis na/ de bskal pa bani khri'i 'khor ba bsgril bar 'gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming 'a
13b7(rgyud): ni don mchis te sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bas lhag lags so// bdag gi ming 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ bro nang thams cad
13b8(rgyud): yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ sgrub pa thams ca dang / lwab dang drug dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba lags so// gang ga la zhig cho ga bzhir
14a1(rgyud): spyod bya ba rnyed na de dag gis sug bar sangs kyi byang chub rdzob pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod sems can thams cad lnga de ltar snyed
14a2(rgyud): che ba legs so legs so// rigs sde 'u thab pa 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par nus te/ ngas kyang snying po gzung zhing rjes su
14a3(rgyud): ba byas kyis rigs kyi bu khyod smos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
14a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te snying po 'di smras so// na mo rat+na tra pA ya/ nA mo Ar+ye d+hA nas gu ra bai ro tsan b+hu hA dA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya~M/ na maHsarba tathA ga teb+h+yaH
14a5(rgyud): hata b+h+yaHsamyakrAn+mA d+h+we b+h+yaH/ na mo Ar+yA a ba lo ka te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa yA/ ma hA bat+tA yai ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+yaSh+Tha/ oM d+ha rA d+hA ra/ d+hi ra d+hi re/ d+hu ru d+ha dwe/ ain+te/ ban+de tsal tsam btsam
14a6(rgyud): 'du ma du mug bai / i yi me li/ tsaM ti dz+wa las pa na ya swAH/ 'di'i tshig ni bsgrub mi dgos par las thams cad byed de/ ri bas nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang
14a7(rgyud): rten bzhi pa dang / 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dri dang lus srul po dang / brjed byed dang / lba ba dang / 'bras kyi phreng ba dang / bas ljags la sogs pa dang / dug dang / phol mig dang / ga
14a8(rgyud): la sogs pa la 'ji tho ba bsgrags te bcu'o// man bdun pathus brjod kyi nams kye sgrib pa sbyong ba bgyi'o// khyim pa gdan gyi mazin pa'i ni 'brumar ro// rnababro 'tshal ba la ni tu
14b1(rgyud): 'drumar ro// rna ba bro' tshul bar dz+wal btags na des zhi bar bkur do// blon du thams cad la yang+ya sa bar bkres te bklags pas 'grub bo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
14b2(rgyud): dbang byug ginas bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar kye mkhan po shi yon d+ha d+hi pa/ bu chen gyi ma slo bas rjeye shes sdes pasgyur ci chus te gtan la rab kyi rdzogs so// 
14b3(rgyud): 'phags pa zhal bcu gcig pa'i rig sngags kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
14b4(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dris gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na 'od ma'i myu gu'i dkyil 'khor na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyes brgya lnga bcu dang / byang chub
14b5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni gtso bor gyur to// gzhan yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong dang / dge slong
14b6(rgyud): mungag dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma tshad med bsnyed dang / wa dang chu dang / gnod sbyin dang dr-iT dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' khrid dang / me'am ci dag stso phye chen po dang / grus bum dang shar dang
14b7(rgyud): me dag mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i 'khor mang po dag gis yongs su bskor nas mtshan cing rim grong byas/ bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas te gsung sngags brjod pa la chos ston par mdzad do// de nas byung / 
14b8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan rab gzegs dbang phyug drang srong rig sngags 'chang byi ba khrag khrig brgya stong chad med pa dag gis yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
15a1(rgyud): / bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te g.yas phyogs sulan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ga
15a2(rgyud): / bcom ldan 'das bdag la reg sngags kyi snying po gdong bcugacig pa zhes bsgribs bu chen po dang ldan po/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcug cig gis gsungs pa mchis te/ deng bdag
15a3(rgyud): gis sems can thams cad la sman cing bde bar bgyid pa dang / bro nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang / sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang / bkra mi shes pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba
15a4(rgyud): rmi lam ngan pa thams cad dgag pa dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / ngan sems can rnams gdul zhing dang ba thob par bgyi ba dang / mya ngan gyi sdug
15a5(rgyud): bsngal dang ldan pa dag bde ba thob par bgyi ba dang / 'khyon dang bcas pa rnams 'dum par bgyi ba dang / bdud dang gdon bgegs rnams ni par bgyi ba dang sems kyi smon pa rnams mngon/ 
15a6(rgyud): par 'grub par bgyi ba'i drad du bshad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/  dge sbyong dang bram zer badz+ra/ 
15a7(rgyud): pal sogs pa gang gis kyang rig sngags 'dis bsrung bar bgyis pa dang / 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / yi ger bris nas spel bar brjod pa de dag la bgegs/ 
15a8(rgyud): babyed pa dang / 'ad bye bar chad dge mtshon pa dang dbyeg pa dang drug dang / byad snyams thams cid kyis gnod par bgyid par 'gyung ba ma lags so// bdag gis ni/ lugs 'di gnas/ 
15b1(rgyud): pa'i phyogs su reng yang rung nye yang rung ste/ ci tsam du mtshams bkum pa las 'das nas gnod pa bgyed du mche ba ma mthong lags te/ sdig pa'i las nges par rnam par smin par gyur pa ni ma
15b2(rgyud): togs lags so// bcom ldan 'das des dngos po 'di nges par de lta bu lags par rig par bgyis nas mngon par yid ches pas blang bar bgyi'o// rnam par rtog pa ni ma bgyi'o// de
15b3(rgyud): rabagyis na gdon bgegs thams cad zag ring du spong bas nye bar mchi zhing grags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so// rig sngags kyi snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mtshungs par
15b4(rgyud): bsngags pa brjod cing mtshungs par rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad pa lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs shing yongs su bsrung ba mdzad pa lags so// bcom
15b5(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par dran lags te/ bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sngon rol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma brgya'i spyan
15b6(rgyud): sa pa mi mnga' bru'i gtsug sngon tan rab tu rgyas pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal pon bkyi bu 'jig rten du byung ste/ bdag de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de las rig sngags 'ad
15b7(rgyud): mnos lags te/ rig sngags 'di thob pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyu/ mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa yang thob par gyur pas rig sngags 'dri mthu chen po dang
15b8(rgyud): ldan par rig par bgyi legs so// de lta ba na mongs su dang ba dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mol songs ba dag gis rig snganapa 'di yin pa dang / 'dzin pa dge gos
16a1(rgyud): dang / 'don par 'tshal du/ gus pas sems rtsa gcig tu drad pas bcangs te/ rtag par nang par langs nas chos bzhin du yongs su dag par bgyis te/ rig sngags 'di
16a2(rgyud): sun brgya tsA brgyad pa zlas brjod pagyis na tshe 'di nyed la phan yon rnam bya bcuthob par 'gyur ba lags so// bcug nim/ chag par lus la blon dam mchis par 'gyur ba dpe/ rtag par/ 
16a3(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba dpra nor dang / rin po che dang gos dang / zang bas pa ma mchis pa dgal longs spyod par 'gyur ba dang / dgra thams cad thul cing / 
16a4(rgyud): jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ya rabs btsun pa rnams kyis pa
16a5(rgyud): gyur ba dang / mtshon cha dang / dbyig pa thams cad kyis gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / chab kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / zhugs kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid
16a6(rgyud): rimi 'gyur ba dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par ma 'gyur ba dag lags 'o// gzhan yang yon tan gyi sman yon rnam pa bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ 'gum pa'i dus
16a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rims mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / nam yang ngar 'gro rlabs su lang bar mi 'thung ba dang / ya dang pa spangs pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi
16a8(rgyud): bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba dag lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par dran lags te/ 
16b1(rgyud): ro/ de zhin ga shegs da dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas man dang ba 'dro bsung thos bzla ba 'jig rten du byungs/ rna' tshwa bdag khyim bdag chen po zhig tu
16b2(rgyud): klur brus/ sangab rgyas de la rig sngags 'drem nos lags te/ rig sngags 'a thob ma thag tu bskal ba bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil legs so// rig sngags 'di klog pa dang / 'dzin pa// 
16b3(rgyud): gyi thugs rje chen po'i ye shes kyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi sgo thob par 'gyur te/ de'i mthu/ 
16b4(rgyud): stobs kyi dbang gis gang dag btson dadam por chud pa dang / btson ra stsal ba dang / dbum pa la thug bya dang / cha
16b5(rgyud): lags pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bgegs thams cad las yongs su skyob par bgyid pa lags so// bdag ni 'di 'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi gnas
16b6(rgyud): dang skyabs dang / yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / gling dang khang khyim du gyur pa lags so// rig sngags 'di'i mthus gnod sbyin dang / srin po ma rungs
16b7(rgyud): pa la sogs pa thams cad yongs su bsdus shing gzung nas sngar byams pa'i sems dang byung rje'i sems bsted sa pa/ de'i rjes la bla ram mches pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa
16b8(rgyud): dgod par bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig sngags 'di gze byen chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas/ gang la la zhig gis lan cig tsam bzlas brjed bgyi sa pa na yang rtsa ba'i
17a1(rgyud): ltung ba bzhi dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga ma lus par yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur na/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa
17a2(rgyud): bye ba wagaklika brgya stong dum las dge ba'i rtsa bkun pa rnams kyis deng gdod rig sngags 'di thos par gyur pa lags na/ len pa dang 'dzin pa dadri/ ji phrad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa p+ta smos kyang ci 'tshal lag/ 
17a3(rgyud): kang lnga la zhigrag dugs mtshan du rig sngags 'di/ klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / 'dzin par dpyid na/ bdag gis de dag ge smon pa ci mchis pa yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid lags so// gang la la zhig gis/ 
17a4(rgyud): ba byed ci rjes bcu bzhi 'am bcwa le lgang ba 'gyis te/ sdom pa yang dag 'ang blangs nang chos bzhin du yongs su dag par bgyis te/ sems rtse gcig tu bdag rjes su dran par bgyis nasa'i sngags 'di
17a5(rgyud): 'bras brjo pakhye la na bskal pa pani phyi'i ma thong ba bsnyil ba rdzu rdzogs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rig sngags 'di dbang ges meng btsun ni thos pa dga' ba 'gyur ba da te/ gang sa ni
17a6(rgyud): gis sangs rgyas bye ba krug khrig brgya stong du ma'i mtshan nas brjod cing pid la bsapa bya dang / gnan yang 'ga' zhig gis skad cig gcig tsam du bsam pa thag pa dag/ bdag gi ming nas brjod cing rjes su dran par
17a7(rgyud): nyis kyi yos mamanyan zhe nu gas so// bdag gi 'dod pa de dag thams pa dkyang byer mi dzan pa 'thob pa dgyus thon thams ca dang rgyu bar gyu/ ba sa
17a8(rgyud): cad dang 'jigs pa thams cad lam thar bar 'gyur/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nongs le'u byang bar bgyur na babag gis bsten pa'i rig sngags 'di min pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang
17b1(rgyud): bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags te/ gang zag de dag ni bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub lag mthil na mchis pa bzhin du khong du chud cang logs par 'gyu
17b2(rgyud): bAr rig par bkyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzugs dbang phyug la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ rigs kyi bri khyong/ 
17b3(rgyud): kyis sems can thams cad la de lta bu'i byams pa dang snying rje'i bsam pa snyed nas/ rig sngags chen po 'di rnam par bya ste bstan pa yin pas khyod thabs 'di'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi nad
17b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal dang / sgrib pa dang 'gegs dang 'dzegs pa dang lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi nyes pa las yongs su skyob cing thar par byas nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
17b5(rgyud): bar la rnam par 'jog pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu nga yang rjes su li rang nas khyod kyi rig sngags yongs su gzung nas khyod kyis smos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
17b6(rgyud): dbang phyug kun las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzur nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sal btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rig sngags 'di 'don pa gang lags pa des
17b7(rgyud): 'di skad du dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshes
17b8(rgyud): tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang / 
18a1(rgyud): / ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod par bkye lags so// tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi re d+hi ri/ b+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te/ baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsasa~M/ ku su me/ gu su re/ 
18a2(rgyud): ma d+d+he b+h+ya ma ldan pa/  / sa kyus/  na la cu gas ga /  ga sas da nas da
18a3(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
18a4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ha thA/ ha ha ta ta/ i laM mi 'i/ tsi la pi'i// khi mi hi swAH
18a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chab dang gos la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'tshal na sngar khrus bgyis te de'i rjes la sngag 'dis chab la lan bdun btab ste lu
18a6(rgyud): tor nas bskyed par bgyi'o// gzhan yang sngags 'dis lan bdun btab ste gzod bgo bar bgyi lags so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs
18a7(rgyud): malo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// bya
18b1(rgyud): sa dpa' sems dpa chen po dgas pa kun das gzigs dbang phyug thugs chen pa dang ldan pa la zhus par phyag 'tshar lo// d+haH/ d+ha ru d+ha ru/ ha ha hashwa swAt+ma/ bcom ldan 'das 'din pag
18b2(rgyud): par me la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas pog bsregs te mchod par bgyid pa'i tshe sngar sngags 'di pog spos la lan bdun bta ba ste/ gdod bsreg par bgyi'o// mar me spar ba
18b3(rgyud): 'tshal na yang sngar sngags 'dis 'bru mar la lan bdun btab ste gdod mar me spang bar bgyi lags so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye she
18b4(rgyud): rgyamatsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la nus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub se
18b5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// t+yathA/ sI li rI d+hi ra d+hi re/ si ri d+hi ri swA r+d+ha/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni me tog
18b6(rgyud): ga zlos dang / phreng bal gdab bya'i sdigs lags te/ dkyim 'i bar du zhugs nas me ti ga dang / phyog spos dog phreng bdag zhes mchod pa babyed pa'i tshe slar sngags 'das me tog lan bdun btab ste
18b7(rgyud): gzugs la gtor bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang sngags 'dis byug sbas pa lan bdun btab ste sku gzugs la phyag par bgyi'o// gzhan yang sngags 'dis phyed pa la lan bdun btab ste sku gzugs
18b8(rgyud): can par brtse gas so// de/ na mchog gsapas bus par byen 'argyal 'o// 'jigs pa yonan nag/ das pa'i shes rgyamatshon ma par rje ma nga bdi pa'i rgyam po bum par byen 'phrul lo// 
19b1(rgyud): bu rer blangs nas sngags lan re btab ste zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bkye'o// de dag thams cad bas par bsregs nas de'i rjes la gdod bgyi ba ci mtshas pa bste lags so// dkon mchog gas
19b2(rgyud): la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye she sa rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
19b3(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang lda
19b4(rgyud): bal gus par byed 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ si li ma li/ bi li ti li/ tsi lo hi li swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mtshams dgum pa'i sngags te mtshams dgum par 'tshal na sngar sngags 'di chab
19b5(rgyud): lan bdun btab ste phyogs bzhir gtor bar bkye'o// yang na yungs kar ram thal ba gtsang ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir gtor na sems kyis nye ring ci tsam dgum pa
19b6(rgyud): mtshams su gyur na yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur lags so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de zhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam pa snang mdzad paso
19b7(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa
19b8(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ bai Te Ti ti Te ti Te/  ru tsan/ bid te thod te/ gcag ma thag pan/ a
20a1(rgyud): / ba lo ki te shwa rA ga/ sa zlas b+ha ni swAr+tha/ bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag zur rung gi gnas su mchi bar bskul ba'i sngags lags te/ kyi banyi mchis bkyi sa lags nas bdag sma rang ni
20a2(rgyud): gnas su mchi bar bsku ba'i tshe lags 'dris tsha la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir gtor na ba dag slar mchi bar 'gyur bags so// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di ni ma su
20a3(rgyud): / don du ma gyur lags kyis kyang mas subagyi ba rnam pasna tshogs bgyid pas sems kyi gcig tu bzlas brjod pagyis na smon pa rnam 'im 'grub bkang mang ma mchis lags so// gang zhag
20a4(rgyud): sman da gdugs re re la na re ltung ba 'am gdugs gnyis shing lan re ldang ba'am/ gdugs gsum zhing lan re ldang ba'am/ gdugs bzhi zhing lan re ltung ba 'am/ gdon 'byung pos
20a5(rgyud): bgyis pa'am/ mkha' 'groms bgyis pa'am/ gzas ba byis pa'am/ lus sul pos bgyis pa 'ang/ spro byed kyis bgyis pa'am/ brjed byed kyis bgyis pa 'ab/ 'dre
20a6(rgyud): marungs pa rnam pa tshogs kyis bgyis pa yang ru ste/ na pa de / sa thugs 'dis san brgyartsa brgyad btab na'i chi bar 'gyur lags so//  mA sgrub ba khri sa mtshan
20a7(rgyud): skud pa sa ga su yin de badra zhing ri rimadud de ba kyi rtse brgyad tshang bar bgyis nas na pa'i mthul pa'am/ dpung pa la btag sbyin khan mtho ba'i skye ba'in byang zhing bron kyang mis pa
20a8(rgyud): nas so// gas te gangs pa dag / thus kyi phreng ba dang / u ba dang ngos mig dag ci 'angag pa dag gisan pa' so sa shin sa parnam pa tshogs kyi
20b1(rgyud): kur ta ma rab kri dang / mnga' dang / mdung la sogs pa 'og ste smos par gyur tag/ wA la dang / sdig pa dang / rtsangs pa dang / bung ba dang / gdug pa la sogs byas zin par gyur na/ sngags 'das lan
20b2(rgyud): bdun bzlas te btab na sos par 'gyur lags so// gal te sgrib pa l+li ba zhig lags na/ dgas ser po'i 'jim pa la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste bro 'tshal ba'i dmigs su zhugs na sel
20b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur lags so// gal te rlung nad na pa 'am phyogs gcig pa lang bar gyur tam rna ba 'on pa'am sna 'tshubs pa 'am rlung gis zin pa'i nang la sogs pa blo 'tshal bar gyur na/ sems rtse
20b4(rgyud): gcig tu sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis nas nad pa de dag la la na brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ni nad sos par 'gyur lags so// gal te sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags na 'bru mar dang / chab
20b5(rgyud): mar dang kr-i dang / dras rnams bskos te lpags lan bdun btab nas lus la bkus sam rnaM ba dang sngar thugs sam 'tshal du stsal na byon smos par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang blo nad gzhan rnam pa
20b6(rgyud): tshogs kyis blo 'tshal bad+ma gyur ma/ sems rje ga c-ig tu sngags 'di gad ba bang btsal// yid na bdag nyid kyis zlas brjod kyis na 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so// gas te gasngags 'di
20b7(rgyud): bsgrub par 'tshal na/ sngar sti zhing 'phan skyon ma mchis pa'i tsan den dkar po las byang chub sems dpa'adun dus gcigs dbang phyug gi gzugs srid du mtho byu dang do ces pa/ sug pa lag byam
20b8(rgyud): ban bad+ma le ba rgan dang ril ba thogs pa lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas bgrang phreng thogs shing / 'jigs pa mo mchis pa smyos pa'i lag tu ston pa gdong bcu gcig par bgyis te mdun gyi gdong
21a1(rgyud): gsum ni byams pa dang snying rje dang bcas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par brgya'o// g.yon phyogs kyi gdong gsum ni tshwa bo'i mtshan can du bgyi'o// g.yas phyogs kyi gdong gsum nim
21a2(rgyud): po rkyen du byung ba'i mtshan can kyi'o// ba kyi dang ga cig ni srog na sa ny-i na 'o// skye ga nas kyi na cig
21a3(rgyud): bgyi'o// mgo can de dag thams cad kyi nang na yang sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' snyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i lus ni do shal la sogs pa/ rgyan rnam pa sna chags
21a4(rgyud): dang ldan par brtse'o// gzugs pa kyis lags nas smon pa rnams grub par 'tshal ba dang lags pa des gos sa rab gtsang ma bgos te sbrad pa bgyis nas sdom pa yang dag par thas te zla ba dika
21a5(rgyud): gyi /  gsus sa su desan brgyas brgyad dam yang na dang gsum mchis par 'akris rjod parje'o// de san chad gnas na shig
21a6(rgyud): gtsangs te sa byang chub sems na pag gas bang rmyi/ ga 'ab kyis pa na gnas sa kyi/  stan nyams chen na bye ba'i ba'ab da 'ang bdug
21a7(rgyud): nas a ka ru dang du dku 'ba' zhig gis bsreg par brtse'o// nal 'byor ba de 'bru phyed dang 'o mra'i zas 'tshal nas sngam banan du bzlas brjod bkyis togadugs gsum pa la thug pa'i thar
21a8(rgyud): ngaslan chad mchod pa'i yo byad ba shams pa yang sngam pas ches khyad par du 'phags par bgyi'o// rnal 'byor pa de zas dkar gsum po 'di lta ste ma shod pa 'bras can 'apa zhig 'tshal ba
21b1(rgyud): byang chub kyi shing blangs nas gzugs de'i mdun du zhugs smar bar bya'o// gzhan grang shing ngad blangs nas dum bu stong rdza brgyad tu gtubs he du ru ka'i mar gyi nang du spangs nas gdugs gcig/ 
21b2(rgyud): ma 'a ga cig blangs te/ skyugs lanA de byazlas ni zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas par 'gyur na de'i tshes chen po rnamasu rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur la dri'i dbang gis sku gzugs
21b3(rgyud): kyis pa de'i yang rab tu g.yo zhing nang gi gong na mchis pa'i gdong gi kha nas skra byung nas rnal 'byor pa de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// 
21b4(rgyud): kyis smon pa rnams yongs su gnyer bas bdag gis khyod kyi smon pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// khyod 'di nas nam mkha' sa 'phur te 'gro ba 'am/ yang na khyod rgyu ning 'grol thogs pa med pa'am
21b5(rgyud): lang na drang srong rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po byed par 'gyur ba'am/ yang na bdag ci lte ba bzhin du rang dbang thogs pa med pa nyid du bya'o nas sngags pa brjod par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas zla ba
21b6(rgyud): dkar po lar gyi ngo ches bcwacu lnga la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs gdong bcu gcig pa de sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag ste/ gos sar pa
21b7(rgyud): tsang ma bgos la gso sbyong dang sdom pa yang dag par blangs te gdugs mtshan gcig la rab tubyung bar bgyis nas/ sum na'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad blangs te/ me tog re re blangs nas sngags lan re btab sa/ 
21b8(rgyud): dbyas pa'i bar kyi na che thags pa kyis pa de dun du ga ga se kelas grug 'i byung bar gyur // de nga shes chen pos la ba
22a1(rgyud): de'i tsherang gi sems bde bar bzhag nas skrag cing 'jigs pa mi bskyed par rig grags dang smon cing sgrub pa gang rags pa'ab shig su dra par te 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
22a2(rgyud): po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nam zhig na sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs su gyur nas sems can thams cad kyi sems
22a3(rgyud): ci smon pa rnams yongs su pazong bar 'grub nas brjod par gyur na/ de'i tshe spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rtse ltar smon pa rnams smos par 'gyur te/ smon pams sgrom pa'i tshe lha dang gu la sogs pa gang gis kyang ba
22a4(rgyud): chad dang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur lugs so// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas zla ba la gza' zhugs pa'i tshe chab mar phrang gcig blangs te/ dngul gyi snod kyi nang du stsam nas gzugs bgyis pa'i mdun
22a5(rgyud): du'azhag ste/ sngags 'dis bzlas brjod pa kyis na thub yang snga mkhon bzhin du skyabs 'og du byung bas de nas blangs te 'amaman la
22a6(rgyud): nan yang rnal 'byor pas rjong ros dang ge wang cha mnyam par bgyis te/ gzugs bgyis pa do mdun du bzhag nas lpags 'di la na stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te chab kyis smras nas dpral ba ma thig le bgyis
22a7(rgyud): don nam pa gsum 'grub par 'gyur lags so// sngar bstan pa bzhin du cha ba dron po dang sbyar te khrum ba gyis ni bgegs thams cad dang bron ma rungs pa thams cad byas pa ning 'byung
22a8(rgyud): gyur lags so// gzhan yang gal te ros kyi mig tshogs kyis g.yul 'phrog par gyur na// spyan ci dmar rtsi 'bras bu cig blangs te sngags 'di sa na brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab nas
22b1(rgyud): thugs bgyis pa de'i g.yon phyogs kyi khro bo'i gdong la byugs te dgra'i phyogs ku kha bstan na dgra'i dmag tshogs rnams drung du mchi bar mi 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang gal te yul phyogs su
22b2(rgyud): dedang phyugs la rims na byung bar gyur na/ gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du shing shug pa'i zhugs bus la gzhan yang shing de blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gtubs te dum bu gcig blangs nas sung
22b3(rgyud): 'bru'i mer gyis bskus te/ sngags lan re bzlas nas thugs kyi nang du dor bar ba kyi zhing thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyi'o// gzhan yang sdud pa dmar po las mdud pa bdun mdud de mdud pa lan re mdud cing sdug+sa
22b4(rgyud): lan re bzlas nas nang gi gong na mchis pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags na rims nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ rims na den nas sngags dag sdang dkrol bar 'gyur lagaso// 
22b5(rgyud): dang / 'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon gyis zin te bro 'tshal bar gyur na/ skud pa dkar po la sngags mdung nyi shu rtsa gcig mdud de sngags pa nA de bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdung nas mdun gyi byams pa dang snying rje
22b6(rgyud): napa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon ti slar bkrol nas nad pa'i mgul du btags ni bro nad sos par 'gyur lags so// gal te las kyi sgrib pa khyi ba zhig lags te sos par ma gyur na sngags thag
22b7(rgyud): blangs nas yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste snga ma'i gzugs kyi spyi bo la btags nas/ zhag ston te slar bkros nas nad pa'i mgul du btags na nges par 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang sa
22b8(rgyud): lelel zhig/ bron da rgyun rims kyis btang nas sdug bsngal zhing sos par mgyur tom/ 'dre gdon ma rungs pa khyim du zhugs par gyur na/ kun lug zang 'brum bu brgyad rtsa brgyad blangs te gzugs bgyis pa de'i
23a1(rgyud): mdun du 'brum bu re re la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar brdzi zhing thams cad bas pa'i bar du bkye'o// gzhan yang skud ba dkar po la sngags mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig mdud
23a2(rgyud): sngags lan re ba zhing mdud par re mdud nas/ mdun gyi byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdeng gi skye bo la btags nas nag len te slar bkrol nas nad pa'i mdul du btags na brond rnams 'byang ni ga
23a3(rgyud): pagegs ma rungs pa rnams 'byer zhing 'gyes par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang mi 'dza' ba dag gas glags btsal bar gyur tam/ 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / byad stems kyis gnod par bgyid par gyur na me tog
23a4(rgyud): dang po/ sros la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis gzugs bgyis pa de la mchod cing bi nA ya ka'i gzugs kyi mdun du zhugs pa nag/ 'un te'i 'bras bu 'brum bubargya rtsa brgyad blangs te sngags lan res btab
23a5(rgyud): bzhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang skud pa dkar po la mdud pa brgya zla brgyad mdud de/ sngags la na re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas gzugs de'i g.yon phyags kyi khro
23a6(rgyud): gang gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag bzhi lon ti s+phar bkrol pa/ skud pa de blangs de me mdza' ba de'i ming nas brjod de mdud pa re re nas so so tha dad par sbas nas ra re la yang sngags lan rabaH
23a7(rgyud): re de re nas gtobs te thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyis na/ mi mdza' ba de dag ci bgyi'o 'tshal mi 'byor cing rang nyid skyabs su mche bar 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang gang ya la zhig
23a8(rgyud): legs pa'i dnges pa grub par 'tsham na/ tshon lnga lnga'i sdud pa las sngags mdud bcu rtsa brgyad mdud de// sngags lan reb kra zhing mdud pa rer mdud nas/ gnan yang gzugs pa gyis pa'i/ 
23b1(rgyud): bdun du thugs lan bdud gyis btang ste/ byams pa dang nying rje dang ldan pa'i gdong gi skye bo pa btags nas dag yon te blang bkrol nas bdag nyid kyi lus lnga btags na smon pa rnams
23b2(rgyud): yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang kadwe la la nig sgrib pa'i bgegs dang ldan pas/ legs pa'i dngos po rnams par tshur smon pa yid bzhin du grub par ma
23b3(rgyud): kur ta ma bkri mi shes pa'i dngos po dag dus dus su rgyu ma mchis par langs par gyur na spos chab kyis gzugs bgyis pa de bkru bar bgyi'o// gzhan
23b4(rgyud): brgyad sngags kyis btab ste bi nA ya ka'i gzugs bkru chezhes snang dbang pa dpel 'dug bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang chab la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste rang nyid kyi lus la gtor
23b5(rgyud): na/ sgrib pa dang bgegs thams cad rang gi ngang gis nu byang nas/ smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
23b6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis de skad smrasmra ba dang / 'khor mang po thams cad kyis mthun par skyes bya can po leg no lags so// sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'i phyir rig sngags 'di
23b7(rgyud): sbas pas/ bdag cag kyang rjes su yi rang zhing yongs su 'dzin par smon to zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur te// de nas 'khor mang po thams cad dga' mgur ngas par gyur te/ bcom ldan
23b8(rgyud): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyag byas te dgyes par gyur to// 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug zham bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// zhu ched kyi ma / 
24a1(rgyud): tsa la~M tsA ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa ban de chos grub kyis rgya'i dpelas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ yang nus byad/ skyug sung chud 'bum la gtugs lags par/ 
24a2(rgyud): lusas// rgya ga sad du/ pad+ma mu waT tan d+ha nA ma/ bod ska dang / pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyung/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rjes phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thas pa dus gcig
24a3(rgyud): na/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhas med khang na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje
24a4(rgyud): chen po'i sgo kun nas 'argya ba sa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la skyems par zhugs te/ 'od zer bya'i rnam par snang mdza dag du chen mtsho 'drid gi rdul la reg pas ga mjug tu bskam pa babang po'i sangs rgyab stong
24a5(rgyud): gnyis la mchod nas/ 'od zer de bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub po// nub ma thag tu thugs rje chen po phyag stod spyan stod dang ldan pa snga mdog gangs kyi rtsel nyi ma shar bltar dkar ba zhas bcu
24a6(rgyud): tshig gi cartsa ba'i zhas dkar po// steng gal sa ba/ g.yas ldang gu/ g.yen dmar ba/ steng gi gsum nag po// bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu ni byu ru bcag pa lta bur gyur te/ 'dzum pa mdzad nas thugs rje chen/ 
24a7(rgyud): po'i bdag po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gzugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa sbyin pas gzigs dbang phyug gis thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la gsol la/ 
24a8(rgyud): dang sngags dang las rnams dang / khyad par chog bstan par gyis/ zhes gsel pa btab nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la legs so zhes
24b1(rgyud): saM pa de bzhin bcom ldan dbar/ drang srong rtag tu ri dgas brgyam// zhi ba 'dzam dang bzhad pa dang // khros pa'i nam mangs spyan gsum mangs// bcu pa sems dpa'i tags can de/ 
24b2(rgyud): gcig bcom ldan 'das kyi badrag/ yon tan nor bri mr-i tig phreng // len pas sna tshogs smad dkris pa// dang po'i phyag ni thal// ro te// g.yas pa rin chen phreng ba 'dzin// g.yon pa dri med pad+ma
24b3(rgyud): 'dzin// g.yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa po// g.yon pa rib spyi blags te// g.yas pa 'khor lo rab tu 'dzin// g.yon pa na ni mda' gzhu ste// lhag ma mchog sbyin spyan ldan
24b4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzum pa mdzad de/ cod pan gnyis nas 'od zer rab tu 'phros pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs
24b5(rgyud): 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i steng du rigs lnga byung ba 'di lta ste/ rnam par thang mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' las dang / don yod grub pa dang / me bskyed pa'o// mang bu brtsa
24b6(rgyud): drin po che de'i nang du seng ge dang / rta dang / rma bya dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gleng pa ched dag ni chod pan las byung ba'o// yang yum ni su mdog sngon mo ste// pad+ma las byung ba d+ma'i steng // tshad med
24b7(rgyud): bzhis sa phyag bzhi mdzes// sems dpa'i rgyan du ldan pa li// mnyam pa yi ni skyil grang bcas// yab ni sku mdog ser po ste// pad+ma las byung pada'i steng // thal sbyar nor bu bgrang phreng
25a1(rgyud): can rnams yongs su 'dzin pa'o// yang na 'od zer rab bkye ste// zla ba nyi ma las byung ba'i// nyi ma'i mdog can nyi mA ni// gzhon nu uta pal mchog srin mdzad// zla ba la
25a2(rgyud): skyes nam mkha'i mdog/ rlung zheg khros pa dor rgyan// dkar po grangs ltar dkar ba sa// nyi rje'i steng na pad+ma 'dzin// drug po gnyis dang hrIHlaM ga las// gnyis myod tshul gyis 'bras bu
25a3(rgyud): rdzogs// ha la grib khams gsum sdud// khro gnyer can gyi phrin las mdzad// gshin rje gshed po ga tAr 'dzin cing // khams gsum rnam rgyal bdud sde 'joms// 'khor lo
25a4(rgyud): po dag pa'i ldeng // gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas// dang por dkon mchog rab dad cing // tshad med bzhi ni rab tu rdzogs// byang chub yan lag rdzogs pad / chos dbyed sa rang
25a5(rgyud): nyid do// gleng gzhi dang sku bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas gsang sngags bstan pa'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad gangs chen mche'o zhing 'phra
25a6(rgyud): thams cad du 'od bkye nas ga tsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas yang sangs pa/ oM d+hI d+hInI aHoMd mo raHtregal/ na mo I d+ya dz+nyA ni sA+e ga 'aM/ bai ro tsa nA ya b+hah+ma rA
25a7(rgyud): tASh+Taka dz+wA la/ AH te sam+b+haHk+ShaSh+Ta5/ ni mama.ang+ge ShA rA pa/ ba d+his d+hA ya/ ma d+his twAM ya/ mad+haHdzaN+Di k+Sha y+Ya/ t+yAd+yathA/ oM d+ha rtipa/ dz+ha d+he / d+har+tha d+b+haH/ e/ 
25a8(rgyud): si tsa li/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me pa ro/  mi li mi li/ tsati dz+wa lam pa na ya swA hA/ sngags 'di 'don par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos lan cig brjod dmi dra
25b1(rgyud): zhing yid la byas sam lus la bcangs na mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba'i sdig pa'i las byang zhing sems can dmyal ba dang ye dgas dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mi skye zhing
25b2(rgyud): me khom pa brgyad du sdug bsngal dang banus par mi 'gyur ro// gcan gzan dang / srin po dang / mi ma yin pa dang / nad dang 'jigs pa thams cad las grolci bar 'gyur ro// oM
25b3(rgyud): rak+Sha rak+Sha zhes pas kyi bsrang ba bya'o// oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM/ Ad+ya nud pan+na ta ta zhes pas gtor ma'i chus yA dka sul mchod par bya ste/ oM AHhrI zhes pas so// de
25b4(rgyud): rnams kyi sngags bsdus pa na/ a ma Ni pad me hU~M zhes pa'o// 'di ni rigs gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur te/ de'i phan yon ni 'di'o// chos kyi sku dang gzugs kyi sku'i thugs rje chen po
25b5(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur ro// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta d+hu pye pu dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta puSh+paM pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ e na maHsarba ta thA ga tA
25b6(rgyud): A lo ke s+'u rI me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ti gan d+he pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra NA sa me ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta naM wi d+h+ya pudz+nyA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra NA sa ma be
25b7(rgyud): oM na maHsa rbe ta thA gA ta shap+ta pu dzA me g+ha sa mu dre s+pha ra Na sa ma ye Sh+TaM/ oM na maHsarba ti thA ga ta maN+Dal bu dza me g+ha sa mu drA sA ra NA sa ma ye hUM/ de nas mchod pa yang dag mchod/ stong nyid kyi
25b8(rgyud): shes las byung ba'i// thabs dang shes rab gnyis ldan pa'i// hrIHyig dkar po yang dag bzlas// sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas las dang cho ga bstan pa'i phyir/ dang po/ 
26a1(rgyud): zhi ba'i las sgrub na// yid du 'ong ba'i ljongs dag tu// dkar po dang po gsal dus su// dri shim chu yis legs byugs to// me tog dkar po bkram byas nas// khrus dang
26a2(rgyud): bas phyogs mthun pa'i// bde ba'i stan la nyer 'jug ste// bum pa dkar po tsan dan dkar// dris bgad pa/ dgos legs par dkri/ maN+Dal dbus bu legs par gzhag/ snru sa
26a3(rgyud): byung ba'i sems dpa'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// rgyan rnams rdzogs pa pad+ma bsnams// zla ba'i glang nA l+ya legs bzhugs pa/ 
26a4(rgyud): 'phro ba bsgo// phyag stong sun yang de bzhin te// nu kye ba'i sgra ni mdun bsams nas// sI 'i 'phro du shes la pa ni s+'uD+D+h+ya/ sa dri rab tu gsol ba ste// gsang sngags 'di ni brjod
26a5(rgyud): bar bya// na mo rat+na tr-i yA yaM/ ne mo Ad+ya dz+nyAn/ sA ga ra ba ro tsa na/ ts+tsha hi rI ya tathA ga tA ya/ naM maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya kyi mUr+thA ya/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ke te shwa rA ya/ 
26a6(rgyud): sutwAM ya/ ma hA sa d+d+hi ya/ me hA kA ru Ne kA ya/ a mr-i ta pal che ge mo / N+Di d+ha A hA/ zhes bzlas par bya'o// bri rnam par snang mdzod bum pa tshus// gang zhig legs par khrus byed pa/ 
26a7(rgyud): drim sems cad yongs dag nas// 'bras bu bde ba de thob 'gyur// 'jigs pa kun las rabu grol te// myur du chu skyes thob par 'gyur// de nas rgyas bsgrub 'dod na// nags
26a8(rgyud): tshal shin tu 'jug po sa// dri zhim chu yis legs byugs la// 'bras bur bcas pa'i me tog dgram// rgyan rnams yongs su btags nas ni// bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste// 
26b1(rgyud): chen rdza lnga 'bru snar bcas// ngan chen gzhung thugs byas la// maN+Dal dbus su legs par gzhag/ hrIHlas byung ba sems dpa'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser/ 
26b2(rgyud): rgyan rnams rdzogs pa pad+ma bsdams// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te// rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas// mchod pa lnga yis yang dag mchod// hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal bar bzlas
26b3(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAh+ye dz+nyAn+da sA ga rA ya/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsas ta thA ga te b+h+yaHand b+h+yaHsamyak+Sham+bad+d+he b+h+yaHna maHAdra pa lo ki te shwa rA pa// 
26b4(rgyud): d+he sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ne kA ya/ rat+na ku na puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ bang mdzad stong pa'i steng bzhag ste// 'bru yis yongs su khengs par 'gyur// de nas dbang gi/ las byed na// 
26b5(rgyud): dper byed pa'i chu klung 'bram// pa la sha dang A shAt+tha// me tog dmar por ril bu byas// bsog pa dmar po'i nang du gzhug/ 
26b6(rgyud): les byung sgrol ma ni// sngang gu phyag na lcags kyu 'dzin// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin to// rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsamyas nas// mchod pa lnga yis yang dag mchod// hrIHyi
26b7(rgyud): 'gro 'du gsal bar bzlas// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya/ pai ro tsa nA ya/ bu hA rA dzA ya/ tathA ga tI yai/ ni moHsarba ti thA ga te b+h+yaHanat+maHsa myakram+bad+h+we b+h+yaHna maHa
26b8(rgyud): shwa la/ bo d+has twA ya/ ma Nis d+hA ya/ ma hAk+Sha ru NikA ya~M/ a me g+ne d+hasnro Ta ru/ oM rl-i re de/ She tsu re a mo g+haHklog dum+b+haH/ rdzas kyi lde lus lus zhugs nas/ 
27a1(rgyud): pad yis zhugs par 'gyur// de nas phrin las bya 'dod na// dud khrong shing gcig dag tu ni// ba yI lci bas legs byugs nas// mye tog sngon po nem pa yi// ma
27a2(rgyud): bul byas dgram// byang du 'dug ste las 'di bcwam// gcan gzon stang du chu shes te// rje ye yi ge las byung ba'i// mdog dkir ral pa'i thor tshugs can// zha ma gcig sman
27a3(rgyud): gsum pa ste// ri dgas pagos pa 'dzin pa yi// drang srong khros pa'i cha byad rgyan// phyag bzhi dang po mchog sbyin ga/ nag yon pa bad steng rul gri can// gsus pa rtsos 'gros
27a4(rgyud): pa'i mdun// rtse gsum dkar pos brgyan pa'o// g.yon pa thod pa dkar po ste// dri zhim me tog dag gis bkang // rgyal po chen po'i rol bltar// cung zhig zur gyis gzi
27a5(rgyud): ba'o// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te// bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong // pad+ma'i gdan la legs bzhugs pa'o// rgyas pa'i sku ni legs bsnamaswA nas/ 
27a6(rgyud): sa byung ba'i// gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya/ bi ro tsa nA ya/ b+hu ha rA dzA ye/ ta thA ga tI ya~M/ no maHsmin ta thA ka te b+h+yaH
27a7(rgyud): da b+h+yaH/ sas+yakrAm+ba d+d+he b+hAH/ na mAH Ar+yA ba lo ka te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ mi N+Da kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM aM ka Te ne ka Te/ ka Ta kA Te/ ka ro Te ka ro Ta/ hrI
27a8(rgyud): i ka ma a mo g+ha/ ba~M badz+ra sa ha nA dai hUM phaT/ dri'am byugs pa dag la ne// btab la luse la byug par bya// me tog sngon po mgo la gzhag/ maN+Dal chu yis lus la zlag/ 
27b1(rgyud): tsig bos ni sa no// las rnams thams cad grub par 'gyur// de nas bzhig grub 'dod na// bkra shis dus gsum rdzogs dus su// ri bo yid 'ong gnas dag tu// sa ga'izhi chag chag
27b2(rgyud): legs btab ste// maN+Dal legs byas me tog ni// dri zhim dkar po yongs gtor te// gtsang zhing dag pa'i rdzas rnams dgram// gtsang ma bram ze byas te gzhag/ khrus dang ku sha'i
27b3(rgyud): steng gnas te// hrIHlas byung ba'i chu skyes steng // chu shel mdog 'dra zhal gsum yang // 'dzum dang zhi ba'i bdag nyid can// ljang gu bzhad pa'i zhal gsum ste// nag po khros pa dmar
27b4(rgyud): ser skra// ser po'i zhal ni 'dzum pa ste// dmar po bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu// ri dgas pags pas stod g.yogs shing // sna tshogs sham thabs mnabs pa yi// zhabs gnyis phyug
27b5(rgyud): drug ma nyam par bzhengs// g.yas g.yon dang po thal mi sbyar// bar ma pad+ma bgrang phreng 'dzin// tha ma mchog sbyin spyi blugs 'dzin// bum pa rnam snang lha mo ni// la se ma le gir ti
27b6(rgyud): nir ti nang gi lham dag/ zla ba'i gdan la legs por bzhugs// hrIHyi yi ge las byung ba'i// gsang sngogs rgyal po bzlas par bya// na ma rat+na tra yA la/ na maHar+ya dz+nyA na
27b7(rgyud): sA ga rA ya/ be ro tsa nA ya/ byA hA ra dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA yaM/ na maHsarba tri thA ga te b+h+yaH/ anar+d+haHsamyakrap+tAt+te b+h+yaH/ na maHAr+yA bA lo kr-i ta shwa rA la/ be d+hi sa twA ye/ me hA sa twA la/ ma hA kA dwe
27b8(rgyud): / \u0f7f/ oM d+hir d+hag d+hi d+ho/ tu ru d+h+ye rI/ in+d+he baT+Te/ tsa la chen/ br-iH me bra tsa la/ sa sums sum par/ oM ma mis tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa ma me k+ShaH/ bum pa'i rgya'i legs pa skye
28a1(rgyud): nas// lus la byugs pas grub par 'gyur// tshegs bsgrubs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas thabs kyi rim pa na// gro ga'am ras sam shing shun la/ 
28a2(rgyud): nga yi 'oms bris pa yi// chom buMlnga yi 'khor lo la// dbus su sku yis bon te// lnga pa yi ni lngapa ste// shar du de la dbre bar bya// bzhi pa'i lnga ba dbus su mtshan// g+ho ru de na yang
28a3(rgyud): dag dgod// lta ba'i dang po bzhi pa'i gsum// nub du de ni yang dag dgod// lbu pa yi ni lnga pa la// e yis rnam par sbyar pas te// byang du de ni yang dag dgod// dbus su thugs kyis
28a4(rgyud): 'on te/ shAn+ti~M kA mtshams su'o// swA hA dbusas dgod par bya// de ltar 'khor logs la bgod na// dngus lam dkar po'i ga'u gzhug// thams cad las kun zhi bar 'gyur/ 
28a5(rgyud): yis bris pa yi// puSh+TiM ku ru mtshams su'o// tsan dan dkar po dri nim zhing // kham po ser 'or legs par gzhug/ rgyas pa'i lasnarnams grub par 'gyur// pa la sha les legs
28a6(rgyud): papar bris// ba shaM ku ru mtshams su dgod// kham par dmar por legs par gzhug/ dbang gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// nim pa'i chu yis legs par bre// mA ra la ni
28a7(rgyud): mtshams su dgod// lcags sa mthod par yang dag gzhug/ phrin lngas thams cad grub par 'gyur// tsan dan dkar po dri zhim shed // bzhi pas de ni mal bsreg/ 'dra
