28a8(rgyud): bu mngar dang bcas tha'i shing // rgyal pas de ni mes bsreg/ dbang ni ngal sha ye shing // des bsregs nakhrugs par 'gyur// nim pa shing mchang gcad pa'o// 'ag
28b1(rgyud): pas phrin las 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor ma'i lo 'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas lus kyi rim pa ni/ 'dul ba dang bras kyi 'dab// tim+b+ha dang yungs pa rA bu co la// gsang sngags bzlas
28b2(rgyud): nas grub pa ni// da la'i shing la legs bsregs nas// thams cad rab tuzhi bar nus// ku sha stAr bang zug 'brum dang // stag ma'i me tog dmar po la// gsang sngags bzlas par
28b3(rgyud): rab bya ste// can dan shing la legs bsregs nas// rgyas par bya ba'i las grub cang // nus pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur// pa la sha yi sheng dag dang // khre dang tsi rtse mo ras ni la// 
28b4(rgyud): kas sngags bzlas pa rab bya ste// pad+ma kA li she la bsreg/ rus pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur// thams cad dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// gre dang sngob 'bras dang ni// bra'o mon sran ti la nag
28b5(rgyud): khang sngags rab tu bzlas bya ste// khe ti ra li shing la bsregs// nus dang ldan de las rnams ni// myur ba nyid du grub par 'gyur// pra hA la che'i shing dag la// lo ma 'bras bur bcas pa dang / 
28b6(rgyud): re shing la sngags bzlas nas// mya ngan ma tshang gi shing la bsreg/ nus pa'i pa ras myed du ni/ marnams thams cad dang du spyad// ldeng ros pad+ma'i rna ba dang // mul pa d+ma'i shing dga' sngags
28b7(rgyud): lugs rab tu ba kres byas nas// chung mi shes 'gre//  'i 'og tu ba pa yis// sa ba dbang du byed pa // ngal shes she dang / kAr 'i bras / 
28b8(rgyud): sang lpags rab tu bzlas byas te// 'dzam bu'i shing la rab bsreg pa ras// ram gri'i 'og tu bcuganas ni// g.yul dbang yang ni dbang du 'gyur// tshe rabs brgyan so pa'i rus// mtshon kyi
29a1(rgyud): / bstan pa'i rus pa dag/ gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas// skyer ba'i me la rab bsregs te// lcags rgya'i 'og tu rab bcug na// glang po dbang du 'du bar
29a2(rgyud): 'gyur// pA le ta dang ha le sha/ ba ti rad d+ha ti/ dur khrod shing la legs bsregs nas// stag la sogs pa dbang du 'du// nus dang 'bras dang sob dang // sman dang rin che
29a3(rgyud): bzhugs pa// klu sha'i stan bcis shar du 'dug// pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcas pa yis// byams pa'i sems kyis dbul bya'o// nid dang rims dang 'brum bu dang // shu ba ga phan pa me dpe lnga dang / 
29a4(rgyud): nad dang gdon ni thams cad brlog/ mtshams med lnga dang mi dge ba'i// 'bras bu sdug bsngal nad rnams zlog/ me'i las bya ba'i la'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas rgyal po'i 'dzi
29a5(rgyud): pal// maN+Dal dkar po legs byas pa// tsan dan dkar po'i dris bsgos te// mchod yon me tog dkar po dang // ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa yis// rgyal po lta bu'i gzugs la
29a6(rgyud): mchod// sdig pa thams cad de mthun sa// bshags nas myur du skyabs spya'o// thog dag gis zhing shun pa// rgyal po drug gi gzugs byas te// yig 'bru lnga po btab pa
29a7(rgyud): yis// tshon sA lnga yis rab tu bcing // byams pa'i sems kyis dra bo la// bskur na rgyal po'i tshad las thar// oM hUM hU~M hrIHaHshon ha ri ma ka to// sa ra sa ra kar ka/ 
29b1(rgyud): swAtA/ gcan gzan 'jigs pa 'ong gA'i tshe// maN+Dal dkar pa legs byas la// me tog dkar po rab tu gtor// mchod pa lnga yis rgyal po mchod// sdig bshags myur du skyabs su
29b2(rgyud): 'bre lnga lnga dang rin chen wa// mtshon sA lnga ye bur ma lnga// byas pa lus la btags pa // gcar gzad 'jigs pa thams cad las// myur ba nyid du grol bar 'gyur// oM A~M Sh+T+r-i dz+dza T+Te/ sho
29b3(rgyud): tar ha te rma ka ro sa rA sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/ chom rkun dag gi 'jigs pa la// me tog sngon po rdo rje can// mthing nags gnon phyag rgya can// mchod gnas bdag nyid skyabs su 'gro/ oM
29b4(rgyud): traka kAr nA kar ba te bas d+heHbi ta pU re ka tsan d+hi ten du ra ta na/ sa rang dka ra ka ra sAt+ma/ sbrul gyi gdug pas 'jigs pa la// bal por 'khrug ma yis// bral bre gzugs kyi DU
29b5(rgyud): rin ched 'byung ldan sngar bsgoms nas// spyi 'or mu ti dbyi dra dang // man shel ba d+ma rA ga dang // i na dr-i nI bdung da yang 'khyil// gdaper dang dngul dang dUng ba dang // na chen brgyad
29b6(rgyud): / ru sha gla tsi tsan dan dang // bas ster ba ut+pal// gur bum dri zhem lus po byug/ oM rat+na saM b+ha ba sa te ba shas ra sa ra ka ra ka ra sA d+ha/ lce 'bab pa yi 'jigs pa la// lcag
29b7(rgyud): garus pa dang // 'khar ba'i byes lcags phye dang // zangs phyer gar phye ma dang // gser gyi phye ma spo ba rig tums// sdang ba mtha' yas skur 'groms te// byams pal phyogs mtshams
29b8(rgyud): bstan// dug rnams sna tshogs dud pas bdugs// oM a mr-i ta ba badz+ra dz+wa la badz+ra dz+wa lo/ gardza garnga/ pa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra sA hA/ me yi 'jigs pa dag la ni// 'brug rus sen ta
30a1(rgyud): // dang // til dang tso tse dang // nas dang gro dang rkun 'thub kyis// zang pom dgal sngags btab ste// me le phyogs su gtor bar bya// oM ba ro tsan sra badz+ra
30a2(rgyud): pA ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra swA hA/ rnam par sdang mdzad par bsgoms te// mal gtor nas ma yis gsod// chu bo dag gis 'jigs pa lnga// mdze can po mo'i blod par ni// ra dang khyed nga
30a3(rgyud): ge khrag/ sa bdag sde brgyad gzugs dang bcas// deng du bcug ste chu bor bar// don yod grub pa'i sku ru bskum// oM a mo g+ha sid d+hi/ oM ka pe tA ra Ni sar sa ra/ ka ra ka ra swA
30a4(rgyud): phyag stong sbyar yang de bzhin te// thugs rje chen po'i sku mchog do// so sor gas pa ning bsgom par bya// so so'i dbusas sum khrims pas kun pa rab // 'jigs
30a5(rgyud): kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'jigs pa kun las yongs su bsrung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // sku gdung me tog dkar po po yichen/ 
30a6(rgyud): dang bcas pa 'am// khru gang tshad kyi mchod rten la// legs par mchod cing bstod par bya// song nyid ye shes las byung ba'i// thugs rje'i gzugs kyi rten du shar// rdzu 'phrul tshad pang
30a7(rgyud): bzhi dang ldan// byang chub phyogs rnams yongs su rdzogs// dri med dung 'dra dkar po ste// rgyal chen ban yang de bzhin no// byang chub chen po'i mchod rten re// khri 'phang bcugs
30a8(rgyud): toka dang ldar// skye ye rom mo char du bab// chos sgra rkyen me 'chad pa'i gter// rin car lnga yi bdag nyid de// phur bus gdab cing yongs su gzung // sangs rgyas kun gyi byin chub
30b1(rgyud): tshe// de la bsod nams bstan pa ni// mtshams med lnga dang me dge bcu// nyon mongs dbang gyur ldog pa rnams// skad cig tsam gyis drag par 'gyur// shin tu gtsang ba'i gnas dag ni/ 
30b2(rgyud): byams dang snying rje can gyis bya// bram ze'i rigs las byung ba yi// 'dra ma khar snying rje can gyis bya// rang sa pa lhag sngag dasang pamis// mdun du 'dar te mchod pa bya// tshad dang 'dog
30b3(rgyud): yongs dag gsal// yid du 'ong ba dag la'o// zas dag yid du 'ong ba'am// dkar gsum 'bag pa spangs pa yis// 
30b4(rgyud): phreng pad+ma'i snying po dang // bi d+hi tse dang mu tig shes// gla la dang sbrid pa mi tshen rnams// nam yang chod par mi bya'o// yo byad dang dam tshig la brten pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// las rnams sna
30b5(rgyud): tshogs sgrub byed na// po ti'am lugs ma ras ris la// brten nas bdag nyid byams sems ldan// muM las 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni// 
30b6(rgyud): mo kru dges bzhugs// bum pa kha dog ser po'i nang // ren chen lnga dang 'bru lngar bcas// tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi re d+hi re/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ en+te baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le bA tsa le/ swa su me ku
30b7(rgyud): ba re/ e'i mi / tsai ti dz+wa lam pa na le swAhA/ lan bdun yongs su bzlas byas na// gti mug thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur// ras ris mchod rten la
30b8(rgyud): das// maN+Dal dri zhim me tog dgram// dkar gsum mngar gsum dag tu ni// 'bras dang til dang yungs kar dang // pad+ma'i rtsa ba dkar po la// ril bu rgya shug 'brul bu tsam// spya na ras
31a1(rgyud): drAd+har+ya/ i ta ba te/ tsal rtsal bri ci ni sras maM bu bu ma a /  dz+waH ya~M ba na ye mA~M rmA/ rim bu dag la sngags btab ste// byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas pa / 
31a2(rgyud): 'dod rmugs na gyur na// rab tu bde bathob par 'gyur// maN+Dal sngon po legs byas nas// uta le sngo dang nim pa dang // a ka ru da tshan dan dang // dri yi chu yisathem pa dadang / 
31a3(rgyud): lu ba / e 'i e la/ tsai ti la mapan me na/ skyes bye blan do yis// bram pa'i rgya pos smras byas na// zhe dang rab tu ni bya nas// bzod pa chen po zab par 'gyur// dag na
31a4(rgyud): ga ta'i por byed pa'i se bcad pa'o// sa// ras sa ma hU~M ga yA na rkyen pa/ 'thong po tshobs yin la/ d+hA me+e/ d+ho d+hi be d+ha rbar+d+harmA/ chen mol pa zhes // 
31a5(rgyud): srung ba julas btags bya // nad dang gdon dang rims dang ni// 'jigs pa'i nad dang gdon las thar// bde'i yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// skud pa dag ni dkar po la// mi dud ba dag der
31a6(rgyud): byi te// dud nas nye su rtsa gcigags// brgya rtsa brgyad du lags pasres nas// bsrung ba'i das pa di byas ni// bsrung ba yi da dam pa 'dis// bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ba'o// mu te kyi
31b1(rgyud): drichen chen gse// gzung cu dum g+ha rtse dang // ag ru dang du rba// zung ma sbe gar gdags par bya'o// bdadan gra ce ku dgas dang // sul nag po rngos pa'i bye// ba ye 'oms rdzas b+h+ya/ 
31b2(rgyud): gnas su dag tu byugs pas ni// gdon dang nad kyis 'jigs kun la// byugs pas de ni bsrung bar 'gyur// bsrung ba 'khor lo'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / ser ba yongs su bsrung ba ni// ser lde
31b3(rgyud): ste ti'i phur bral// gzungs sngags bya mas nas dbus su ne// rdu las byung ba'i sku bskyed do// sngags pazhi bkra bo chen thon// shwar du khams kyisum rnam rgya la ni// sgra mdog dkar po me dpunga' / 
31b4(rgyud): rdodza 'khor lo sdigs mdzub mdzad// oM prad+d+hA rA kr-ita ha na han hUM phaT/ g+ho ru ga shi rdo rje gau she yo na// dmar nag rin chen be tsan 'dod// oM ya mAts+tsha kr-ita te/ Sh+Tha tiHhUM \u0f7f/ rub tu rta mgrin dmar po ni/ 
31b5(rgyud): / me dpung rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin// oM ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ byang phyogs khro gnyer can gyi hUM/ 'tshon 'don napa ma 6sdang sngon ram gri 'dzin pa ste// oM a mo g+ha ka smiM ku ti ban d+hU ba naH
31b6(rgyud): hUM phaT/ phyogs bzhi'i phur bu dag la ni// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// gcan gzan drim yungs kar 'dres// gsang sngags bzlas shing mkha' la gtor// oM badz+ra bo r+tha hu surba mu tiSh+Tha tiH/ bar/ 
31b7(rgyud): dzaM bar prA ha na ha na hUM phaT/ serab bsrung ba'i khye'u skye bcu pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer rab tu bgyi ste/ phyag stong dang spyan stong las 'od zer byung ba 'di lta ste/ dkar po dang / dpar
31b8(rgyud): po dang / nag po dang / ldeng su dang / ser po ste/ 'od zer de dag gis 'gro ba rigs drug po de dag la khyab ste/ dbugs dbyung bar mdzad do// de nas rgyal chan rigs bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 
32a1(rgyud): sa smra sasu sa sa na 'dun ma na do du tshu
32a2(rgyud): chen po dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang 'ad gsapa dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang mi che ba dang / 
32a3(rgyud): bstod pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje'i sku// phyag stong nyon mongs sgrol ba'i phyag/ spyan stong shes rab 'od gsal te// 'gro don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod na
32a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i sku de mi snang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub par gyur to// de nas lha ye bus gsol pa/ 'di yi phan yon ci yin zhes zhus pa
32a5(rgyud): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig rgyud 'di yid byed na// nad dang gdon dang rims dang ni// rgyal pog can dazan 'jigs pa dang // 'jigs pa kun las grel
32a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// 'dod chags ne sdang gti mug dang // mtshams med mi dge'i sdig pa kun// rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur// dmyal ba nang song sdug bsngal dang // de khom brgyad las rnam
32a7(rgyud): krol te// nyan dang 'chad dang bsgom par 'gyur// dri med nam mkha'i dkyil lta bu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyang mthong bar 'gyur// zhes bka' dul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' se
32b1(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasal btud nas legs so lags so zhes bya ba gsungs nas stan la 'khod do// byang chub
32b2(rgyud): sems dpa' 'bum phrag lnga stong dang lha dang mi dang / lA ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud
32b3(rgyud): le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po/ pan Ti ta d+harma shrI me dra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong tshas kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab po// yang zhus/ sum nus/ 
32b4(rgyud): rgyagar skad du/ lo ki shwa ra ka wa/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal
32b5(rgyud): chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten mgon po'i rtog pa ni// mdor bsdus 'dir ni brjod bya ste// sangs rgyas thams cad chung chen po// 'dod pa'i
32b6(rgyud): na kun rab sbyor ba// dang por re shig rig pa 'an pa pa gtsang zhing dben pa ris phyogs su hUM gis dag par byas par nye bar 'dug cing pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa
32b7(rgyud): ba At+ma ko&haM zhes brjod la/ thams cad stong pa'i rnam par bsam par bya'o// de'i rdzas la/ oM tsit+ta pA ti b+h+yo d+hi ka ro mi/ de ltar brjod la sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bsgoms nas/ 
32b8(rgyud): ng+ge'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o// zla ba'i steng du hrIH'i sngags gyur ba las bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu bsgom par bya ste/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa
33a1(rgyud): / phyag gnyis pa/ mdog dbar ba/ mtshan du ne gos dkar mod la 'khrung pa/ pad+ma dmar po kha 'byed cing gar gyi tshul can khab kyi phyag rgyas kha 'byed par bsgom
33a2(rgyud): la/ 'di brjod par bya ste/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po ni// 'dod chags skyon gyis me gos shing // de bzhin sna tshogs bag chags ston// khams gsum rnam par dag pa'o// 
33a3(rgyud): tan la 'od dpag tu med pa bsgom par bya'o// de nus 'dir brjod par bya ste/ oM sarba d+ha thA ga ta kA ya bI ka tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de ltar bsgoms nas phyogs brgya
33a4(rgyud): lha mo rnams bsam mo// oM bai lo ka no/ a ba lo ka ni/ a ba le kA la~M swA hA/ shang kyi 'dab ma le ni rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i m+b+ha mo pad+ma da mar po bsdams pa'o// 
33a5(rgyud): tA tu re swA hA/ lho'i pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma ba la sha'i 'dab ma ste bu'i pad+ma bsdams pa'o// oM thA re Ni ma hA \u0f7fkra par ti ni truM/ nu'i kyi pad+ma la b+ha ri ni zhes bya ba'i
33a6(rgyud): sred pa la sngon po lta bu'i pad+ma phyag ra bsdams pa'o// oM b+h+r-i ku TI tA re tud+d+hA pa ta hUM/ byang gi 'dab mal khro gnyer can zhes bya ba'i lha po pad+ma ser mo bsnams pa'o// oM ma
33a7(rgyud): badz+ra/ 'di ni pang+ge gos car shar phyogs kyi mtshams su ba ni bu'i pad+mo bsdams pa'o// oM bad+hU pa de mthar bad+mo /  sa rtse mtshams sre pa d+ma dkar po ba
33a8(rgyud): oM be shwa pad+me trA~MH'di ni sna tshogs kyi pad+ma ste/ ru 'byod/ kye mtsham su pad+ma nig po bsnams pa'o// oM bai shra ba ga tra~M hUM/ 'di ni sna tshogs kyi zhal can te/ byang phyos
33b1(rgyud): mtshams su su chags pad+ma bsdams pa'// a hrI pad+ma na d+he shwa ra hUM ze 'bru'i dbus su 'dod chags cher po'i bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug go// de ltar gang bsgom pa
33b2(rgyud): dang ldan zhing ting nge 'dzer la goms par byed na dngos grub brtan par 'gyur ro// de'i sangs rgyas nyid dang 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ster ro// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub cing / 
33b3(rgyud): zungs dngas yang de bzhin no// 'jig rten kun gyi bde ston cing // so sorang nyid rjes su sgrub// sangs rgyab nyid de byang sems nyid// rang rgyal nyid kyang de bzhin no// yid 'ong sangs rgyas
33b4(rgyud): yang ni// spyad me dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dang ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar dang rab sbyar te// rdo rje chu dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas kun gyi bcud len lan/ 
33b5(rgyud): sbyor ba bzang po 'di yis ni// bcud kyis len ni bde bar yang // 'grub 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po yi// gzhon zhing nad med dam bde zhing // tshe dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang // skal
33b6(rgyud): zang ye shes bla na med// skye ba 'di la bsgrub pa'o// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang // gsang dang bskyed pa la sogs pa// rengs dang bur bus gdab nyid dang // 
33b7(rgyud): sngam par 'gro ba de bzhin no// sa bcu'i dbang phyug thob 'gyur zhing // ting 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur// de phyir ting 'dzin ldan pa'i// rdo rje dam tshig de yis ri// rig pa dang di bcas pa'i mtsha
33b8(rgyud): ngeg rten mgon por 'grub par gyur// oM lA s+pha rar te sha ra d+ha/ rtsa ba'i sngags 'dibargya rtsa brgyad pa bras na nyin mod rung mi byas pa'i sdig pa nyams par 'gyur ro// yang na
34a1(rgyud): brgya bzlas brjod byas na dang thams cad las gal bar 'gyur ro// yang na stong 'bras brjod byas na dus la yan par 'che ba med par 'gyur ro// yang na stong dag gnyi dz+ra
34a2(rgyud): rjod byas na thams cad kyi mchod pa'i ngas yu // kuzhan yang byung zag ga zum pa zlas brjod ban/  baM bzang 'a// ga yang rab tu 'jol par gyur ro// gzhan pa
34a3(rgyud): bzhi bzlas brjod byas na dbul ba med par 'gyur ro// stong phran lnga bzlas brjod byas na dgra thams cad kyi snying 'khrug par byed do// stong phrag drug bzlas brjod byas na datha thams cad med par shuro// 
34a4(rgyud): rdzun skyes kyi la gru mo//  na du // 'di na ma pa gyur // stong thag dpa
34a5(rgyud): byas na gdod sbyin mo grub par 'gyur ro// the tshe gci bzlas brjod byas da lha dang klu dang / ye'i bu mo/ mal 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong phrag nyi shu bzlas brjod byas bar snang ba 'gro
34a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong phrag sum cu ba zlas brjod byas na bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stong phrag bzhi bcu bzlas brjod byas na mkha' ba spyod
34a7(rgyud): pa'i reg pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// stong phrag lnga bcu bzlas brjod byas nar ba gri'i reg pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// stong phrag drug cu bzlas brjod byas na grub pa'i rig 'dzin du
34a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// stong phrag bdun cu ba zlas brjod byas nas gsum kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// song phrag brgyad su bzlas na 'khor mos skAr pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// 'bum phra
34b1(rgyud): gcig bzlas brjod pas na byang chub sebyas dpa' nyid du 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag bcu bzlas brjod byas na drang dga'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// bzhi na dang bcas pa'i 'bum phrag brgya
34b2(rgyud): 'arjod byas nas sergyas nyid du 'gyur ro// bye bu blag ga cig bya// su brjid byas na thams cad du rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'i dus po can spyad pam gzigs dbang phyug sa thu 'grub par
34b3(rgyud): 'grer zhing lus dang ngag dang 'di kyang min gyis rlob bo// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das gsung rdo rje sa ga sungs pa'o// oM baN+Da ra bsi ni ba ra da t+taM/ 'di ni gos dkar mo'i sngags te lan
34b4(rgyud): cig brjod pas sdig pa'i rigs kyi tshogs bsreg par byed do// nub bdun gyi nang rol du rgyal po chen po dang rtsal ba mdun na 'don dang / skye 'gro'i tshogs dang btsun mo'i tshogs
34b5(rgyud): dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// bzlas pa tsam gyis phyur sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur / ltang 'i ma pas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na gang yang sangs rgyas
34b6(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang nus pa mnyam zhing / dngos su 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur ro// oM bi lo ki ni a ba lo kA la wA hA/ de'i sbyor ba ni stong phrag bcu
34b7(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na me long dang / mtheb chen dang / nam mkha' la sogs pa la gsal por pra dbab pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// pang sngon byung ba dang da ltar dang phyes 'od ba de ston par byed do// yang
34b8(rgyud): naso shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig mngon par sngags par byas pa/ nub mo nyal ba'i dus so shing 'chos nas me smra bar nyal na dgos pa gang yin pa rmi lam na ston par byed do// de yang la
35a1(rgyud): babyed par sman na// A d+da re tut+tAd+d+hAr t+tA ran d+ha/ bcom ldan 'das sgom pa'ang 'a bu ma phrag gtsug bzlas da 'jig rten gsum grub par 'gyur ro// rje'i bu mo dang / kAr
35a2(rgyud): bu bo dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang / mi'i bu mo ste/ 'di rnams kyi nang nas gang 'dod pa de'i chos 'byung du gur kum dang / rgya lcags dang / rang byung gi me tog dang / byang
35a3(rgyud): rAb kye sems dang yang dag par ldan pas rtsibs drug pa shIr tra rdo ba'i 'khor lo dmang po 'khor bzhir ba rnam par bris pa bsams la/ chos 'byung de sgrub pa pas ri sul chu ngogs gas
35a4(rgyud): nga'i gnas su bsam par bya'o// de yang myos shing sgrub pa po'i steng du ltung ba'i rnam pa bsgom par bya'o// de bkug la rangs chu shing nor dang bcas pa de bang du 'gyur bar blta'o zhes
35a5(rgyud): bya'o// yang ra lha dang / klu dang lha ma yin dang / mi 'ami tsi dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'khor los sgyur ba dang / blon po dang / skyes bu 'ab gang 'dod par dmar por rnam par/ 
35a6(rgyud): bsams la/ de'i seng gar rdo rje sngags kyu 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba la drug pa'i lcags byas 'bogs bzhin pa dang / zhags pas/ res bcings la 'gug bzhin pa 'dred pas myos par
35a7(rgyud): rab tu gsal por bsam par bya'o// bdag nyid no dadang bcas pa 'gugs shing dbang du 'gyur ro// zhes bya'o// oM b+hu ri di ya hA tsakra bad+hi ni hrAM/ 'di'i ster ba ri dri chen dang / rdo rje
35a8(rgyud): tshul sogs pas dkyila'akhor byas pa ji ltar rnyed pa'i metog pas mnyam par mchod la/ der gnas pa'i sgrub pa pos gling dam gling gzhan dang / gong khyer dang grong dang / yul pa/ 
35b1(rgyud): rgyam par bas bzhed bzlas pa bya'o// de yas bdag po nyid du 'gyur 'di langs spyod nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba thob par 'gyur ro// oM b+h+r-i kuT+Ti tA re tu ta pa ta
35b2(rgyud): lha go brog nyer can zhes bya ba 'dre ni dgra'i gang rjes kyi rdus blangs pa/ dun de dang / ske tshe dang / khrag dang / chu bo'i 'bra ba gnyis kyi sa dang / dri chen rdo chus bsngam la gzugs parnyed/ 
35b3(rgyud): byas las ru sa nga bzhin gyi phur bus tshigs dang gnad kun la btab la/ thod pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag ste/ dur khrod kyi me la gdung bar bya'o// zhag bdun dri skor ba byas pas 'chi bar
35b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gal te sems la sreg pa med par gyur na zhag nyi 'dum gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ oM ma hA shrI ya ma No bad+meT+Te/ lha mo 'di'i dri dang / me tog dang / mar
35b5(rgyud): me dang / bsod snyobs kyi zas kyis so sar mtshang la bzlas pa byas da thams can du bsrungs par 'gyur ro// dul chos kyi rtsod pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// spyan ras gzugs dbang phyug
35b6(rgyud): dang mnyam par 'gyur ro// nor chen po'i bdag por 'gyur ro// yang na pad+ma stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro// oM badz+ra pad+me shwa ri mar pad+me d+ho/ rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma
35b7(rgyud): 'di yid kyis bzlas na dbang dang dgug pa la sogs pa byed do// smar bduni mngon par sngags te/ gtsug phud bdud na rang bsrung zhing rims dang / lkog rang dang / nad thams cad dang / mtshan
35b8(rgyud): dang / me dang / rkun po dang / seng ge dang / glang po che dang / sbrul dang / 'chang ba dang / rgya mtsho dang / sha ba'i nad stong phrag gcig bzlas pas zhi bar 'gyur ro// mar cig gi las kyis brjed byed kyi gdon/ 
36a1(rgyud): / dang / zad byed dang / skyug pa dang / bri bar dka' ba dang / bsgom par dka' ba'i gdug pa can gyi sems can thams cad nyams par byed do// 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na
36a2(rgyud): lus 'phel neng skal ba bzang ba dang / lus gzhon zheng nad med par byed cing dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba nyams par byed do// yang dkru thag zung du bres la der duka dang / ske tshe dang tshang
36a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg bya'i klu'i ming dang spel bas 'bum phrag gcig skyed sreg byas na char chen po bab nas mu ge med par gyur ro// oM bi shra pad+ma hrIHsna tshogs pad+ma 'dis ni rmongs pa dang / rengs pa
36a4(rgyud): dang / mnan pa dang / phur bus gdab pa dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang / phur bu dang / mig 'phrul dang / ngo mtshar dang mi mthong bar byed pa dang / phug tu 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' la
36a5(rgyud): ba dang / sngags sgrog bcod pa dang / ril por dgug pa gang dang gang yin pa rgyud las bstan pa dang / rgyud gzhan dang yang dag par ldan pa'i las thams cad byed do// lus dang ngag dang 'i
36a6(rgyud): gsum gyi dngos grub ster ro// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa sbyar ras gzigs dbang phyug 'grub cing gang 'dod pa'i las thams cad ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o// oM bi shwa
36a7(rgyud): padwe hUM/ sna tshogs rdo rje zhes brjod pa'i d+ha mo 'dis ni ngag gi dngos grub ster ro// tshig shad mkhan du byed cing gzhan gyi ngag rengs par byed do// rang nyid bsrung ba dang / gzhan yang
36a8(rgyud): srung bar 'gyur ro// rang skal ba bzang zhing gzhan po yang skal ba bzang po'i rang don dang gzhan don byed do// ji ltar 'dir ni 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can
36b1(rgyud): don sngoni brtson pa de bzhin du/ 'dar bcom ldan 'das mas dmyal ba dang ya dgas dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar byed do// bde du
36b2(rgyud): bshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnams lam nyid kyis bsrung ngo zhes thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so// de ltar rtogs pa'i rgyal po bsdus pa rab tu bstan to// sems
36b3(rgyud): brtan rtog pa med pa yi// blo dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig spyod lam bstan pa yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi ji lta bar// de ltar 'dir ni rab sbyar nas// de nas rtag pa'i go 'phang
36b4(rgyud): grub// ji ltar 'dod par gnas byed cing // kun la longs spyod kun byed lhur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i snying rjes spyod// ji ltar dra dad pa'i spyod pa las// 'dug pa'am ni langs kyang rung // 
36b5(rgyud): 'chag pa'am ni gang dang de// rgod pa 'am ni brjod pa 'am// gang de ji bzhin don bzhin no// dkyil 'khor du na ma zhugs pa'am// sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa yang // rang mos lha yi rnal 'byor
36b6(rgyud): bdag/ bsod nams chung ba'am 'grub par 'gyur// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// thams cad mkhas pa nyid dang ni// thams cad rdo rje 'chang nyid kyang // skye ba 'di la 'grub
36b7(rgyud): par 'gyur// yang gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor dag ni gzugs brnyar gyi// bcos ma'i sku las 'gyur ba min// byang chub sems cher la brtson na// rnal 'byor dag ni des
36b8(rgyud): khrag chen po dang ga bur bcas// tsan dan dmar dang bsres pa re// tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa na// kun las mchog gyur bcud dalen no// skor ba bzang po 'di yig ne// 
37a1(rgyud): bcud kyi len ni sla ba ru// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe bzang dang // nadu med bde ba bzang po 'thob// grub pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs// sangs rgyas pa
37a2(rgyud): rol phyin pA dang / gzungs dang sa yang de bzhin 'grub/ bde sngon thams cad thong 'gyur zhing // nga nyid so sor mu 'brug/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid du 'gyur// sangs
37a3(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dngos nyid kyang // sangs rgyas kun ni rab grub 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa byed par 'dod cing sems yongs su dag pa med na de'i tshe thang spu'i sgrub pa bshad de/ 
37a4(rgyud): bsnyen gnas dang ldan zhing sbyang bar gnas pa'i lha bzos chen sngal 'dres pas ras gsar pa de yang rang rang gi kun tu khru ro'i tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyad ras gzigs
37a5(rgyud): dbang phyug bri bar bya ste/ sna tshogs kyi pad+ma 'angab ma brgyad pa/ the 'bru'i dkyil du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das mdog dam ba mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can/ na
37a6(rgyud): gsum ga zhal gyi gtso bo ni dmar ba ste/ 'dod chags chen po nyid kyi phyir ro// g.yas pa gnag brten sdang chen po nyid kyi phyir ro// g.yon pa dkar ba sde gti mug nyid kyi phyir ro// phyag/ 
37a7(rgyud): drug pa bya'o// g.yon pa'i phyag gcig gis gos dkar mo'i mgrin pa nas 'khyud pa dang / bad+mad mar po bsdams pa dang ki pon pa gnyis kyis me tog ge gzhu bsnams pa'o// g.yas pA
37a8(rgyud): sum du khab kyi phyag rgyas pad+ma kha 'byed pa dang / me tog gi mda' dang / lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis gnas pa bya'o// shar gyi 'dab ma la rnam par gzi
37b1(rgyud): 'ag da/  mo// pad+ma par pa dang rda byug na bsdams pa'o// saci'adab la tu sbyin pacu shing gas sa dang pa b+hU kun bsdams pa'o// rlub phyogs kyi 'das
37b2(rgyud): ba b+hu re ne ser mo uta pil sngon po dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// byang phyogs kyi 'da' ba la khro gnyer can ma pad+ma dkar ser lta bu pad+ma ser po dang ram gri phyag ni bsdams pa'o// shar gyi mtshams
37b3(rgyud): pu pad+ma'i gos can ra gser lta bu'i mdog btsod lta bu'i pad+ma bsdams pa'o// lho phyogs kyi mtshams su rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma num mkha'i mdog can dkar po pad+ma dang shel gyi phreng ba bsdams pa'o// 
37b4(rgyud): dub phyogs kyi mtshams su sna tshogs kyi pad+ma ston ka'i zla bi lta bu dkar ser gyi mdog pad+ma nag po dang po ti phyog na bsnams pa'o// byang phyogs kyi mtshams su sna tshogs rdo rje ma sna tshogs kyi mdog can
37b5(rgyud): byas la/ sna tshogs kyi rdo rje dang / sna tshogs kyi pad+ma bsnams pa'o// de ltar pad+mal bkod cing bris la/ sked mo la sogs pa rnams su'o// dzaHthA ba hoH'i yi ge las yang dag par byung ba'i lcags bu dang / zhas
37b6(rgyud): po dang / lcags srog dang / dri du rnams ne shar la soshes pa'i phyogs rnams pa'o// yang zang phyu gnan brjod par byaste/ sbyin ka'i zlabs bu'i dkar ser gyi bcom ldan 'das g.yas na spyad pa dag
37b7(rgyud): ba dang / rtse gsum dang / mchog sbyin pa'i phyag can/ g.yon na pad+ma dang / ril ba skye blugs dang / zhags pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i dam tshig gi po ti bsnams pa'i phyag car/ stag gi bkas pa'i sham
37b8(rgyud): zabs 'chang ba/ sbrul mchod phyir thogs pa/ ral pa'i cod pa ni la 'od pag med ba zhengs pa 'am skyil gung byed pas gnas pa dbu rgyan du byas / de'i g.yas phyogs kyi cha ru thub pa po mchod pon rtse
38a1(rgyud): snod dang bdug spos kyi snod lag pas bzung ba bya'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das phyag gnyis pa re gru 'dzin la gnas shing seng ge'i khrel bzhudas pa/ g.yon pa sal gnas sho
38a2(rgyud): nabs g.yas pi pad+ma'i steng gi gdan steng du bzhugs pa'o// phyag re ren phreng ba bsnams par sems pa bas phreng ba'i 'og tu 'dren pa'i tshul 'dis bsab par bya ba ni sems pa lta bur gnas pa na
38a3(rgyud): bya'o// cho ga gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das dkar zhi dadamar ba phyag bcu pa ri dgas seng ge'i gdan la pad+ma'i steng du skyel bung byed pas bzhugs pa/ g.yas na phreng ba bsdams pa'o// seng ge dang / rma
38a4(rgyud): po che dang / me dang / sbrul gyis 'jigs pa rnams las grol ba'i cha byad can no// g.yon na pad+ma dmar po sdong bu gnyis pa steng du po ti can te rkun ma dang / lcags sgrog gis bcings pa dang / mtsho dang / 
38a5(rgyud): zo chen po dang / sha zas za ba rnams sgrol ba'i cha byad can no// gnas de brgyad du sgrub pa po rgyan thams cad kyis brtan pa/ yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa sngon bzhin du langs pa'am/ 
38a6(rgyud): 'dug pa bsam par bya'o// gzhan yang cho ga ni// ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs kyi gzugs 'charang ba/ dbu bcu gsum pa/ spyi bo'i mgo lnga
38a7(rgyud): hAs// yang zheb sangs rgyas shAb pa'i zhal lo// phyag brgya ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'di ni shes kyi mtshan tshi bsdams pa'o// yang nagapa brgyab phyag stong pa yar bya'o// 
38a8(rgyud): cig tu rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gnas pa 'am/ bzhengs po yang bya'o// tsam pa ka lta bu'i dkar ser gyi bcod ldan 'das so// thang sku dekun gyi g.yas phyogs kyi bar du zlu glang po me
38b1(rgyud): dang/ macod yodan gyi snod dang / gdug sras kyi snod lag pa na gzung bar bya'o// de rnams kyi dbul dab rgyan du 'od dpag med pa'am/ chos kyi rgyal po'i 'chod rten bri bar bya'o// 'di de zang
38b2(rgyud): 'o/ nga cu'i dud dun ba'i sngags de lngapa 'dod pa de bzla zheng bsam gtad yang byas nas/ mchod pa dam pa lngas mchod la/ mchod yon sdod dang / yongs su gang ba'i bdud rtsi lta bu'i
38b3(rgyud): dasgron ma'i zas la byas nas mchod yon byin te/ sngags gang 'dod pa de bzlas pa byas na de la gsungs pa'i dngos grub du 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa ni sngags 'di nyid/ kha cig la ya
38b4(rgyud): be ster ro// blo ldan sems can dor brtson pa'i// sems brtan pa la sbyin par bya// mchod rten las byed nyid la ni// blo ldan bzlas 'ad khyer bas sbyin par bya// rang nyid dang ni no
38b5(rgyud): b+h+ra ma le rtag gus par bya// rdo rje slob dpon rnal 'byor la// mchog tu gyur pa'i yon yang dbul/ gang dang gang de yar dka' bar// / mchog tu gyur par 'dir ni bsngags// rlung
38b6(rgyud): mod nga yang me// bu mo dang de tsham dang// bu mo rgyan kun brgyar par bya// glang chen rta dang shing rta dang // phyugs dang grong khyer rgyal srid dang // rdul 'khor rgyal srad ldar pa dang // rin cher
38b7(rgyud): dka kyang ni// gzhar yang rdo rje slob dpon dbul// de rje slob dpon de gyes gyur pa// thams cad rab ston dbul bar bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog bajogs ste// rgyu gar rtse khan pong
38b8(rgyud): la dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge sreng ba ris bskur cing gtan la phab pa/ yang lus te dag pa dbang rgyal mkhas paso// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sa man+ta b+ha prarA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags
39a1(rgyud): pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
39a2(rgyud): rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i rel/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ 
39a3(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhale'u bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing bdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzegs
39a4(rgyud): dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus ro g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
39a5(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bla ma 'od las blangs pa kun tu babang po'i gzungs yang dag par ston par 'tshal te/ gzungs de thos
39a6(rgyud): mthag tu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams phyir mi ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// las kyi sgrib pa rnams cad kyang sel to// 
39a7(rgyud): longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su 'dzin to// lus rnam par dag pa lang 'thob po// ngag rnam par dag pa yang 'thob po// sems rnam par dag pa yang 'thob po// pha rol tu phyin pa rgya
39a8(rgyud): mtsho thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// gzungs rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'azab po// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad kyang mnyes par babyed do// bcom ldan 'das bdag
39b1(rgyud): sa gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ 'bar ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin
39b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dod kyang thog rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs
39b3(rgyud): pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdog pa mngon sum du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das des na bdag du
39b4(rgyud): ltar dran pa 'di lta bu dang ldan/ blo gros 'di lta bu dang ldan/ chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan zhing / mthong ba dang thos pa dang bsnyen bkur bgyis pa don mchis par gyur te/ bcoMm
39b5(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag thos pa don mches/ gzungs 'di thos pa don mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad cing 'khor bzhi po de yang yongs su dgod du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
39b6(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ sems can dag pa de'i dus la bab par shes na smos shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor bzhi po 'di byin gyis brlabs zin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
39b7(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa stan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gzungs 'di smras so// dkon mchog
39b8(rgyud): kasum la phyag 'a la po// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa snying ji chen po dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tid+yaH/ lag ma lags/ 
40a1(rgyud): par me thA baM/ bai tAM kha ge/ sar sa ngas pa/ sa bud+d+ha.A tISh+Tet+te/ b+hA ra d+hA ra b+ha ra d+ha ma a d+hen+te te/ ka praka la kalA/ sang / a d+hiN+Di/ na mo dA na ba te NAM/ prad+ha ka tar+m+ma/ a teSh+Than du man/ tsa!/ 
40a2(rgyud): sra ba ra sha do A lur babad tsad dan tu/ tad+ya thA/ su re bye su ra b+he/ ma hA su ra b+hi/ mu ni mu re/ ma hA mu ni/ ma te ma ti ma hA ma ti/ na mo rat+na tra yA ga na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA pa/ 
40a3(rgyud): btA sa drA ga/ mat+ma kA ru Ne kA pa/ sa mr-i dAn du mAn/ sa man+ta b+ha dra d+ha ra NI swAt+ma/ gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis dpa' bar 'gre
40a4(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag ni gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to// gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di lags te/ nang par langs nas la brgya rtsa brgyad
40a5(rgyud): zlas brjod pagyi'o// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod pakyis na 'phags pa spyan ras dri zegs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro// phongs par gyur pa'i tshe lan brdar led la bgyes rwa
40a6(rgyud): ra bar 'gyur ro// rims nad thams cad la rnga bar babras brjod bgyi'o// rlung gis zin na mar dang 'bru mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te bsku bar bskye
40a7(rgyud): sonan so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te bca' bar babye'o// na ba nan ras bal gyi sa bor 'bru mar dang lhan cog tu bskol ba la lar bdud po zlas brjod
40b1(rgyud): bgyis te/ dus kyi srid kyisan bar thugs par bgyi'o// glad pa na bal 'bru mar ro// lto ba lnga byab par bgyi'o// gdon gyis btab pa la tshon srung sa lul par brgya rtsa brgyad dbus te mgum
40b2(rgyud): du gdags so// mkhri' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis btab 'bru mar la lan dadur bzlas te zhe shes thams cad du byug go// nad thams cad la byab par bgyi'o// 'di ni rtsub pa'amachis pa'i chogago// 
40b3(rgyud): de kyis nga rgyas da byang chub sems dpa'i mthong ba dang / gzungs dang / ting 'dzir 'thob pa dang / rdu 'phrul kyi 'gro dag me snang byar bkyi dang len ba dang / rdzangs so// 
40b4(rgyud): sgrub par 'tshal na/ des sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ bum pa gang brgya brgyad gzhags
40b5(rgyud): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bres te/ me tog sna tshogs kyis chal par bkang ba tsar dran dang / a gA ru dang / kun du ru'i bdug pas bdugs te/ mar le brgya rtsa brgyad bud cir mchod pa
40b6(rgyud): chen po bgyis te/ tshangs par spyod pa gtsang bas gos gtsang mi bgos la gzungs kyi gas sngags 'di dag gis mtshams gcad par bgyi'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ 
40b7(rgyud): d+hesA hA ya/ ma hA sA tA ya/ ma hA rA ru Ni kA yA tad+ya thA/ ti le b+han d+ha me/ me le b+hAn d+ha me/ tse le mi le/ b+han d+ha me/ sI mi thAn d+ha me/ bdag gi mtshams las su lang 'da' bar mgyur cig swAhA/ chul
40b8(rgyud): denyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bkrus te phyogs bcur mtshams gcad par bkye'o// gang gis 'gug par 'gyur ba'i gzungs 'di dag kyang thog par brjod par bya'o// ra oM rat+na tra yA ya/ ra mo
41a1(rgyud): / 'a / bac+doMs rnags sa twA gas+'u k+Sh+ma ru/ b+h+yarmA / chom ma/ ts+tsha / e he b+haka ta/ AH / 
41a2(rgyud): re bdag gi snying po bshad pa ste/ des bdag 'gug par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu zla ba yar kye ngos tshes brgyad nas bzung ste nya'i bar du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pa kyis te dus gsum
41a3(rgyud): bzlas brjod pa kyi dus gsum du khrus bkye dus gsum du gos brje bar bkye'o// de nas chos bcwa lnga la mchod pa chen po bgyis te/ bzlas brjod dpag tu ma mchis par bgyi'o// 'od
41a4(rgyud): dbA kyi kung thun la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi kha dog gi lus dang ldan pa/ mtshar dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyar pa/ lus las 'od zer bye ba
41a5(rgyud): byin cing mchi bar 'gyur ro// dri la rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi zhing brtan par bgyis na mthong ma thag tu sa thob par 'gyur ro// gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par
41a6(rgyud): gyur ro// shar phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// lho phyogs su rin chen tog dang / nub phyogs su 'od dpag med dang / byang phyogs su de bzhin ga
41a7(rgyud): ji sra mthong bar 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rags pa'i tshul gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos na
41a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par bgyid par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas
41b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas gtsang ba'i ras kyi lnga'i bu rnams dang / thams cad dang
41b2(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / me dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rte ye rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa kun tu bzang / 
41b3(rgyud): po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na me tra dang / dAne shI la dang / zha chen gyi lo sgrib par de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos rwa
41b4(rgyud): gtar la phrab pa// rgya keraska/  du/ Ar+tha nI la kaN+Da nA ma d+hA raN+De/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rI la kaN+Da zhes bya ba'i gzungs dkon mo chog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
41b5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med pa phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpar sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la
41b6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par shes rab chen po'i mig thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras
41b7(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zu
41b8(rgyud): rje cad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du thabs la mkhas pa thob par gyur cig / btsun pa rgya ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 
42a1(rgyud): / bdu kun du shes rab chen po 'gyur rnags par gyur // bcur bstan sa gzugs dbyung phyug+sab+h+ya/ na khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdan
42a2(rgyud): nges par myur du sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
42a3(rgyud): dang ldan zhing lam myur du thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du mya ngan las 'das pa'i ri la 'dzeg
42a4(rgyud): bar gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyiche du 'dug par gyur cig/ btsun pa
42a5(rgyud): spyan rab gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du chos kyi sku dang gcig par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag rang kri'i ri la mchi ba na ral gri'i ri
42a6(rgyud): rang snyil zhing zhig par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag me ma mur gyi nang du mchi ba na me ma mur de rang med par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag sems can dmyal ba'i lam du mchi ba na sems
42a7(rgyud): tan dmyal ba rnams rang bzhin gyis stong par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mche ba na/ yi dgus rnams rang tshim par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag lham
42a8(rgyud): yin gyi gnas su mchi ba nad dag gi sems rang dul ba gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag dud 'gro rnams su bachi ba na de dag ye shes chen po rang thob par gyur cig/ na mo nga
42b1(rgyud): yA yA/ na mo Ar+yA a ba la ki te shwa rA ya/ bar+b+ha satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA k+Sha ru Ne kA ya/ sarba bar+d+han/ nA dan kA rA ya/ sarba b+ha sa mu drong / cho Sha Na ka tA ya/ sarba b+hUd+d+hi pra sha ma na kA rA pa/ 
42b2(rgyud): sarba id+h+ya ba tra ba/ bi dA sha na ka rA ya/ sarba b+ha lISh+Ta tweN+Da ya/ ta s+yan ma skr-it+ma/ a daM Ad+ya a ba lo ke tI shwa rA ya/ te ba nA la kAN+Tha T+Ta/ nam pa ra ba hri da yaM/ A bar+d+ha yeSh+TA ma~M/ sarba ar+thasA d+ha nA na/ 
42b3(rgyud): shu ba na a dze yan/ sarba bud+d+ha naM/ b+ha ba mA ra ga bi sho d+ha ka/ tad+ya thA/ A le kaM/ A lo ke/ A lo ka/ a d+hi pa tI/ lo ka ti/ kA na ti/ h+ni h+ni/ ha re ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he he/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ te pri ya bo d+hi satwa/ 
42b4(rgyud): te ma hA kA ru Ni ka ku ru ku ts+yai/ karma sA d+ha ya/ sA d+ha ga/ be d+hA na/ da~M ti daM ti/ me ra k+Sha me ga ga bi ta dag ma/ sid+d+hi laH/ shwa ra d+hi dur+m+ma ru/ bdun ti/ d+ha rad+ha ra/ d+h+wa ra Ni shwa ra tsa la tsa la/ bi mA la mU d+he/ 
42b5(rgyud): Ar+yA a ba lo ke te shwa ra/ kr-iSh+Na dzi na/ dza Tu mu ku r+ra/ a lang kr-i ta/ sha rI ra la ma b+ha/ pra lam b+ha/ ma hA sid+d+ha bi d+hA d+ha ra/ ba la bi la/ ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la ma hA ma la/ tsa la tsa la ma hA tsA ya/ kr-iSh+Na bar+No/ kr-iSh+Na
42b6(rgyud): 'ak+Sha di rga ta na/ te bad+ba ta sta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ni sha tsa re shwa ra kr-iSh+Ta sarba kr-id ta yadz+nyo/ ba bI ta/ e byi ti/ ma hA bi ra/ mi hA ba ra/ he mu khA tri Tu ra/ da ha ne shwa ra/ nA ra ya NA/ rU ba pa la be ga d+ha ri/ hi nI la ka NAM/ e h+ye
42b7(rgyud): rat+pa la/ bi di dza tra/ loka s+ya rA ga bi/ khi n+ya shan/ dr-I khi khi nA sha na/ yo pa 'a be R+sha sha na/ tu lu du lu/ ma hA ng+ya sa tarme/ ma ta bang mang+gA gas ngas pa/ si ris rau/ su ru Nud+ha/ prad+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bo d+hi ya bo d+ha ya/ 
42b8(rgyud): d+hi yo ma ta dI la kaN+Da/ e d+hiti/ bA ma d+ha/ ma hA sa d+ha s+yaka ta sa has/ runy+dza kuT+Ta/ ma ta Ta/ ta rga sa pa/ ma h+yen ma hA sa~M// yog kA ra/ b+han \u0f7fNa/ bA tsaH/ sAR+sha ya sA d+ha la/ bi d+yAn/ sgo sma ra ta thA ga pa taH

43b4(rgyud): dka mas bod+d+ho bi de sha ka ra/ bi rim shAn+teka ra/ 'ang+kang+ga bud d+ha/ b+ho d+ha la la te/ thA ga b+h+r-i ha la b+h+re ga san ba h+lad la/ sa brgya la~M/ dzA li khA ng+ga yad/ mi hA roH/ man+dAn/ ra NA rak+Sha/ At+maswA ta dran/

43b7(rgyud): saH/ ridz+dzing+ga/ NeH/ sarbar+b+bayaM b+h+yaHsarbAr+the/ ra9k+Sha/ m+b+hi Sh+Tang+ka// d+ham mi g+na/ t+tataM/ tsig me shi r+g+ho ku \u0f7f/ Ta/ dAs b+hI ba yA/  ma pa/ mdzad / b+h+yapaH
43b8(rgyud): pa paH gr-i ni d+hu na/ tA sha d+ha ka~M rA la pa sha par duSh+Ta bib+hA ba~M nA m+ba mas rA me paT/ sas gra ha d+hA d+hun ko rlol paT/ sapa kr-i nga a br-iti dkal pha/ bya rna ya ba Ta/ mi ke ce ma
44a1(rgyud): yaha tiShe ma/ ka ye ma / bdu / yan du/ dzu dran ti kun d+hi ta nas rgan par mi len/ bi k+sha ta ya phaT na mdus rbadut+ta gr-itang+ka d+han ya/ ta lak+sha bA ya/ sid+h+yanra/ mar+tha rA / 
44a2(rgyud): AH/ i arbA d+harmAk+Sha.a hU~M pA hA/  la wA/ de yinas m+b+ha/ na byas nas d+han+te se d+d+haH/ man+tha de sa nan/ rimigs
44a3(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// bres so// yang 'as ce kyeg/ rgya gar skad du/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka nA ma A d+ya e la ka ti shwa ra d+ha dza NI a nu sha nas sa hi ta su tra ta saM kra hi ta/ bad
44a4(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zugs rje chen pa'i g.yas phan pa na mdor bsdus pa nas b+ha ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
44a5(rgyud): dbadag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri bo pe ta la spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa'i 'khor gyis bskor nas/ 
44a6(rgyud): tshe 'phags pa spyan dus gzigs dbang klag sman las langs nas thil ba skyeng zhing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsam to// ngal 'di lta bu'i gzungs yong meng ni thugs rje chen byin
44a7(rgyud): sems can kun gyi mi dge ba'i sdig pa shin du lci ba'i sgrib pa bdud dang sgrib po 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa 'dod pa thams cad rab tu tshim par byed pa'i phyir ngas bshad do// bcom
44a8(rgyud): ldan 'das la bshad pa'i gnang ba zhus nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu khyod kyis thugs rje chen po'i ske nas gzungs bshad par 'dod pa'i dus la bab bo// myur ba
44b1(rgyud): bshad du gsol/ nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rjes su yi rang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
44b2(rgyud): gsol to// gal te dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma 'am/ khye'u 'am bu mo 'don pa dang 'tshong bar 'dod pas sems can thams cad kyi ched du thugs rje chen po
44b3(rgyud): gonas thog mar 'di lta bu yaM sems bskyed par bya'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gi chos rnams thams cad myur du rtogs par shog/ spyan pa
44b4(rgyud): thigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis ye shes mig ni myur du thob par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis sems can bam
44b5(rgyud): cad myur du spong bar shoka/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis thab so mkhas pa dag myur du thong bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'a
44b6(rgyud): lo bdag ni myung du shes rab klu yis sgrol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dag ni myur du ldog bsngal mtsho las 'da' bar shoka/ spyan
44b7(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdog ni myur du tshul khrims rkang gi lam thob shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni myur du
44b8(rgyud): mya ngan 'da' ba'i ri 'dzeg shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje rtsal phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni myur du 'dus ma byas kyi gyi mkhyen sheg/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs
45a1(rgyud): / rje che ba phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni bar du chos nyid sku dang mtshungs par shog/ bdag ni ral gri'i ri 'dzeg na// ral gri'i ri ni rang snyil shog/ bdag ni chu tshan 'phrang gyur na// chu tshan
45a2(rgyud): re mur rang zhir shog/ sems can dmyal bar bdag sod na/ sems can dmyal ba rang skams shoH/ bdag ni yi dgas gnas song na// bkres skom dag ni 'grangs par shog/ bdag
45a3(rgyud): delha min kanas song na// ngan sems rang nyid dul bar shog/ bdag ni dud 'gro'i gnas song na// rang nyid shes rab cha thob shoka/ de skad du smon lam btab nas sems rtse gcig tu bdag gi ming
45a4(rgyud): nas 'don cing rjes su dran par bgyi'o// gzhan yang bdag gi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi mtshan 'don cing / de nas gzungs 'di lan cig gam/ lan bdun gyi bar du bton na/ 
45a5(rgyud): bskul ba 'bum phrag brgya stong ji snyed 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i kha na mtho ba'i lci ba rnams bsal cing 'byang bar 'gyur lags so// gal te thugs rje chen po 'di 'don cing 'chang na 'chi ba'i du
45a6(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams der gshegs nas phyag rkyong bar 'gyur bas bsam pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi nang gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'a
45a7(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can gangal la zhig thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal tor nu song gsam po dag tu ltung bar gyur/ 
45a8(rgyud): na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs pa cang rtsa bar mi bgyi'o// thugs rjeche po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te ting nge 'dzin dang 'phos pa tshad med pa rdzi srid
45b1(rgyud): pho par 'gyur na bdag nas yang bdod par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar me ba gyi'o thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags de 'don cing yong su 'dzin pa dag gal te 'di nyid la smon pa thams cad ci ltar smon pa bzhin du grub par mgur na thus
45b2(rgyud): chen po'i sems mi gsung zhes mi bkyi lags te mi dge ba rnams dang sems rtsegacig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs ma ga so bud med gapa la la ni ga bud med kyi lus las phongasu sgronas skyes pa'i lus thob par 'tshal ba gang lags pa
45b3(rgyud): des thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs kyi tshig 'di 'don cing yongs su gzung bas gal te bud med kyi lus pas yongs su gyur te skyes pa'i lus thob par ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar me bgyi'o// the tsom gyi
45b4(rgyud): bsam bcung ba cig bskyed par gyur na gdon mi ra bar gang smon pa'i 'bras bu de mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so/ desad ces smras nas 'khor 'dus pa'i mdun du tha yor te/ drang por 'dug nas sems can rnams
45b5(rgyud): la thugs rje chen po'i sems bskyed de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi nom pa 'di dag smras so// snying po ni/ oM ma
45b6(rgyud): pad me hA/ gzungs ni/ na ma rat+na tra yA ya/ nA mo Ar+ya a ba lo ka te shA rA ya/ bo d+has twA ya/ ma dA pa trA ya/ mahA ThA ru/ kA ya tad+ya thA/ oM sarba ban+d+han/ ts+tshed naka rA yA/ sarba pA pa si mu dra ustaudaNaka rA ga/ sarba/ 
45b7(rgyud): d+he pra sha man kA dA ya/ sarba sI d+hI u 'a dra la bi nA sha na ka rA ga/ sarba bA weShu tra rdza ya/ ta s+yen pa s+thi tA oM daM Ar+ya a wA la ka ti shwa ra ta la mI Sh+ThakaHnI ma hr-i ye/ a wa rata yi d+hu mi sarba anas d+han/ prad+d+hA
45b8(rgyud): na/ sarbatwA nA~M/ pA ba mAn be sha d+ha ka/ tad+ya hA/ a wa la ka le ka ma ti/ lo ka ka te/ e h+ye/ ma hA tsa d+has rbA/ he bo d+hi satwA/ he ma hA ba d+hi satwA/ he pri la mo d+hi satwA/ he kA ru Ni kAs+phA ra hri dag/ 
46a1(rgyud): rkyeto/ Ad+yas rnamag rnab / ba ru ru/ kum sa sna ga nyi ma ma dan tog seM ma kI ny+dzar/ 
46a2(rgyud): hA sid d+ha/ shud d+ha d+ha ra/ ba la ba la/ ma hA bA la/ ma la ma la ma hA ma la/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ma hA dz+wa la/ kr-iSh+Na bak+Sha pr-iSh+Ta war+Na/ kr-iSh+Na pA shra/ nid+hA tAn/ he pad+ma hasta/ dza ya ka ra Ni shA tsa re shwa ra/ kr-iSh+Na
46a3(rgyud): sarba kr-i ta ya dz+nyo pa e ta/ e h+ye hi bA rA ha mu kha tri pu ra/ da ha nI shwa ra na rA ya/ Na ba la ru ba ge dza d+ha ri/ he nI la kaN+Da/ ho ma hA ha lU ha la/ bi Sha nir dI ti lo ka s+ya/ rA ga bi Sha nA sha na/ dwe Sha bi Sha rA sha na/ mau ha
46a4(rgyud): biSha rA shwa na/ nair mak+Sha Na/ hu lu hu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ mu hu lu mu hu lu/ pA la hA la/ ma hA pad+ma na bA/ sa ra su ra/ si rI si raM/ su ru su ru/ bud d+h+ya bud d+ha/ bo d+ha ya bo d+hA ya/ be d+ha yA/ mi tA ba nA la
46a5(rgyud): kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi nA la kar+N+Na/ e d+h+ye hi ba ma skr-i ta/ sa~Mt+taM mu la hra saha sa muny+dza muny+tsa/ ma hA an+d+ran+d+ra ha swa ni ra nA di ni/ e h+ye hi b+ho b+ho ma hA sod d+ha mo si shwA ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha wa tsaM sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bid+ha smar
46a6(rgyud): sA rat+naM/ he b+ha ga wan/ lo ka be lo ka s+t+wa~M/ ta tha bi tA dA dI hi me dar sha na~M/ pra sA d+ha ya mi swA hI/ sid d+hA ya swA hA/ ma hA sid d+hA ya swA hA/ sid d+ha yo gi shI rA ya swA hA/ nI la kA NA ya swA hI/ bA
46a7(rgyud): dIn k+Sha ba swA hA/ sid d+ha pra ShA ya~M skr-ihA/ masmin me ya?r+tha ya pA hI/ med d+hi d+had+ha pA Sh+T+rIH/ pad+ma ng+ka sA ye swA t+ma/ ma hI bad+yA ta sA ya swA hA/ bad+ma dwa pA 'aM k+She hrI/ ma bI badz+rad snre
46b1(rgyud): ts+tsha gau t+yA swA / nasasam /  sbyi nA~M/ spyan swA/ sgyu
46b2(rgyud): AH N+Di shrI rA / bi dz+haiMsatwA grAm hA sad+d+hi/  ts+tshan+da ninA / na mas dpa' sbyin ris gi legs phyug gis ga zungs
46b3(rgyud): nanas// gsus 'di don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gi ched du/ gnod pa nga bgags yongs su bsil bu'i phyir/ shin du ba'i chogasu brgyad pa 'di dag smras sa// gang zhig da 'jug
46b4(rgyud): song ba las// stag dang skang ga gcan branag tu ma pa dang / rtsangs pa skus dang 'dres na phrad kur kyang / gzungs 'di 'don pa zos nas gnod mi nus// gang zhig mu ba rgya mi tshir rmugs pa las// gdug pa'i
46b5(rgyud): klad rtswa sbyin ma mus dang // gnad sbyin sran po nya dang dus la dag/ ga zungs 'di 'don cing bris nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyur// gang na gag khrul ska dang thams bsor ba'ang// chomarkun ma tsha sa no
46b6(rgyud): 'phrog pa'i tshe// rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs brnyas na// de dag brje sems skyes nas ldog par 'gyur// gang zhig rgyal po'i gyong la thogs pa dang // lcags skrag kho'i sbrel ba can drang
46b7(rgyud): rgya sa gcig zugs chen po'i gsus pa zlasan/ rgyam pa'i kyi sems kyis ni gtong bar 'gyur/ gang sheg kyang rnams dug ma'i khyi zhugs te/ khas gam dug can gyi
47a1(rgyud): ni bsod pa'i tshe// rje gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// dug ni zil dang razas skom nyid du 'gyur// bud med sum mthu ni btsa' ba'i tshe// bdud kyis bas
47a2(rgyud): byas sdug bsngal mi bzod tshe// rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// 'dra gdon byer nas bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur// klu gdod gtum pos gdug pa'i dbugs
47a3(rgyud): btang bas/ tsha ba'i nad kyis nyen nas 'chir nye tshe// rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// rims na dbasal nas che nor bar 'gyur// ku gdon chubs gtses te sbyangs
47a4(rgyud): pab dang // shu 'bras mi bzad rnag khrag 'dzag pa'i tshe// rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// mchil malan gsum byugs pas skrangs pa zhi// sems can rnyog pa mid
47a5(rgyud): slo bas na// byang stems sngags dang dgras ni gtses pa'i tshe// rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// byad stems gdon de gtong ba'i mi lo 'dud// sdug 'phel snyigs mngam
47a6(rgyud): sa 'jig pa'i tshe// 'dod pa'i me mched sems ni rmongs log pas// khyo shug so sor gzhan la 'dod zhen nas// nyon mtshan log bsam rgyun ni mi 'chad tshe// gang zhig thugs rje chen po'i
47a7(rgyud): zungs bzlas na// 'dod pa'i me zhig log pa'i sems bsal 'gyur// bdag gi gzungs 'di mthu stabs rgyas brjod na// bskal par brjod kyang mthar thug yid mi 'gyur// gal te
47a8(rgyud): thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag chung klung ngam rgya mtshor zhugs te khrus byas pa las/ de na gnas pa'i sems can de dang de dag gi lus bkrus pa'i chus
47b1(rgyud): lus la reg par gyur na sdig pa'i las dang / kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba thams cad yongs su byang nas ning yongs su dag pa gzhan dag tu pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur bas mang ba dang / dred gsher da/ 
47b2(rgyud): stong las skyes pa'i lus len par mi 'gyur na/ kha ton du 'don pa dang 'chang ba la lta smos kyang ci dgos// gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dog lam du zhugs nas 'gro ba'i tshe rlung chen
47b3(rgyud): langs te gang bag de'i lus dang / sa dang sgra dang / gsal bus pa'i rlung gang yin pa de'i phyogs su sa pa'i sems can gnan gyi lus la reg par gyur na/ de dag gi sgrib pa dang / sngon po'il
47b4(rgyud): skye ba thams cad ma lus par yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur bas yang ngani 'gro gsum pa dag gi rnam par smin pa myong bar mi 'gyur zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur pas na 'don pa
47b5(rgyud): ga yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gis thob pa'i phan yon ni bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzugs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po'i gzungs/ phan yan dang bcas pa
47b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i mad las btus pa rdzogs so// dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsnung ba'o// gas chud 'gram 'dug kyi te rgya la// rgyag skad / Ar+yA ba la ki te shwa ra nA ma sha ta ASh+Ta/ bad skad du/ 
47b7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
47b8(rgyud): ma than 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ pho drang re bo ta la'i rtse po na/ me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis dgram pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling gser gyi mdog 'dra ba na/ rin pa
48a1(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis kun tu 'bar ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/ de na lha dang dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / dri za dang lda ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldin dang / mi 'am ci dang / 
48a2(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis mchod cing bkur sti byas te/ thog mar dge ga bar du dge la tha mar dge
48a3(rgyud): gad na bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag ga yongs su byangag tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pas
48a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/ kye kye sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// bya ba byas shing byed pa byas// khur bor bdag
48a5(rgyud): don rjes su rnyed// dri ba sbyor ba yongs su zad// yang dag bka' la rnam grol sems// shes rab shin du rnam par grol// glu chen po ni cang shes po// sems la dbang sgyur thams cad kyi// 
48a6(rgyud): chog tu pha ral phyin pa tho'o// ye shes tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs// srid pa'i dgon pa rab tu brgal// gzhan la phan pa mdzad la brtson// thugs rje dang ni 'brel ba'i thugs// skye dgu kun la
48a7(rgyud): rab tu bya bas// dge ba rab brtson byams las byung // mtha' yas sems can sgrol la mkhas// bde bar gshegs pa nyid las skyes// khams gsum gyi ni gnyen gcig go// 'dod
48a8(rgyud): chags ni sdang gti mug med// dri ma gsum ni rab tu spangs// rig pa gsum gyi phar la phyin/ mngon par shes pa drug kyang brnyes/ n+ya br-i gra d+ha lta bur zlum// skyes chu chen po'i mtshan rnams/ 
48b1(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus kyang // sku ni rnam pa kun du brgyan// sku mdog gser gyi kha dog 'dra// sku tshad che zhing skar sham po// nag ge sar gzhon nu
48b2(rgyud): ltar// cung zad rab tu dmar ba'i mdog/ dbu yi thor tshugs dag dang ldan// tho tshugs mang pa nye bar g.yegs// dbu la 'do dpag med pa bzhugs// 'od zer dag ni rnam par 'phro// 'dom gang
48b3(rgyud): da ni rab tu 'bar// gser gyi ri 'dra grags pas khya ba// gzi brjid dag kyang rab tu che// shar gyi ri la 'char ba la// nyi ma'i gtsug hor dang ldang ldan// nor bu ran chen 'bar ba yis/ 
48b4(rgyud): se ral khas ri sku phyed brgya/ dag la na rab tu mkhas// pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams spyod// tshul khrims bshams ral ba med// 'thang gseng+ge 'byong ba 'dra// sku ni 'jam ning ldem bag
48b5(rgyud): gzigs shing gshegs pas rgyu mchog 'dra// g.yas su 'khyil pa'i dung yang 'dra// dpral ba zla ba rgya pa 'dra// dpral ba'i dbyings ni rgya yang che// smin 'tshams par yang yongs ma char
48b6(rgyud): sman ni nor bu rin chen 'bar// shangs kyi dbyings ni cung bdam mo// tshems kyi smos kyis rnam par gnon// ljags kyis stong gsum khebs mdzad cing // snyan gyi khungs yang rab tu zab// mgu
48b7(rgyud): yang bum pa'i mkhyen pa 'dra// dpung pa dag kyang rab tu zlum// phyag sor rnams kyi chags kyang ring // sen ma 'jam ning cung zad dmar// phyug sor rnams kyi bar yang 'brel// phyag dang nabs kyamaH
48b8(rgyud): rnams la// 'khor lo dag gis rab tu brgyan// ston pa'i bad+ma 'dra bar mdzes// sku mdog/ 'jam zhing sha yang rgyas// gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs ltar za ba/ yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur// 
49a1(rgyud): bstan sdug ma ngas dga'/ rnams byung ba dz+ral ba dag/  ng+ya ga las kun du skyes// d+ma dag zhagadunas bzhugs// phyugan 'a bang po bsnams/ sa / 
49a2(rgyud): blugs rgya gang bsdams/ kr-iSh+Na sA re'i pags pa bsnams// dbyug pa dang ni bgrang phreng 'jon/ bkra shis dag ni gtsang mar 'gyur// mda' nas gsung zhing gi song por sla// bdud
49a3(rgyud): 'i char ni rab tu 'bebs// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen ltar// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// bzang por sdang ba'i lho ni sher ltar// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsos
49a4(rgyud): su gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa lags// bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin// ba spr-i nyag ma re re yang // sems can kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur// bsod nam
49a5(rgyud): mdzad cing dge ba mdzad// bshol ba med cing nges pa ste// rab tu grags pa'i brtson 'grus can// 'khor ba dag las kun tu brgal// dam chos rgyal tshab mnga' gsol ba// 
49a6(rgyud): yid bzhin 'khor lo bde bskor// don yod zhags pas nyon mongs 'dren// 'phags pa rta mgrin bdud bzhi 'joms// kro d+ha mgrin sngon gdug pa sel// chu srin 'dzin khri 'jigs
49a7(rgyud): las skyel// lha la so marjes su 'a9 // wa gnyer can ni bka' bzhin kyang// rgyal btsun ni tshul dang ldan// mthu chen ldan ning dran dang ldan// yon tan ldan ning b+ha
49a8(rgyud): ra shi dang lad na// rgyal khrims ldan ning ngan dang ldan// don nam kun gyi rig po 'o// ji tsa ma thams cad gcid pa'o// ches rnams thams cad sgrub pa// 'jig rte/ 
49b1(rgyud): kun gyi ston pa pa/ zhal bzang zla ba nya ba 'dra// sku smad rin chen kun gyis brgyan// gser gyi mchod sdong 'ang bar gnas// 'od zer nyi ma stong pas lhag// tshangs la sogs pas phyag
49b2(rgyud): bkye sa pa'o// 'jig rten bkon la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa byas pa de'i mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i
49b3(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jug par 'gyur ro// sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// bskal ba stong du bsags kyang ni mi 'tsha
49b4(rgyud): mnar med par me lcang su zheg nang par langs nas/ klog gam klog du 'jug pa dang / kha ton du byed pa de'i lus la mdze dang shu ba dang glon pa dang dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa nad rngams/ 
49b5(rgyud): dang bral bar 'gyur ro// skyes so cog tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// lha'i sras po dang 'dra'o// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// gar skyes gang gnas kyang
49b6(rgyud): 'phags pa sman ras gi pogs dbang phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro// gtsug lag thams cad la
49b7(rgyud): mkhas par 'gyur ro// bstod pa 'dis bstod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gti'i klung gi bye ba 'bum phrag drug tu rtsa gnyis spyod 'tshod par 'gyur te/ rnam par smin pa 'dra bas na kye
49b8(rgyud): zag med do// rgyal ba thams cad kyi rang bsrel bam tog ces bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzugs dbang phyug go ma can brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// / rgya ga skad du/ 
50b1(rgyud): chas bcwa lnga la tsa n+dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor byas la/ a ru bsregs nas bzlas brjod byas na 'i 'og tu gsar thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa gnod 'dzin chu dbang
50b2(rgyud): rje can gyi gzungs bde byed ces bya ba rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga wa tAM aR+Ya at+pa li nA mA bI d+hA rA / bod skad du/ bklags pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags
50b3(rgyud): ma sor mor na zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar che sa la dge slong rnams ri dri rgyal na gnas te de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang de na bzhus
50b4(rgyud): te/ des bdag la smras pa/ bu sngags kyi tshig 'di nyon cig/ klu'i dbang po rnams kyi dug meng par byed/ sbrul gyi dug med par byed/ g.yogs rnams dang srin po dang / 'byung po dang / 
50b5(rgyud): rnams dang / sems can stobs po che rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / sems can phra mo rnams dang / 'phra men pa dang / 'phra mar ma dang chu
50b6(rgyud): kyis de ltar sngags kyi tshig drag shul chen po e gu l+le yang dag par nos na sngags kyi gtso bo sums can gdug pa rab tu 'jil bar byed pa ste/ sngags can gang gis de shes na
50b7(rgyud): rnams kyi gdug pa yang dag par med par byed do// oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti Ar+ya aM gu li/ tad+ya thA/ oM klu'am/ klu mo 'am/ sbrul lam/ sprul mo'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ 'byung
50b8(rgyud): pa'am/ 'thung ma'am/ phra men pa'am/ phram na pa'am/ gdug pas ben pa'am/ gdug pas me rin po yang rung ste/ pha pha Ta/ har ha nyare/ rang ra/ ba sha~M Te/ nA gar/ sau dwe re re ha yan po//

52b3(rgyud): bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs tshe rabs su yang pad+ma'i rigs chen por skye bar 'gyur ro// skye bo khyad du 'phags pas bkur bar 'gyur ro// me to/

53a1(rgyud): bskus la/ dkyil 'khar de dang bcom ldan 'das pa me tog sna tshogs gtar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri napa

53a3(rgyud): byed pa yang sdig pa byang zhing / shin du yongs su dag pa'i sems kyi chud dang ldan pa dang / shin du yongs su dge ba'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/

55b5(rgyud): 'og 'ar snying gi klu dang lbal sogs pas bAs da ma snyam na su btung ba'i snong bram ze'i bod pa lab nA thogs/ tri shul rtse gsum pa lag na thogs/ sang+ge dkar po la nor/ mya ngan du ral pa

55b7(rgyud): daphyir 'jolas shing lha rnams 'grems par bgyid// ces sma sa te wa rnams la tri shum gdengs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / me mdzod kyi bdag po tsha da /

56a1(rgyud): dang / klu dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / lA ma yin dang / grul bum dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci la sogs pa la bsdigs pa/ tre shu la gdengs / snying rje

56a3(rgyud): bAr bgyid// ces smras te/ sde brgyad la tri shu la gdengs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po gtsug ni rin chen dang / dri za'i rgyal po zung phud ma pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / lham

56a5(rgyud): 'khor mang po dang bcas bdag dang phyur ste/ seng+ge la rin po che'i chun phul lo// de nas sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i grul bsdigs te/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas bya// rang ste

56a7(rgyud): shA las dkrugs pa dang / kwa'i rgyal po mangs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po bdun dang / klu'i rgyal po'i jog po dang / de dgas soms pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'ad dang ldan pa/ lha dang ldan gyi
