62b1(rgyud): pa dag sa dgongs su gsal// dgongs su gsal/ tad+yan/ yo ta dza ta/ dze ti dza ti/ dza tu dzu tu/ ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti re/ tu ru tu ru/ ka la ka lpa/ ke lI ki me/ ku ru ku lu/ tshugs
62b2(rgyud): po mnga' ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus pa chen po rjes su dgongs te gshegs sugs pa/ gshegs su gsal/ tsa ta tsa ta/ tsai ti tsi ti/ tsu tu n+na d+ha/  chub sems dpa'/ 
62b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi smon lam kye rjes kyi sprin gyi rjes su dgongs te thugs rje chen po mngar ba myur du gshegs su ga sol/ myur du gshegs su gsol/ ral rol/ r-i l-i ri li/ ru lu ru la?/ 
62b4(rgyud): gtan dang rnam par thar ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bzhi las bzhengs su gsol bzhengs su gsol// tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ e he ati// 
62b5(rgyud): prad+habu d+ha/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pas bzhengs su gsol/ banangs su gsol/ byams pa chen pos 'byung po thams cad bzlog tu gsol/ 
62b6(rgyud): sa rnga chen po'i sprin gyis bdag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ thu na b+hu na/ bi b+hu na bi b+hu na/ ma b+h+ra ma b+hA/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ bzhangs su gsol bzhengs su gsal/ tshur
62b7(rgyud): gshegs tshur kashags/ bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ las sbyang dugs ma/ ma d+hu kA ru Na kA ya swA d+ha/ ma~M hA bad+mad sA yA swAt+ma/ pad+ma A sa na ya sAd+hA/ sha tA dzA pra
62b8(rgyud): roti A T+Ta/ kai re ta ni swA hA/ shA ma na sAd+ha/ tsakra na sAd+ha/ badz+ra ne swA hA/ tran trai la pra ta rU pA ya swAH/ A kA shA ya mA hA/ shi na~M shi ne swA hA/ bratsa ba ta ye hAH/ 
63a1(rgyud): s+yA hA/ ya ma shud ya swA hA/ A ta dro Sh+To b+hu te b+h+yaHswA hA/ dza dra pra dzA b+h+yo brA de b+h+yaHswA hA/ saM sad tshe b+h+yo b+ha de b+h+yaHsahA/ a pa yu pa bdus g+ho b+h+ya twe b+h+yaHswAhA/ bi te ka b+h+yob+hU d+d+haT+Ta
63a2(rgyud): s+thAt+ma/ bi ti kle b+h+r-ik+Sha d+hIHs+t+raiH/ d+ha thA ker+dz+dzab+hUd+h+weSh+T+r-iHA/ non pa te k+ShaSh+T+r-id+hIb+h+yaHswA te/ sarba bud+d+hAk+Shat+ma/ saHk+Sh+mA taT+TaHs+yAhA/ b+h+yA mo an ta raM/ d+hidz+dzab+h+yaswA/ 
63a3(rgyud): dziT traT/ tre Ti trai tsi d+hun+ya trAn+tu/ baidag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / 'tshe ba thams cad dang / nad thams cad mas srungs shr-ig srungs shig swA hA/ gras gr-i sau// ma tha ma tha/ pA
63a4(rgyud): / tha pra ma tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki ta shwa ra Adz+nyA pa ya te swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thugs rje cher po mi bshol ba zhes bya ba
63a5(rgyud): gzungs rdugasas/  1sa rgyag das/ snyams ma@\u0f7f / bo sa / 
63a6(rgyud): paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di slad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ 
63a7(rgyud): ldan 'das grong khyer yangs pa can na// 'khor chen pos yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu la sogs pa dge slong lnga brgya dang byams
63a8(rgyud): la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa ma
63b1(rgyud): bzhugs so// 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa rang gi stan las langs nas bla gos phrag sa ga ca
63b2(rgyud): tu ga bar nas pus mo g.yos pa'i lga ngas lnga btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo zas phyag 'tshas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// btsapa
63b3(rgyud): ldan 'das spyan ras gzegs dbang phyug gi mazhes bgye ba'i gzungs kyi rig sngags chen mo gsang sngags kyi gzhi/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
63b4(rgyud): com ldan 'das rnams kyis sngon gsungasu shing da ltar gsung ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur te byang chubra yongs su tshol ba na sems can thams cad rdzas su
63b5(rgyud): bzung ba dang don dang byang chub sems dpe'i don kye bar kye phyir sngon gsungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i zag pa pa'i rigs kyi bu ram rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi bar gyur pa mA gyur/ 
63b6(rgyud): pa skyabasam mches pa rnams kyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen mapa mchis pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen dang mgon ma mches pa rnams kyi mgon du gyur pa sdig pa thams cad zad par bgyid
63b7(rgyud): sa te gzungs de shes pa thag tu bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ reg sngags thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/ 
63b8(rgyud): ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur te byang chub yongs su tshol ba na 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi pha rol gyi
64a1(rgyud): yang mes pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams bde bcan nas bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di dpag tu pad cas// 
64a2(rgyud): bya ba dkar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing granas la chos kyang ston te// 'khor de nyid na pra ba zed bar dathag zhed ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sa gsum pa zab par gyur pa zhig 'dus
64a3(rgyud): pa des spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ge ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ reg sngags kyi rgyal po chen mo 'di bram ze brgya stong mang po dang sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma la bsgrags
64a4(rgyud): bshad bstan te/ de dag thams cad kyis gzungs 'dri thos pa thag tu sdig bltung bar byed pa thams cad mas rnam par grol ba dang skye ba dran par gyur pa ngas dran no// byang chub
64a5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de spros shig/ phyi ma'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can du sems can sdig pa byed pa mtshams med pa byed ga bye ba khrag khrig 'bru
64a6(rgyud): phrag du ma'i sdig pa zad par 'gyur/ phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur/ mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur ro// ngas kyang gan zhing rjes su yi rang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis
64a7(rgyud): bka' stsal pas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rig sngaka sa chen mo/ 
64a8(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi gni 'di dag smras so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'o dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
64b1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la phyag 'tsham nas/ spyan rapa gzugs dbang
64b2(rgyud): ki yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rig sngags chen mo'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag brjod par bya'o// bdag la rig pa'i dgrub par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ e me mi le/ tse le me me/ 
64b3(rgyud): kun tu la/ kun NA le/ tu le si sa si le be si ri/ bi dA lA gr-i ri/ gan+d+ha ri drA ma Te/ mA ha n+te/ pra b+hA sa/ kak+Sha ya/ mA tsaN lI/ hun+d+ha pa li ni/ hungad cu num len// rje la mi le/ gr-i hA sau mya dngas
64b4(rgyud): / ku ru tsaN+Da mu we sA kU mA na yaM te/ ad+yadak+Shi Na b+hu nga sarba bi d+yA nA ma/ pra sa d+ha ne/ sarba be t+ya na yi A shwa re swA hA/ bklags pas 'grub pa'i gzungs 'di'i cho gni 'di yin ta thos
64b5(rgyud): ma thag tu las kyi sleb pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad lngas bsrung ngo // dus gsum du bzlas pa byas na zhag bdun gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
64b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan du mi sems pa'i yid kyis bzlas pa byas na/ zla ba gcig gis 'phags paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma rig pa che/ 
64b7(rgyud): pobadag nyid ster te/ 'phags pa 'od dpag med kyang mthong ngo de// bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyer mi ldog par 'gyur ro// skye ba dran pa dang thos pa 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro// gang dang / 
64b8(rgyud): sa pa de dang der dam pa'i chos dang pa 'bral bar 'gyur ro// longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
65a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
65a2(rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa stan ras gzugs dbang phyug gi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan pa dzi na mi tra dang / 
65a3(rgyud): dAn kI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcas te/ gtan la phab pa/ sag lung chud 'thams gzugs nas zhus das
65a4(rgyud): // rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ge ta mA ta ni tA ra/ bi shwa ka ra ma b+ha ba tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum sgrol ma las sna tshogs 'byung
65a5(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zlos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs te/ byang chub
65a6(rgyud): sems dpa' byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa dpag tu med pa dang / ku ru kul+le dang ri khrod la ma can la sogs pa dang / tshungs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa dpag tu med pa
65a7(rgyud): dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog padad+ma dang ku mu ta dang / man dA ra ba la sogs pa lha rdzas kyi me tog dpag tu med pa dag dang / dung dang / ping bang dang / rnga dang / dzarnga dang go'u rgyud mangs la sog
65a8(rgyud): pak+Sha'i rol mo dpag tu med pa dang lha'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa dpag tu med pa thegs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs nas bskor te/ 
65b1(rgyud): mchod pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhas
65b2(rgyud): / dge ba rag tu sa chen po yang g.yos/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor yang pham par byas te/ 'od kyi sdar ba chen po yang bkye'o// de yid 'di lta ste/ dkar po dang dbar por
65b3(rgyud): ser po dang sdang ku dang / mthing ka dang 'dres pa ste 'od sna tshogs bkye ste/ sdug bsngal dang bcas pa rnams spangs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kye yum sgrol ma ku su kul+le'i gtsug tu/ 
65b4(rgyud): rub par gyur to// gtsug tu nub ma thag tu mchod pa'i sprin gyi char pa yang babs par gyur to// de nas sde mo de dper na smin dang bral ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gyur to// dang/ 
65b5(rgyud): bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstod pa/ shed khams thams cad yongs su dag pa la// rin chen me tog par po char du pha ba// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i// 
65b6(rgyud): yum// ub gyur sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces gsungs so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bla gros phyug pa gcig tu gzar naso/ 
65b7(rgyud): mo g.yas pa'i grangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad zab pa'i phyir ci'i phyir bskyed/ gang gis na
65b8(rgyud): per zhen/ bco ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ 'jam dpal bden mod kyi dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyang ma skyes pa/ ma 'gogs pa/ drom me ga dri ma dang bral
66a1(rgyud): pa 'grib pa med pa 'phel ba med pa rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o// de'i phyir chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni de'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
66a2(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ni ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa dri ma med pa dri ma dang bral ba med pa/ 'grib pa med pa 'phel ba med pa rang
66a3(rgyud): bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa de ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ 'jam dpal mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o// mya ngan las 'das
66a4(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings so// yang dag pa'i mtho'i tshigs bla rigs go snying rje chen po'o// kun rdzob ngo ba 'khor ba'i tshigs bla dgas so// de las 'das bra ni dus gsum
66a5(rgyud): gyi sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i yum mo// de'i phyir 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'o// 'jam dpal de ltar na yum du yid la bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ 
66a6(rgyud): 'jam dpal drabs na chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid shes pas 'di bslab par bya'o// gzungs sngags 'di brjed par bya'o// nan tan du bsgrub par bya'o// 'i de'i yon tan shes
66a7(rgyud): par bya'o// 'di mchod par bya'o// lung nod par bya'o// the tshom med par bya'o// las la nan tan du bya'o// 'di'i bsngags pa yid la byo'o// las so so'i sgo nas bsgrub par
66a8(rgyud): 'o// de skad ces byang nyab sems dpa' 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la bstan to// des ni klang gzhi'i le'u bsten pa ste le'u dang po'o// de nas byang chub sems rab
66b1(rgyud): drangam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ji ltar bsgom par bya/ 'di la ji ltar du nan tan du bya zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
66b2(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ltar yi sa bya'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad de ma skyes pa'o// chos thams cad ni ma 'gags pa'o// chos thams cad ni dre ba dang bral ba'o// 
66b3(rgyud): / chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das shing rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par bsgom par bya'o// 'jam dpal de'i phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM swa b+hA ba shud d+haHsarba d+harmAHsA
66b4(rgyud): kha shung d+ho&haM/ zhes brjod par bya'o// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ mar la las skyes pa dang / sko ngal pa skyes pa dang / khrod gshor las skyes pa dang / brdzus te skyes pa das
66b5(rgyud): la bltas te byams pa bsgom par bya'o// skye ba dang rga ba dang rna ba dang 'chi ba ma snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang rang bzhin kyis
66b6(rgyud): 'dus ma byas pa la dga' ba dang 'atang snyoms bsgom par bya'o// 'jam dpal de lta bas na/ rgyu ni ched med pa bzhi'o// des bskyed pa ni byang chub kyi sems so// de'i phyir de la nan tan du
66b7(rgyud): lings bya'o// 'jam dpal de'i phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM b+ho d+hAtsat+ya lud pA ra A ha~M/ zhes brjod par bya'o// yod bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ mchod pa'
66b8(rgyud): la gyis lachod par bya'o// gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yi// phye ma phur ma bdug ste
67a1(rgyud): bye brag rnams// rgyal ba bsred pa'i yum la mchod par bya'o// gang lang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa'i yum mtsha
67a2(rgyud): dus rgyas smra/ 9 hU~M ka sil ma byed pa'i bye ba ga rnams// rgyal pa bskyen pa'i tham la mchod pa ba kyi// gang ya phyogs 'apa'i 'jig rten ma brgyags pa'o// bde bar
67a3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i yum mchog rin po che// rin chen mang mo'i bye brag phreng ba rnams// rgyal ba skyed pa'i yum la mchod par bgyi// gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig ter khams bzhus
67a4(rgyud): pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum mchog na bza' dkar// dri zham chu gtsang spos dang ldang ba'i chu// rgyal ba bskyed pa'i yum la mchod par bgyi// gang yang phyogs bcu'i 2/ 
67a5(rgyud): rten khams bzhugs pa'i// rgyalnga pa bskyed pa'i yum mchog phrin las ldan// bapa' dang bca' ba la sogs nal zas rnams// rgyal ba bskyed pa'i yum la dngul bar ba
67a6(rgyud): lhag bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi mdzad pa'i// glu dang rol mo sim stan bca swa pA'i sgra// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan 'phen gdugs bca so// phyogs bcu kun nas sa
67a7(rgyud): zhin gtebs gyur cig/ dpag bsam gyis ni shing dag dang // ljon pa'i shing dang shing dag gis// dri zhi ba lo na dab bcas pa'i shing // phyogs bcu kun nas gtabs kyar
67a8(rgyud): cig/ spos kyi dri dang ldang ba'i char// 'bru dang me tog la sogs pa'o// yid du 'ong ba'i dri zhem char// ngas par kun tu 'bab par sheg/ 'bab chu lteng ka lu ma dang // ma
67b1(rgyud): drang rje bu dag dang na// rab tu dag dang ldan pa'i mtsho// dang pa la sogs bcas pa 'o//  rje mkhung pa yid 'ong ba'o// drab drab byed pa dang // shAr nub 'ang bcas nye zla dag dang // khang
67b2(rgyud): shin du yid du 'ong bu rnams// rgyal ba bskyed pa'i yum la mchod bya'o// 'jam dpal de'i phyir mchod pa'i sngags ring brjod par bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu drAH
67b3(rgyud): hUM/ oM san ta nA ga ta a lo ka pU dza ma g+ha sa mu drA s+phA ra Na sa pa ye hUM/ oM sarba tathA ga togan+ta pu ji ma
67b4(rgyud): sarba dkA ra Nis ma ye hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ne lid+hi b+hu dza me g+ha sa lu da s+phA ra~M Na sa la / oM san tanA gta
67b5(rgyud): mchod pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nasal bar jam pal gzhon nu ra gyur pa lnga gsungs pa/ 'jam dang la yu pa 'di ni dus gsam gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la// 
67b6(rgyud): 'jab dpal de'i phyir dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa 'di'ajam dpal khyod kyi yid la gyis sheg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskyed pa'i gzungs
67b7(rgyud): gsungs pa/ na maHsarba tat+t+wa ga d+hAn+tu/ tad+bathA/ oM na maHs+'u ka so/ na maHhA ru ye tA ra mi ta na mA stA ra mAr Sh+Te ra/ k+Sha ra d+h+ya te re b+he k+Sha Na/ tre+e sa kyi rU tha bA kar+Na a ba de
67b8(rgyud): dke sha rad be/ na maHsha ta sa ri tsu ni dr-i sa~M bA raN+Da paT wAn naM/ tA rA sa na sra ni ka ri/ pra sha sa dke ri No dz+wA la/ na maHkan ka rI la a ba nga/ bAn padra be b+hu Sha te/ dAd thA
68a1(rgyud): / ta paHshA na tri/ ti te k+Sha d+hu na go tsa re/ na masta thA ga toSh+Te Sha/ bi dza yA nan tatsA ri ni/ a she Sha pA ra mi tap+ta ba ta/ dze na bu tra ne se be te/ na ma sUt+tA ra hUM ka rA/ pU ri tA shA degan/ 
68a2(rgyud): ta re/ sa ba ta mo kle kra mA ka rbA neHshaiSh+Ti ke rASh+Ta Na k+Sha ye/ ma/ sha kr-i a na la pra da?/ ma rud dwe Sh+Te shwa rA a rats+tshe tAM/ b+hU ta br-i tA Da kan+taH/ ga na yak+Sha pAr sne to/ ni prasmr-i Di tI phaT kA rA/ 
68a3(rgyud): yan+t+ra pra mar d+ha ni/ pU t+yA lAn+ti pa da n+ta sa she khi dzA l-I ku lo k+Sha ne/ na mastu re ma hA g+ha re/ mA ra b+he ra binA shwa na/ b+he kun+ma kro ta bak+ta a ba dza/ sarba shat+pu ni sU da ne/ ne masti ra t+na mu draM ka/ 
68a4(rgyud): gu le bi b+hU Shi ti/ kASh+Thi tA shaM Sha dig tsa kr-i/ ni ka ra swA ka d+ha su yi/ na paHpra Ta dit+tadza gA mu ku nI k+Shi b+ha pA la ni/ ha sad+g+ha daM sat+su tA re/ mA ra lo ka pa sha~Mng+ka ra/ ra maHsa ma d+hadz+nyA / 
68a5(rgyud): wi kau Na / 6ma teSh+T+r-isarbaM d+h+r-i kAr/ sarba pa da maHni/ num/ sheSh+TaNaDA menadu/  d+haSh+Ta Na/ a.i d+hiHd+han+d+ha d+hA pad+d+haH kai NA d+ha She/ dpa
68a6(rgyud): thAn tad+ya ta thA ka dzA lA yA wAn tar smr-ita/ A lI nA mu di d+hA bAt+ta/ re pu tsakra bi rA sa ne/ na maT+Taka ra ta lA b+hU ta/ tsarat+na ha ta lo d+hA tA le r+g+haM pA~M N+Te kr-i ta hUM k+Sha ra/ pa~M pa ta pA tA la b+h+re
68a7(rgyud): de/ na maHnai bi TuSh+T+ri shAn ta/ nar+b+ha rmA ga tsa ra~M/ swAt+ma pra Na ba saM yu ka te/ man+ta pA pa kA nA sa ni/ nam 'apri pri di tA ban+ti/ re'u ka dz+re pra thA daM ni/ dashak+Sha ra po da R+sha sa/ be d+hA NAMk+Sha ra d+hi
68a8(rgyud): askA re bA dag te/ hUM k+Sha Na k+Sha ra bi dzo ta/ me su min dar ke lA sa/ bA lan tra ya tsa li na// nam \u0f7f su ras rba Tha ra/ ta ri NAng ka ka ra skr-i ta/ bAr dri ngag ta pA tsa kA ra/ a she/ 
68b1(rgyud): ldanas te sa sa rAgaN+DA d+hAHsum+ba/ radaken+da sa pa tA/ A ba t+yA pu ded+hA thog ka / duHsa hA nAs ni/ namaH sarma sa thA daR+Sha/ ra yan de ti thA swa re/ tAr di rug ta tu ta~Mt+ta
68b2(rgyud): be She sA dzA ra nA/ sa ne/ na ma sti ta tra bi nAs/ shi ba sha ka te sa pa rI tiHgra ha pa tA la ya sh+lo ga DA/ rA sharI pra b+ha re tu re/ man+t+ra mA la~M mi stA traM/ da ma ske rI ka be sha ka yaHpa rba ta
68b3(rgyud): la k+Sha d+hI mAM/ de nA thA ka ti sa man+ta ba taHsha yam+b+ha pA ta r+yA ta thA ya/ ya sma rad sarba b+ha ya pA daM/ sarba pA pa pra shA ma ni/ sarba du rig te nA shwa na/ u b+hi ShI ka to b+ha ba ta hU NAM/ sa pa ta d+ha/ 
68b4(rgyud): I sr-in mA ha taHm+b+ha sad+ya/ son tI bat+sa bA taM pra da ta/ bi Shan tA s+ya ma hA g+ho raM sta pA raM/ khA Tha dzig me/ s+phA ra NA ta pra la ya yA ti/ khA ti ti b+hi tra me pA p+tA/ gra ta dA ra bi/ 
68b5(rgyud): daM/ ba raHdud+de be nA sha nAM/ An+tetrUM ts+yai ba sa tA nAM/ dr-i s+t+rai la ba tA b+hA ba rad+hinAM/ pu tra k+Sha mA la b+he ta pu traM/ d+ha na k+Sha pa li b+hedad+hanaM/ sarbak+Sha ma~M na b+ha pa na~M te/ ra bI g+b+hiHpr-i taHn+yatA/ 
68b6(rgyud): ka ba te ya~M sa twA/ swam b+h+rUM prad+d+ha ba~M sheH/ swarba ka ra~M/ sa ma s+thA yul ki ga/ \u0f7fd+ha ni tsata ma niHsaHna Ni tA ra ya~M swAH/ 2 me dpal brdungs 'di ni dus gsum gyis su/ 
68b7(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlapas shribra du su gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad bsgreng ba'i su mi sgom ma la marungs pa 'jams pa'i sgo nas bsrid pa ste/ phan khonan
68b8(rgyud): lam kyis mi khyab pa'o// 'jam dpal de'i phyir brjod par bya'o// gzungs 'di brjod pa'i gang zag ni sems can dmyal pa dang / yi dgas dang dud 'grol sogs pa'i gnas
69a1(rgyud): / nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// yul mtha' la kho ba dang kla klo dang / dbang po mtshangs pa la sogs par nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rims dang 'brum bu dang / nad
69a2(rgyud): 'gro ba la sogs pa'i nad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad las grol zhing na kyi 'jigs pa me 'byung ngo // 'jigs pa chen po brgyad la sogs pa las grol bar 'gyur ro// 2
69a3(rgyud): dpal dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstod pa 'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag de ni/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod ba byas par 'gyur ro// 'di 'dzin pa
69a4(rgyud): gang zag de ni mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa ma lus par byang par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// dus ma yin par 'chi ba mi 'byung zhing / 
69a5(rgyud): nam 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i yum sgrol la mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag ni yid la ci bsam pa thams cad
69a6(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro// yum sgrol pa'i gzugs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// 'khor phun sum tshogs pa lnga sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob pa
69a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// me la mngan pa ltas ngan pa dang / mi ma yin pa'i bar du gcod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi bden pa yang mazang bar 'gyur ro// yum sgrol ma
69a8(rgyud): rings su mthong bar 'gyur ro// na maHsa rbatathA ga tas phyags bud rdul tre pa~M te ShA te ru ThAr/ zhes brjod par bya'o// bstod pa'i le'u sgo gsum pa'o// 
69b1(rgyud): pangs byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon dus bcom ldan 'das la gso la ga gzungs sngags 'ad gang la brten nas yed ma nan tan du bya zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldar
69b2(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ sdug bsngal las bral bar 'dod cing zab po'i don la mos byasan bya'o// da nas te las byung ba'i 'od zer ma so steng 'og thams cad du rdo rjer cu
69b3(rgyud): / 'jam dpal sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra dz+wa la badz+ra tanA hU~M phaT/ zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas traM las byung po'i yi ge e dkar po bsgom par bya'o// de'i steng du
69b4(rgyud): na po bsgom par bya'o// de'i steng du laM ser po bsgom par bya'o// de'i steng du yaM ljang khu bsgom par bya'o// de'i steng du ro dmar po bsgom par bya'o// de rnams kyi 'od zer 'phro ba
69b5(rgyud): dang sasub kyi/ oM r+thamad+ha sa'i bdan nAM/ oM oMH ba~M budad+ha hU~M/ oMs bu d+hA nA~M/ oMprak+Sha'i byA hrA d+h+we/ oMk+Shad+hA dz+nyAn rbod d+han+tu/ oMn ma s+ya rba tan+na
69b6(rgyud): khris ban kun / 'jam skye kar sngags sas dkyil la bar mi sa byung pa byaste/  dri' mi bzhi / dge hUM rdzogs sa rdo rje
69b7(rgyud): b+h+yor bkru tshad bzhi da ldan pa gru bzhir 'dug cing skye bzhi dka ba brgyad dang ldan pa/ ra ba da da pe byed pa deng rin po che'i rgyan 'byung ni la sogs pa sa mdzes
69b8(rgyud): 'o// des kyil 'khor gyi khang pa de 'dri ba bskyed de dbus kyi zo 'brel ni zla ba dang pad+ma'i grong du ta sdeng 'u las byung ba'i ut+pal te dang bcas pas 'jig rten
70a1(rgyud): bye khams thams cad du 'od kha doka sna tshogs pas 'jig rten thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang snya ma dang 'jal tshan dang rlig rgyu dang chu bla dang gzugs brnyan lta bur mthar
70a2(rgyud): de yis ut+pal las byung ba'i sgrol ma'i sku ljang khu zha bu gcig phyag gnyis pa phyag g.yas pa mchod skye naM/ g.yon pa sdong bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pal 'dzin pa/ mdzes pa'i sgra rin pa
70a3(rgyud): cheche'i do shal dang snyan cha dang dpung rgyan dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ gzhon ru pa lang tsho la bab pa zhal 'dzum bag dang bcas pa/ mnyam pa'i skyil mo krung dang bcos pa zla
70a4(rgyud): dog sna tshogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams na dri stsal bal bu dang sgyu me dang 'jam chen dang sreg rgyud chu bla dang gzugs brnyan lta bur mthong ngo // dri yis ut+pal las byung
70a5(rgyud): ba'i sgrol ma mtha ga phyag gnyis pa phyag gapas kyis tre shul 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yon sdong bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pal 'dzin pa mdzes pa'i sku rin po che'i do shal dang sta
70a6(rgyud): cha dang dpung rgyan dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ bzhin nu lang tshal bab pa zhal 'dzum pag dang bcas pa/ mnyam pa'i skyel mo krung dang bcas pa zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng
70a7(rgyud): rabazhugs pa'o// lce ru zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du re las bskyed pa'i ut+pal ser po sa bon dang bcas pa las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab ste/ 'od kha dag sna tshog/ 
70b1(rgyud): mas cad kaka pas 'dung ka pa dang 'ja' chun dang sag sa dang mun dang gzugs brgan la za ma // de yis ut+pal las byung ba'i sgrol ma su mdog gser
70b2(rgyud): bsregs pa lta bu phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yus na ral gri 'dzen pa g.yon de sdang bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pal 'dzin pa/ mdzes pa'i sku rin po che'i do shal dang snyan cha dang dpung rgya dang / 
70b3(rgyud): rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gzhon du lang tsho la bab pa zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pa mnyam pa'i skyes mo krung dang bcas pa/ zla ba dang padra'i steng du bzhugs pa'o// nub du bla dang pad+ma'i
70b4(rgyud): steng du tu las byung ba'i ut+pa la dmar po sa bon dang bcas pa las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khya ste/ 'od kha dog sna tshogs pas 'jig rten thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang
70b5(rgyud): rmAH/ bu dang 'ang 'tshon dang sreg rgyud rgya zla dang gzugs brnyan lta bur mthong ngo // de yis ut+pal las byung ba'i sgrol ma dmar mo phyag gnyis pa phyag g.yas par la ra
70b6(rgyud): 'dzin ga g.yor ba na sdong bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pal 'dzin pa/ mdzes pa'i sku rin po che'i don la dang snyan cha dang dpung rgyan dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan phra gzhon du la
71a1(rgyud): / zla dang gzugasra bats+tshan wA bur ma zang // de yis ut+pal las byung ba'i sgrol ma ldang khru phag gnyis ma phyag g.yas na gdugs 'dzin pa g.yon sdong bu dang bcas
71a2(rgyud): su la 'dzin pa pangs pa'i ste rin po che'i don la dang skur ma dang rgyan dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa gdon nu lang tshol bab ba'al 'dzum pa gdang bzlas
71a3(rgyud): nyam pa'i skyil lo krung bcas pa/ gdan zlab dang pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs pa'o// shar gyi sgor zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du taM las byung ba'i ut+pal sa bon dang bcas pas 'jig rte
71a4(rgyud): mas thams cad du 'ad kha dog sna chags pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sprul ba lta bu dang sgyu ma dang 'anga' tshan smyig rgyu da nga chu zla dang gzugs brtan lta bu
71a5(rgyud): bathong ngo // de yis u t+pal las byung ba'i sgrol ma ljags kyu ma sku mdog dkar lo phyag gnyis lcags kyu 'dzin pa khros pa'i spyi rin po che 'dren la dang snyan cha dang dbyung rgya
71a6(rgyud): dang rgyun rnam pa sna rdzogs pas 'i rgyan pa bzhon du yang tshol babo bcung zhig khros pa'i zham dang bcas pa zhabs brgyang bskum du zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa'o// 
71a7(rgyud): skur pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du re las byung ba'i ud las bon dang bcas pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ong / kha dog sna tshogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams tham
71a8(rgyud): cad sprul ba sa bu dang sgyum dang 'ang 'chen dang sgeg rgyu dang phyu zla dang gzugs brnyan lnga bur mthong ngo // de yis su dral las byu ba'i sbal ma zhags pas sku ma dgas ra
71b1(rgyud): 17 tre ka phyag gnyis pazhags pa 'dzin pa/ khros pa'i sku rin pa che'i do zhal dang snyan cha dang dpung rgyan dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshugs pas brgyan pa gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa cung zhig
71b2(rgyud): thos pa'i zhas dang bcas pa/ zhabs brkyang bskum du zla baM dang pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa'o// nub kyi sgor zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du du las bskyed pa'i ut+pa la sa bon dang bcas pa
71b3(rgyud): jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od kha dog sde tshogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang sgyu ma dang 'ja' tshon dang smig rgyu dang chu zla dang gzugs brnyan
71b4(rgyud): bur mthong ngo // de yis ut+pal las byung ba'i sgrol ma lcags sgrog ma sku mdog dmar mo phyag gnyis lcags sgrog 'dzin pa khros pa'i skur rin po che'i di shal dang snyan pa dang dpung
71b5(rgyud): can dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa gzhon nu lang tshol bab po khros pa'i zhal dang bcas pa zhabs brgyad ba skum du zla ba dang pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// byang ge
71b6(rgyud): dra ba dang pad+ma'i steng du re las byung ba'i ut+pal sa bon dang bcas pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'ong kha dog snga tshogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
71b7(rgyud): lapa bu dang sgyu mA dang 'ja' tshon dang smig rgyu dang rgyu zla dang gzugs brnyan lta bur mthong ngo // de yis ut+pal las byung ba'i sgrol ma dril bu la sku mdog ljang sngon ma phyag
71b8(rgyud): nyes da dril bu 'dzin cing khros sde sku la rin po che'i dashal dang snyan cha dang dpung rgyar dang rgyan rnam pa sna chags pas brgyan pa gzhon du lang tsho la bab pa khros pa'o
72a1(rgyud): // dang bcas bzhabs brkyang bskum du pud+ma dang bla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa'o// 'jam dpal de ltar lha'i 'khor lo bsgob par bya'o// 'jam dpral gyis gsol pa bcom ldan
72a2(rgyud): 'das srul pa la sogs pa rnams ni je lta bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'gro ba drug po rnams ni nyan mongs pa dang bcas pa'i khams so// de lta bas na sprum pa
72a3(rgyud): swa bu dang m+b+hi radabang 'tsho dang sgeg chud chu zla dang gzugs brnyan ga/ khur rig par bya'o// lha'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de das 'jas dpal gyis nus pa khacom ldan 'das lnga de ltas de ltar byin gyi
72a4(rgyud): brlab pa byi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sprul pa lta bu dang sgyu ma
72a5(rgyud): dpal gyis smras pa/ bcum ldan 'das sprulnga pa zhes bya ba'i sa sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gasprul pa zhes bya ba de yang dag pa ma yin zhing gnyis ka 'khrul pa'o// sgyu ma ni ga
72a6(rgyud): 'phrul pa'o// 'ja' tshon ni steng ba'o// smyig d+hA 'phrul ning stod pa'o// nA b+ha ni rgyu'abris so// gzugs pa nin na dra ba'i grong gyur te/ 'jam dpal la 'phrul pa na bzhen
72a7(rgyud): nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa khrims kyang de bzhin no// 'jam dpal de k+ta bas na las lce 'byin gyis rlob pa yang 'dra'o// 'jam dpal sprul pa dang sgyum pa 'ja' tshon dang smag rgyu
72a8(rgyud): dang chu zla dang gzugs brnyan ni thogs pa med cing sogs pa dang bral ba'o// tha dad pa med cing ba dad pa dang bral ba'o// 'jam dpal de'i phyir de'i rang bzhin dang 'dra bar
72b1(rgyud): kyis she ka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad pa ni/ lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te/ gung ma gnyis brkyang ste rtsa sbyar nas/ mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag ga
72b2(rgyud): gu mo la ragase zur bcag nas mtha' mu dang mthe ba rtsa sprad nas nang sbyar ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyal// de'i sngags ni a san ta thA ga ta oM taM A haM badz+ra sta na sarba ta thA ga ta
72b3(rgyud): hUM zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur po ra mdzad pa ni/ lag pa'i tham+ba m+b+ha sbyar te mthe'u chung dang srin lnga ka gnyis phyir bkan te/ gung mo rtse sprad
72b4(rgyud): mithe bos mdzub mo gnyis mnan pa ni rin po che'i phyag rgya ste lago'i snying du bzhag nas sngags brjod pa ni/ oM swan ta thA ga te tsin+d+rata mchi dz+wa la ne sarba ta thA ga ta a ha~M shud d+ha pa ri
72b5(rgyud): shud d+hA ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur zher byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sde thugs
72b6(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyid pa tshig gi phyag rgyani lhag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te sor mo rnams phan tshun du so sor bsnol gung mo baspong ste/ mthe bo dang mthe'u chung yang gshibs
72b7(rgyud): bzheng ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste sngags ni oM sarba ta nA ga ta badz+ra sa ma pa hUM/ bres brjod par bya'o// dbang bsgyur ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems
72b8(rgyud): dpa' 'jam dpal gzhan nus gsel ba/ zla ba nyi mar spu 'dra ba'i// lnga khri'amadag can 'gying bag cad// pad+ma R+sha ba'i stong na bzhugs// sangs rgyas thams cad
73a1(rgyud): bskyed pa'i yum// sems can kun gyi skyabs gyur pa'o// ut+pal bsdams pa phyag 'tshal bsod// ces yu ma la bstod nas gsol pa
73a2(rgyud): ldan 'das 'di'i gas sngags ni gang gyis 'gri na sogs sa pa dang / shA tsa ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ 'di gnas pa gan / skyon mo rat+taHrmA/ 
73a3(rgyud): / namaH s+yAd d+ha sarba ta thAg+h+ra tA naM nam sa ra ste/ nA ma sA d+hA tu Sh+TeH/ nai b+hiT+TA hA/ lak+Sha n+dan+ta pak+Sha ba breg sh-inas da TI
73a4(rgyud): sha shwa ruts+tshan+da saM b+hU NAM paTak+ShAn na/ t+te r+d+hasashwA ni kAr prAH shaunar to/  l-I/ na maHkr-in+de kr-I nI/ lA ba dzaHNi bAR+sa baM b+hUSh+Ta twed+hAnaM b+hIn+yaita ban+dan+d+ra te
73a5(rgyud): d+had go tsA re nr-i mis tAM thAM ga tAMSh+Ta ShA ba dza yA myan+ta tsa ri/ a shai Sha pa ra mi tA p+sA b+ha dzi na pu tra ni se byai tai tA ra tut+tA ra tu re sIh+na/ zhes bzla sa? par bya'o// gzu
73a6(rgyud): tsu swAH/ rkyen pa ng+ge'i rigs kyi skyed pa'o// oM t+tA rA s+t+wa~M hA/ sa? rigs kyi skyed pa'o/ eSh+NI tu t+tA rAt+ta ras+yAH/ 
73a7(rgyud): it+pA re tutat+t+ya b+hai ra swAt+ma/ las sna tshogs pa'i skyer po'o// oM t+tA ra t+no tud+hA d+d+hok+Sha ra~M hr-I rje na de shin te la
73b1(rgyud): k+Shadz+nyAnA.A k+ShA k+Shar+tha/ (/ shA bstsu ba'i sugs so// AHpAr+m+ma t+yAt+tA rAHswAH/ ! buM sh+tsA de stan nas gag /  / 
73b2(rgyud): ru kar shi na/ rgya skye ba'i sngags so// oM t+sA r+yAt+tA ri tud t+te red+b+hak+SharaH b+h+r-i dag tsi ri sa pa tiSh+Thak+Shas+t+ram+b+ha/ bAn ta mr-iSh+mA Sha a lo ka ra m+b+ha kir Sha Na// m+me phaTo/ de
73b3(rgyud): lus kyi sngags so// oM tA re tA ra tu ta tA ra tu rits+l-ik+Sha rA bI ra tA shA~M dr-i ga~M tsa rI sa pa ta pakra kA m+ba k+Shan ti niHi sheSha shAn ti da ku ru kA ra sha na k+Sha me swA hA/ klu ni bla'i sngags

73b5(rgyud): D+ha pA da nes shaM khe dz+wal+yA ku lai dza li ra ma rI g+hi rim+bA ra b+hI r+ya be nA shi na b+h+r-i ku Te kr-i ta bu ga tAM ba dza sarba sha tru ni su da ni rad na ma

74a1(rgyud): dkar ba tsan+dan dkar ba gre rgyas thugs la me tog sril ma gtor te/ bum pa dkar po rin po che bas byas pa'i nang bu rin tho che ldan// sa rA dang
74a2(rgyud): mu ti ka dang man shel dang bya ru dang mu men gzhug par bya'o// spos ldan tsAn+dan dang a ga ru dang du duka dang ga bur dang bra shel tse gcug par bya'o// 
74a3(rgyud): dang sre dang sran ma dang 'bras dang til ma rag nag par bya'o// snying po lnga ni bu ra ma dang sbrang rtsi dang mar dang lan tshwa dang ti la bcug par bya'o// ga tsA nga ma'i ras
74a4(rgyud): tsir ma nyams pas dkris te dbus su gzhag go// gang ba'i bum pa bzhi yang ba nag par byang// pog pho rab ni dang me tog sa sogos pa bzhi yang gzhag
74a5(rgyud): bar bya'o// de ltar rdzogs pas 'di bsam gtan du bya'o// yi ge taM las byung ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i yum sgom mu dpa' mo rnal 'byor mu la/ 
74a6(rgyud): lus bu bsgom pa ni/ pad+ma rgyas pa las byung zhing zla ba rgyas pa la bzhugs bsdu mdog ston klu'i zla ba ltar dkar ba gzun nu lang tsho la byab bsti bu'i spu
74a7(rgyud): shalnga dang dpung rgyan dang rin po che'i chun 'phyang la sogasra pas mdzes par brgyan pa pa nyaM tsa laM ga'i gos kyis smad dkris pa ka shi ka'i ras kyi stod g.yo
74a8(rgyud): bskyes krung byed pa dang bcas pa 'al gcog phyag gnyis pa zhal 'jus ning spyan 'khrug pa/ phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa/ g.yon pa ut+ta/

81a1(rgyud): dbus su swA hA mthu' can gyi med pa khar lnga dang bcas pa srog la grang sam gyis bris pa dpung ba 'am/ mthul du btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// rgyas

86a1(rgyud): 'jigs pa kun las grol bar byed// dus min 'chilas grol byed pa// skyes bu gan 'a thob par 'gyur// mir ni skye bdoran dang 'acas// dge gcig pu yi phan yon gyis// gang zhig 'dun

86a8(rgyud): mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya ca brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ lha mtshan mo sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ba'i dor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do shal dang / nabapa' dang / sham thabs kyi gshal kas 'jig rten gyi khams chen
86b1(rgyud): 'i thar byas pas phyag 'tshal lo// de nas// ma stso la mas de'i tshe sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i gzungs kyi mchog brjod pa/ ma rjem gyi ma dza ga a tsitatra ya a ni tsi ra tA ya/ su dA \u0f7f/ khe dz+wa ya/ mahA dz+wa la kha~M d+ha ya / 
86b2(rgyud): lajal/ de/ b+hU bla / ba rab pa pa dang / mahA ngaM gaM be las bi las/ bi las/ badza a ma toka bi nga pa do l+la hrI nA~M/ gan gi ni bi lab bas/ slar s+ya pa mahA pra dz+nyA a ni ba ta bajam ma hA ShA ru Ni ka/  gan rje
86b3(rgyud): bATak+ShaH/ poT troH/ A ba dan la/ A be gra la/ d+hun trA na/ be dUn bi d+han/ ke pa kes/ gab la/ sur rmekam+b+ha/ a ti si ta/ mu e ta la dab la/ sa~M ka rA dzan/ bi ma thi ke// bin+da sha ya/ bi nA sha ya/ he thA ga pa ti/ sarbAs pa/  stan/ 
86b4(rgyud): / pa ra ba la ya/ asmA kaM asmA kaM/ ma da ni ma da ni/ saM bo d+ha ya/ saM mo ha ya ha ra ha ra/ hi re hi ri/ hu ru hu ru/ bi ta ka ra kha ra dza/ hi haM/ tro tA ya/ haM haM/ san+na tA ya/ san+to ya/ man+ta man+ta/ mad+da mar+Ya/ tsa ra tsa ra/ saM tsa ra saM tsa ra khe ga be ga pa
86b5(rgyud): gas te/ mamon yon swAhA/  nas sgra dang sgra min tshogs// srin po gnod sbyin mi'am // lko rgya chen po'i tshogs rnams dang // 'byung ba drir log 'dren rnams// 'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i mchog/ gas
86b6(rgyud): gas chen po 'di thos nas// skrag cing mgo bo slad gyur te// lag pa chen po longs bskyod nas// gang gis 'di nas sa gsum 'ang// mtha' dag khyab par byas pa'i phyir// 'ded pa'i lha'i ngag bzlog pa// sgrol ma
86b7(rgyud): na yangs phyag 'tshal lo// spun ras gzegs kyi rigs smos pa// che ba nyid kyi grags pa'ad// klan langs khyod ni sems can rnams// phan ba nad skad du 'byung ba lags// de nas dbang phyug la sogs pa/ 
86b8(rgyud): dang naman 'du kun dang / ye/ sngags 'char gas dag pa dang // da bzhin dag sngags 'char ba rnams// grags phrag pa gcigag pa// bgror mtsha bya laras kyang// klu me spongs nga
87a1(rgyud): na che ni 'di sa dbus// sgrol ma'od 'bar des // ga 'tshal kyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo// ming brgyas brgyad dam pa'i// de med mi ni brjod par baN+DI// bkra shes rnam rgyam da
87a2(rgyud): bzang ba// skye dku'i dbang phyug mngon shes mer// dbang phyug rab dga' 'jigs la drag/ cod pag med cing dregs pa med// pad ma'i sman dang pad ma'i zhal// pad ma'i lte ba rab gtsad sbyin// spyan
87a3(rgyud): pa sa ste// rdzag las skyeb sgrub pa'os de kyis// de dzin sa sbyin nags sbyin ga/  na nga gas
87a4(rgyud): spos dpar len myo ma ba ste// sman gyi dmar pos gzigs par mangs// dka' mdzod dka' stobs pad mo lags// bdo ma'i mdog can pad mdogar gyes// 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba ste/ 'dzim
87a5(rgyud): tshe lugs stobs mche// 'dul du 'chug ma 'dul mdzad ma// bsteng ldan mi mchog dam pa lags// rab gsal 'dul ba rdo rje can// rnam par rgyal ba 'od gsal pa// byang chub rdul med dri ma mang/ 
87a6(rgyud): khad+ma mchog rnams kyi rjed// srid byed ni sred bAr//  gang ga zhugs la 'od ci mdzes// rgya lhag zul 'byed 'gying ba gcan// skyes mchog rang bzhin med 'bros rgyas// gtsug pu dgasum
87a7(rgyud): tshol gsum// spyan gsum drim gsum sel pa// srid pas la mdzad khong dge ba// tshig ldan mar yang de bzhin grags// rgyal ba sbyin pa bsod nams sbyin// sdig pa 'joms ma 'jigs pa ma / nor sbyin
87a8(rgyud): mdog kyi zhasas// gzugs pa zang stsal b.rang drum pacang // sbru phrul snru bru ldan na 'du las dul pa bgrung rnams sa pa// zlab thogs ma rgyags ya dpa// chags sa skyen bregs thongs/

88a1(rgyud): gzhan pa med la 'jug/ rig sngags 'char ma gzugs 'angang ma// slobs lnga srabs dang ldan par ma dza// slebs dang stobs nu dam par ba ste// shes rabs chen gyis gcod par mdzes/ 
88a2(rgyud): rgyal lags te sbya la ldan// de bzhin badz+rad dang zla ba lags// steng nas khyams dang khyangs bza' tshul// tsam pa ka li mun pos gas la// ser mo tshon pa legs pa'i rten// drag mo phyag na rkun po thogs// 
88a3(rgyud): le ba babang mo ki shal ka can// de bzhin shin du shas cher dgyes// rigs mtshan shan du stobs dang ldan// rdo rje khro bo dga' mdzad ma// bde ldan blo ldan rdo rje'i thabs// blo mdzadu shes rab skyed par mdzad// 
88a4(rgyud): mo lo ma mchod par can// lhan mas kun las rdul lhag pa// sred med bu po sdig pasal// bkra shis chi shes dang dgyes// rab tu dga' ma 'gyogs na dga'// spyod tshul dga' la dga' dang ldan/ dag
88a5(rgyud): pa dga' bar mdzad pa ste// chos rnams kun gyi legs pa'i rten// sangs rgyas sprul pa sgral mdzad ma// nga rgyal sal bar mdzad pa ste// las dang nyon mang
88a6(rgyud): shes pa bcu mnga' sangs rgyas pa// pha rol phyin pa bcul gnas// sa bahu dag la mnga' brnyes pa// stobs rnams bcu pos char gsal ma// rdo rje cod pan rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje bu mo lha min se la// dus kyi
88a7(rgyud): rab tu rgyags// rdo lcags kyu bde dang dpal// rdo rje nags pa nags pa bzang // sgeg mordo rje phyag na bsnams// yid 'ang yid la tshim par mdzad// pha rol bgegs rnams sel mang dam// tshe ma mdzad
88a8(rgyud): sa mang mdapa sa// ra cing gar thabs ston par mdzad// chos can nya la ta la'i ngod// chos sbyin rnam par gzigs pa lags// khyod ni rdo rje 'phro ba dang // bdud rtsi darje brjod pa sa// dodza 'a ba dang slobs yong/ 
88b1(rgyud): kya ga 'tshal// bdag cag rnams kyis bstad pa las// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyang mchag badzad// kye skye bcom ldan mchog 'ad ni// zla ba rnams kyi mche ga lags gsung // de nas zla ba / 
88b2(rgyud): 'dran // 'bar la 'tha bar ldan pa ya// shA ma slol ma brjod pag can// 'dzum bzhin du ni rab smras pa// dbang phyug men po la sogs kun// nga'i chen ni mnyan par bgyis// thams cad rtag tu btsun par ni// stongs
88b3(rgyud): bcu dgal brtson par gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul chen yang // dus kun tu ni bsrung bar gyis// zhi ba'i lam la dmigs pas ni// 'khor bi'i rgya mtsho mi bzad cing // 'jigs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa/ 
88b4(rgyud): nas dka' byed kyi rgal bar gyis// mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer la// dkrigs nas brtson te 'dug par gyis// de nas nyi 'od 'bar ba yi// phreng ba lta bu mdzes pa'i nal// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brug gi sku/ 'dra ba'i
88b5(rgyud): tshig ni bka' stsal ba// kye ma rig sngags spel ma'i mchog mun pa sel bar byed pa dang // mthu sa bas chen skyed byed pa// sgrib pa thams cad gcod byed pa// tshogs rnams skyed pa'i gzi brjed kyis// dag par
88b6(rgyud): sa pam yin pas// shas cher dka' bar byed pa yi// gzungs 'di thos par mi 'gyur ro// sngan chad sangs rgyas brtson byas pa'i// brtan po gze brjid dag rnams la// dam tshig chen po rag sngags kyi// dmachig
88b7(rgyud): 'ad byung bar 'gyur// nyon mong samatha'adas ba 'joms shing // sdig pa sems cadasal byed pa// sems can thams cad dab 'byed pal// gzungs sngags rdo rje mtshag 'dzin pa// su nig mnyam par banag
88b8(rgyud): bas// khan tam 'char ngam klos byed na// rang byung gis ni gsungs pa bzhin// de yi don kun grub par 'gyur// nyon mongs kun las rnam grol zhing // sems can kun las lhag pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten dag tu rmA/ 
89a1(rgyud): shesas// 'dzud pa'i de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs// su mig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di// 'don ning sgrol ma zla ba'i nas// de bzhin pastod byed de dag ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyur/

89a4(rgyud): / dadang mi rnams legs par sad par mdzad pa po// rgyal sras thu bo rnams kyis khyab par stobs kyis brten pa yis// gsung rab rtag tu tshogs chen brda sprod la// don chen grags shing phan phyir zhugs pag
89a5(rgyud): rab des chos de dang ni srung byed dang // de bzhin khyad par sems pa'i rims sa la pas// babod med nyon mongs sel 'a dang // nI bi la yid ni skyed pa'i tshig/ rgyal ba'i mchog gis bka' stsas nas// gnas pa
89a6(rgyud): gyur te mi gsung bzhugs// de nas sprul mchag lha mos gtsor kyur dga' bar byed cing yid 'phrog la// dga' ba rgya chen skyed cing che dang thaMd sbyin bstan pa'i tshig thos pas// lha tshogs lha min chags bcas

89b1(rgyud): rang duSh+Ta pA duSh+TaM ma ma kr-i te dza~M b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ mo ha la/ ban+d+ha ya/ hU~M hUM hUM/ phaT baT pakra sarba duSh+Ta sA mA ni tA re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gzungs rdzogs so// ra ma zlas te// sdug rung chud 'phrum la gtugs te nus so// 
89b2(rgyud): t+ya kar skad du/ Ar+ya tA dA sa pra te dz+nyA nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dpabacos pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'phags ma grol ma la bag 'tshal lo// de nas sbrel ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzung
89b3(rgyud): spras pa/ tad+ya thA/ ai tA re tA rA ya/ hUM hUM b+h+yAM/ sa ma ya s+thi te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sarbA b+ha ra Na/ bi bU Shi te/ pad+ma ni pad+ma/ ma hA pad+ma/ A sa na s+thi te/ ha sa ha sa/ trai loH bar de/ sarbad ba dA na ga/ pu de te sma d+ha hi/ b+ha ga/ ba ti tA re/ sma rA
89b4(rgyud): b+he/ b+ha ga pA ta/ ta thA ga te s+ya/ pud ta/ sa ma ye/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA satwa ab lo ke ta/ ma ni ka ni ka/ bi tsi tA b+ha ra Na/ o'i log ya/ tshi ga mo// b+ha ga ba te d+h+ya re/ Adz+dza hU~M phaT mAr+tha/ gzungs sngags 'di yid kyis dran pa tsam gyi
89b5(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad dbar du 'gyur ro// dkar po'i chos brgyad dam bco lnga la 'phags ma sgrol ma la mchod pa chen

89b7(rgyud): da pa 'byung bar gyur ro// de nga sachog gi chu las 'argyag/ 'phags ma skams dang gisadam bcas pa'i bzung sa rdzogs so/ # pang rgya tham gyus// ko rgya gang skad sa
89b8(rgyud): rashA r+k+ka k+Shi s+'u / bod skad du/ 'phagasam sprol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyo pa'i mdo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// btsun pa sgrol ma 'a phyag 'tsham mo// bcam ldan 'das shAs
90a1(rgyud): pa phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos bdu pa gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das ribs kyi steng lha'i gnas na bzhugs pa de nyid du 'khor rnams kyi nang nas lha mo sgo mas 'di skad ces smra/ 
90a2(rgyud): so// mthong sa ma rten sna 'di pob nas// la ma dang la sa the 'bras bu shes par byos// bang po na ci ngan pa snang ba shes// gang dag sreg pa'i lasanapas spyod byed pa// 'ang gtan pa ros drar du / 
90a3(rgyud): 'gyur te// dud 'gro glen lcags gcig la gcig pa dang // gyen 'bur 'bab 'dzag pa langs ngal bal la// 'jigs shing de skag shin du sdig la' ba// yon dang bcas pa'i sdug bsngal bsam me byas// 
90a4(rgyud): sbom dang lus mi 'tsham// bza' btung sdang yang gzhan gyis bsrungs pa dang // kha cig zos kyang me dang mtshon du 'gyur// ltogs shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab// dmyal
90a5(rgyud): skyes pa'i sems can de dag ni// rang dbang med par gshin rje gadreg pas khrid // 'bregs shing bcos te mtshon gyis rab tu 'thub// bslan klags med pa'i sdug bsngal che dang grang // desan tshe 'dir sdig pa
90a6(rgyud): las byed pa/ rang gis rang sa mngan ni char byas yin// bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal drag pas gdungs// bar pa'i dus med bstan pa'i glags kyang med// drin pa gsal bas las kyi 'bras byar shes/ sdug/ 
90a7(rgyud): bsal ma bzod smre sngags rang la mo// skad ngan drag po'i khu smras gzhan yang skyelas de las sogs te sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab// gang dag nyes dmigs rab tu shes kyis la// ngan song gsum gyi rgyu/

90b3(rgyud): rig sngags de bsgrubs na// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du myur du 'grub// dper na n+ya pro d+ha me sa bon ni// shin tu phra yang chu lung lags bran na// dgung zla bdun na dpag tshad tsam du skye// bems pa phye 'i 'gyur yang de 'dran// riH/
