90b5(rgyud): gis gnas su logs par phyin pa yin// byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms ten// byang chub sems ldan dge baspyan gyur na// yang dag rdzogs kyi lam thug 'gyur te// nges par mkhyen nyid pal 'gro bar 'brur
90b6(rgyud): mangs nyid skyes bu'i mtheb nas shor thur na// mi bapang snyam yang shin tu 'phangs par 'gyur// cong nyid don kun chub pa'i gang bka ni// mabyon snyam yang b.ris sbyin par 'gyur// bya cha'i rnam pa rang bzhin rdzogs su
90b7(rgyud): a// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'thob par po tsom med// chos nyid rnam par dag parade rtogs na// bdag med srog med srog kyang gcad du med// las med de yi rnam par smin pa med// mtha' rnams rab grangs skyes rnam par
90b8(rgyud): la// dedon rtogs phyir bdag gis bshad pa yi// snying po 'di la gus pas bzlas gyur na// skal pa grangs med gsus kyi sdig kyang 'dzad/ gangan song gsam dang gakhor ba'i sdug bsngal kun// rab tu nang ste
91a1(rgyud): nes tA/ ba k+Shas rbA / sa dAg ru Ni kA ma/ taH thA/ o ta hud dA ra d+ha ris du rnam/  dug rnam ma b+hite/ dza ma ska la/ snyam hA ya/ ma hA la/ ban d+ha ga/ hU~M d+h-iT+Ta/ phaT rbA Ta swAt+ma/ ma Ar+yA bas g+ha gan / 
91a2(rgyud): des / mat+ta sa d+hasa~M/ ahrISh+mA/ sa r+b+he ta mams sa ma sa thAmA/ swanas/  nga / shod+ha mchin ma da pa sangs rgyas nyid kyi sa// ma to la lar tu 'asto// zugs na
91a3(rgyud): chos bye 'dra// shangs kyi skyem chad ud pal bram du'adra// nal gyikye skye mchad ha lo rgyas pa 'dra// sna tshogs sku mangs na chung mtshan ldan sa// chos kye b+ha sgrogs ka paping ka'i gsung // thams cad kun
91a4(rgyud): lakhyams mgon zhugs rje thugs// 'khor ba'i blon gyis mgos pad ma g.yon// sems can don rnams medzad phyir skyabs sbyin g.yas// bangs dang shes papa nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs// rje btsun rnamam
91a5(rgyud): skyabs su mche// 'khor ba'i g.yangs che las bdag skyobs shig/ 'gro drug dang / ba'i gnas su 'khor rere// thugs chen mo'i zhags papa bdag zungs shig/ nang song gsum gyi gnas su shor re// 'khyam
91a6(rgyud): med pa'i sam du bdag drug cig/ log par sna pa'i rags su skyem sa ra// blam byang sem sa mang 'dang bdag slod cig//  shes gnyen dan pa dag dang prad da 'o// seng ge sdang chen me dang sbrul// mnod chudang rims
91b1(rgyud): // shakya 'jigs pa brgyad palas/ skyob mang khyed la phyag tshal lo// 'jig rten 'de da gzhan dag tu// 'dzegs pa brgyad lal brgyab tu gsaso// pa sa 'bras chum tho ba par dag tu// sbyin dang rgyal
91b2(rgyud): byasas 'arjod sa brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab thabs dang smon lam dang // stobs dang de bzhin ye shes pa la phyid// bcu pa de dang mi 'bral 'phrogs par shog/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi du mo gang la las
91b3(rgyud): chos 'di dri ba dang // bklag pa dang / kha thon dang / kun chub pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams yi rangs te
91b4(rgyud): mngon par bstod do// rje btsun ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i mdo rdzogs so// yaTas te pa rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya aT+Tam hA ba la tA rA ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las
91b5(rgyud): gol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub thams dpa' thams cad largyan 'tshal lo// de zhin gshegs pa yon tan 'thung gnas la phyag/ 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas bros dril phyag 'tsham
91b6(rgyud): // de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsal dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zlab mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
91b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pazhi pa'i rgyal pol phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pazla ba'i blam la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'jigs pa mad par byed pa / 
91b8(rgyud): tshal lo// Nak+Sha/ d+ha d+ha / ShA d+har rme na ga ta ma hA lpags te/ gas pabazhig 'i/ yanan tags ge ya mri ta ga la ge rkA ga pe/ yanan tamu/ khe yanan tanaN+DI dud ga/ oM \u0f7fsak+Sha/ rigs kyi bra gnas
92a1(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di dag ni sems can dan songad du 'gro ba rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dzes/ 
92a2(rgyud): su yi rang bayin no// rigs kyi bu byang chubs mas dpa' gang la la gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa de 'jigs pa brgyad po sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / dud 'gro'i rtse gnas kyi 'jigs
92a3(rgyud): mtha' yas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa mnga' yas pa dang / le dgas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / bgrod dka' ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / skye ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / 
92a4(rgyud): 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dag las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// sems rnam
92a5(rgyud): bdag yeng ba med pa ci 'i dus byed cing // sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar skye ra 'bya/ pad me she pa'i lus thob par 'gyur/ sprul pa'i lus kyang theb par 'gyur ro// namaHsa rba bid+ya/ sid dun tu me man tra bAd
92a6(rgyud): swAhA/ 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las smos pazhis bya ba'i gzengs rdzogs so// yang lus te sbyar/ dpal lha mo skrod bya se la bstod pa/ lam gang gis na sanga' rgyas 'byung ba dang // rgyal 'bras bcas
92a7(rgyud): chos kyi bla mar gyus// bkren pa'i rim par rnams bkod pa yi// shes rab dkyil la khor mang la byabs sum che// phyag 'a tshal dpal ldan me byangs can la// 'jig rten khams 'dir sprul dbang brnyes shes/ 
92a8(rgyud): grang me gsus bag shes/  khyos tshan rnam pa bya// sems da kyi smin pa can thogs//  sa kya byod kyi yang // pad chos byi pa sgru pas/ 
92b1(rgyud): chog na me pa'in lus bsgyur// skal byed kyil 'khang tha ba dri med rgyas// thugs rje kyi snganags mag pa mig 'byed pa// dus med 'jig rten kunam bde bdag rigs// de la lha bang tshangs tshogs
92b2(rgyud): shin du 'dug// byams shing bsod ldan snyed rje srid pa'im// lha mo mchog ste 'gro kun myong bar dgyes// 'i tshugs ri bo rgya 'dra grogs pa 'phag pa// shes rab zab cir shes pa'i rten byed kyang // rig pa'i gnas la mnga'
92b3(rgyud): lha yi lhar krungs// sdug bsngal bsal bar rab brtson gnyen mchog pa sa// sra mu tog she 'a rnams kun kyang 'dud/ g.yan lag rnam par shes shing gsung snyan pa// yon tan dri med
92b4(rgyud): bdodo rnams 'bar bar bsgyings// rigs mchog gi dngos bu'i sbe med dra pas o nga cheg 'chang slobs pa'i mchog stsol cig/ sems can kun la rtag tu pa se pasna /  d+ha mchog khyod nam grolas la bzhugs/ 
92b5(rgyud): thugs dam brtan bcas skul ba rnams la yang // dpal ces dgongs shing don kun nye bar skongs// 'di ltar 'jig rten dgan snang ba kun// sgra 'doms khyad par cheg gis don mtshon te// dA na rje
92b6(rgyud): na spyod pa'ang // dbyangs can khyod kyi mthu ste bsam me khyab// gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang brnyes pa// dam tshig bden grub drang srong shes nyen can// lus sems dag rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang // yid 'od sras
92b7(rgyud): 'jig rten rjeb par byed// byang chub mchog gi spyod kyir lud gsong // bdag dang gzhad don phun sum chog 'gyur ba'i/ yub dang ngag yid nam dag mchog 'dod la// bcom ldan 'das mas rtag tu don 'chog
92b8(rgyud): / bdag ni pa zhing byang chub 'am bcod dpa/ sdes dbang ba na ma chen bdud pa/  gtamadun pa logs med dang // bdeg shegs thobs pa'i bar smra tu ga mal// mi sus gyi dang ban
93a1(rgyud): / tog la pa dang na// klan pa'i rgyal batshan dga' ba'i shugs kyis bskyod// mkha' la shA tshogs rnapa par dri 'dod ltar// mtshan nyid rtogs dka yon tan ga tid pa'a'amyang // na mo b+hag sa te/ nga? ni/ 
93a2(rgyud): rna byungs ta 'i med rgya na nga byang na wA/ dpa' mo pas kyim stod pa dgas po// yang /  su sa byug / khod na sa 'dugs
93a3(rgyud): dmod pal lung bstan pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'dis bde ba can na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
93a4(rgyud): na po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po tho ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
93a5(rgyud): slo ba thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
93a6(rgyud): rnams pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na de rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa thams cad sel ba dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sam/ 
93a7(rgyud): pa' chen po dag byed kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi zla dang / 
93a8(rgyud): jig rten 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chad pa bu stegs kyi bkra gi sathams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang ma dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de la sogs
93b1(rgyud): skal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das
93b2(rgyud): ka lung der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi na bas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// lham chen mdapal yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bad du song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la
93b3(rgyud): te/ man 'bum bskor ba byas nas bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'dapa
93b4(rgyud): 'od nams pargya stong sems pa can cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dag gis yongs su bskor te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten myong ba thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags so// lha mtshan mo pal
93b5(rgyud): rigs nas tshungs pa chen po'i gsung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spun ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po'am/ blon po'am/ da
93b6(rgyud): rdo drug da spyo pag dge bsnyen nas dge bsnyen ma padu bram pa'am rgyal rigs pam/ ji'u regs pag dmang sa rigs gang lal su ma tshon mod pal kyi mong brgya rtsa bcud dri ma me pa'i grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod/ 
93b7(rgyud): char ni/ rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang / sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing chomadun dang / g.yo can dang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa
93b8(rgyud): skad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ no dang 'bru dag mdzod dang bang ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs kyi rgyam po de'i khyim du yang dpa la ngas par gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems
94a1(rgyud): rnam pams tshan bad gnas cag 'di na byasags pato// com ldan 'das gsung ni lags par bka' phrul pa legs so legs so// lags pags te/ ga dag lha po can mo
94a2(rgyud): ma gyi ming rnams mdzan pa dang / thos nas kyang sgrub par bgyid pa de dag gi yon tan dang ldan yon ni de dag lags so// de napa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phags pa spyan ngam ga zig 'dang gyu
94a3(rgyud): gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das lha mo pal skyes dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lha bo chen modopal kyi sa de bzhin gshegs pa
94a4(rgyud): kang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ spyan ras gzegs dang phyug sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'ang gtan gyi khams rin pa che las byung la zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i ma tog yon
94a5(rgyud): kyi n+ya mtsho bdu d+ha dang / gser gyi ri bo mdag mdzes ga per 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang po gzhan dag la yang lha mtshan mod pam kyis dge ba'i rgyab bskyed do// de bzhin
94a6(rgyud): shegs pa'i mtshani 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mod pal de'i dge ba'i rtsa rnam par 'phel ba dang / 'grub par byed pa dang / rtag tu rjes bu 'brang ba yin te/ de dag ni 'dir lha mo chen mo dpal yang dag par brjod pa dang / sdig
94a7(rgyud): thams cad sel ba dang nyam sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang / lus thams cad dri ma med par byed pa dang / nor dang 'bru rnams 'dra zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang / dbul ba gcod par byed pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod
94a8(rgyud): sbyid de dang len dag ses pa rji sa mi dag/ sa can pasems nga dun pa gyid pa banapa pa da da / sam kyi nga gan ga shes ga kyid
94b1(rgyud): bya dag yo na pajug 'a bar bya // 'dis skyed bzhin gshegs pa ng+gAg sa kyan phrum lo// de bzhi gshegs pa ta/ yo tan ca
94b2(rgyud): d+ya dang / gser kyi ribo mdog mdzes gas 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kang gA'i mu stegs kyi sgothams cad kyi bkra shis kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsad dan
94b3(rgyud): me tog gzi brjid skar ma'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du snang ba g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyil 'khor
94b4(rgyud): dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi cho 'phrul rgyal mtshan shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od zhi ba'i spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pa/ 
94b5(rgyud): can gyi 'phab zhi bar mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sngon lam rgya mtsho snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin du yongs su brjod pa mtshan ka
94b6(rgyud): dpalal phyag 'tshan lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi zlog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i gan pa byed pal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs panyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phags dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshes
94b7(rgyud): pa brtson 'grus grangs med pal yang dag par rdzogs pa'ang pa la la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i gser mchog snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi yan lag
94b8(rgyud): thams cad kyis dbyangs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sprod la grangs med pa'i 'bod kyi tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sred med khye bu'i brtul shugs kyi
95a1(rgyud): phyag tsha lo// de ti pa gnasas chang pa'i dam sa phya// de shin gshegs pa dang rgya chen panyid pal la phyag 'tsham mo//  na gshegs shi
95a2(rgyud): phyag sa so// da 'den gshegs pa'ang ma chos gyi song kyi rgyam pa'i dpa' 'khrug 'tshas lo// da bzhin gshegs padam pa'a' sngon ma'od bzang dpas la phyag 'tshal lo// na bzhin gshegs pa'i tshong
95a3(rgyud): ga gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi smon pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa na mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i 'bru
95a4(rgyud): blan pa 'dapa' 'phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa da pa las phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po ltar skyes pa'i dpal la phyogs
95a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phror po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'gro rgya mtsho'i dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam chen po'i shugs
95a6(rgyud): tsha lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tsha lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i dpal
95a7(rgyud): sdug 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang 'brumams cad srung pa'i dpal sa rgya 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa na pa 'dren pa'i dbum 'phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs paphun bu mtshogs
95a8(rgyud): dag ga shags pa mtshan di ga tshang byas te/ cang 'a bya'o/ klag par bya'o// de ltar byas ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bumadapa pa mde nams shin dungang du bsgyur pa
95b1(rgyud): na da bzhin gshegs pa thams kyad kyis lung bstan to// mtshan modangal khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpa' chen po rin po chis brgyan ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra'
95b2(rgyud): pa yang dag pa rdzogs par sangs rgyas dpa' nor bu chen kyil zhes bya ba 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de yang lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs
95b3(rgyud): snad mdzad par 'gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams dan gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'adi dag kyang rang las 'od byung ning tshe pag tu med par 'gyur ro// nad ma kha' las kyang sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dag
95b4(rgyud): sla byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang pad ma'i snying po dag las skye bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan te de la ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med pa ste/ 
95b5(rgyud): sa bya ba'i bstod brdzun chags bcu gnyis gang kan/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha ma tshon mo pal gyi ming rnam par nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ 
95b6(rgyud): lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul/ mams cad kyim/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dpal/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang / 
95b7(rgyud): / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi dpal/ lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ gnas thams cad yod pa'i dpal/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha/ 
95b8(rgyud): mayin dang nam mkha' sde dang / mi'am chi dang / lha 'a phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ reg sngags 'char dang / lag na rdo drag do lnga chang thams cad byed pal/ 'dzi rten skyong ba bzhi dang sde dpal/ gzas brgyad da / 
96a1(rgyud): / ge brang brgyad kyi ba ma// man pa'i sa ma/ yus rig sbyin pa ni la/ k+sha shi gas pas can gyis/ rgyal na/ rnam par rnams/ gang kag sugs sems cad pa/ bkrags
96a2(rgyud): thams cad ma/ drim med par byed pa'i dpal/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrogs/ rgyags byed ma/ zla ba'i dpa gnyim dpal/ ga'a'athams cad kyi dpal seng ge la non ma/ pad ma'i mchog 'dzum gyis bka' mA bad/ 
96a3(rgyud): sa/ bad ma las byung ba/ pad ma la gnas ma/ pad ma 'dzin ma/ pad ma dang ldan ga/ rin po che 'od 'bar ba 'brang 'dum dang ldan la/ nor sbyin ma/ dkar mo dkar ma chen mo// lag dkar ma/ bkra shas thams cad 'dzin
96a4(rgyud): ma/ bsod nams thams cad bsags pa'i lus can ma/ shes nyen can gyibu mo// lag pa 'bum ldan ma/ mig 'bum ldan ma// mgo 'bum ldan pa/ nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi cod pan dang ldan ma/ gzugs bzang
96a5(rgyud): / kun gyi gzugs can na/ grags pa/ shin du grags ma/ kI ma/ sman 'dra ba'i sgra gtsad ma/ zla bltar mdzes pa/ dges/ dge byed ma/ sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ 'phagalas/ me tog gi
96a6(rgyud): dpal me tog gi dbang phyugs/ ri'i rgyal po rab thams cad kyi dpal/ chu klung dang mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/ chu dang rgyam tsho thams cad kyi dpal/ mu stegs thams cad mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ sman dang / nA dang / 
96a7(rgyud): nags tshal dang / nor dang 'bru thams cad kyi dpal/ gser sbyid ma/ zas dang skom sbyin ma/ 'od gsal ma/ snang ma/ lus gtsang ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang sgyur ma/ lha'i tshogs thams cad la mngon
96a8(rgyud): phyogs pa 'di la/ ga shini drag rba sa dang / lus ngan dang / brgya byin la sogs pa dpal/ sbyin gyi me/ yongs spyod ga/ gci ji drug gci ji ldan ga/ dun du tshogasam 'apyor la/ rnam pa ma// 
96b1(rgyud): papa dag/ ra tu gan / da byedag pa di na/ ma N+Dal gyiganas mangs bye da kra shas thams ca sa ldan pa/  m-i shis thathams cad 'jigasapa
96b2(rgyud): sa / ltung nga da 'i dzin dang / 'as pa dang pa da
96b3(rgyud): bum dang / sto bya chen mams cad kyid dpal/ lha'i gnas dang / lhathams cad kyi dpal/ bzlas pa dri dang / bzlam brjod dubya ba dang / sbyin sreg dang / sbyin sreg tu bya ba dang / bkra shis thams cad kyi dpal/ 'od snganam mchog
96b4(rgyud): su/ skal ba 'bya ga nga sro thams cad dga' bar brjod pa'i dpal/ 'ang med thams cad kyiganas spyan gyigatso mo pal kyi mchos/ mib ma'i mims cad dang / sgyu ma yin mo thams can byed pal che mchog/ 
96b5(rgyud): khong med 'i gan du pa/ yi sog/ mi ma byed pa/ lus dan la zug sachos kyi rgyal po'ang can mo sdug bsngal mams cad pas rnam nga ra gzigs shing sla cig/ bar bar mdzod cig// yonam pa
96b6(rgyud): tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur bar mdzod cig hAH/ oM swa~M ga saN ti dwe mA khe swAhA/ oM maH bide tre s+'uhA sa med re/ ri NI s+thAn/ natur bdal Na nak+Shatra/ grata yAn+ta hAg/ nA d+ha mAta swAr+tha/ prad+d+hA sA hA/ beSh+Ta be ma
96b7(rgyud): /  sh+tha sa? \u0f88\u0f90 la rmA/ ma na zinas pag med mi ldan / AH/  /  bram snas / sags AHsa[।]9/  k+Shak+Sha9/  \u0f7f/ 
96b8(rgyud): na/ mas brag byes smrams ta nyim seM / yang pa tam rnaMs / pa'i sa mi dang man gas pa sgos sa rten nan/  ma po bya // 
97a1(rgyud): sa tha~M te gas pan sha me swA hA/ 'jigs 'bred pa spyan ngas gzigs dang dbyug/ gapa lnga mchen mod pal gyi ming nyes sdig pams cad med par byed pa/ sdig pa rnams par 'joms
97a2(rgyud): par byed pa/ bsod nams thams cad sdud par byed pa/ bkra mi shes pa thams cad med par byed pa/ dpal dang / bde ba dang / skal pa bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshar// 
97a3(rgyud): di dka 'chang ba dang / klog par byed padas nang par langs te gtsang mar byas la/ sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang bdug pa gsol napa/ lha mo chen yod pal la yang tsan dan gyi bdug pa phul ta ga gas na dwe
97a4(rgyud): dpal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur/ lha thams cad bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sred par byed par 'gyur/ de'i dgos pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
97a5(rgyud): cho ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lha mo chen mo'i dpal de dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / me dang / lha
97a6(rgyud): baped dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten me rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa lha ma chen mo'i dpal lung bstan pa rdzogs me// k+Shan lung rgyud 'bul la gtugs nas nus/ 
97a7(rgyud): dwagar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA shi yAHswA traM/ bed skad du/ 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
97a8(rgyud): ba can na bzhugs sa// de nas byang chub sems dpara' sems dpa' chen po'i phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song sde phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyin pas la ma ga pas phyag 'tshal
97b1(rgyud): lo// bcom ldan 'das ra bskor ba lan gsum byas te phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzugs nas 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ dab
97b2(rgyud): na me'i mchar bcu gnyis po 'di dge slong ngam/ dag slong ma'am/ dag bsnyed nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am des yin pa gzhan lang rung ste/ gang gis shes pa dang gang la la 'char ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa de ni dus/ 
97b3(rgyud): bor te thug por 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis de ltar gyur cig ces kun nas gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste/ dpal ldan pa/ 
97b4(rgyud): kra shes pa/ pad ma'i phreng ba can/ nor gyi bdag mo// dkar mo// grags pa chen mo// pad pa'i sman/ byed pa mo// rod chen mo// zas sbyin ma/ rin po che rab tu sbyin ma/ dab 'a chen mo// s+yAd la ze de/ dzi ni/ g+h+ri ni/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha/ 
97b5(rgyud): bshane/ a bang+tha ni/ men sha ya sed+d+hAdrA me man+t+ra pad sa swA hA/ oM DA ku n+de par ma su b+ha ge swA hA/ la ne gsum du brjod par bya ste/ gang la la dus gsum du 'don pa de'i me mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// 
97b6(rgyud): galal la bang por ldan par 'gyur ro// byor pa pad ma shes par gyur ro// med thad du 'gro ba'i cha bklags nas phrad par byas na me sa de la bu'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur te dka' bar 'gyur ba ji srad pa sa bzhin
97b7(rgyud): da do// rtag tu rgan me 'chad par bklags na tshangs pa dang bral zes drug shul kye las byas kyang 'i tshugs par 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas mang pal bsnyen bkur byis par yang 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
97b8(rgyud): bka' stsalanas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang sdug yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo rdzogs so// byar kar kye/ 
98a1(rgyud): // gzhan yod na me dang / bu chen rtsa lo rlo ba 'an de ye shes sngas pabyung cir lus ta gtan la phab ga/ sngag 'ang chud pa bram la gtug sa te/ yang lus sha/ dpal kyi lha mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa
98a2(rgyud): dkon mchog gdum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags baspyan ras gzigs dang byug la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag na rje la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ma mtshan mo la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos padus gcig na// 
98a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bde ba can gyi 'jig rten na bzhugs to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das gal ba dar song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs ga
98a4(rgyud): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu bdug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal lha mo chen mo yang bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste drung du phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
98a5(rgyud): lamago bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcod ldan 'dra kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas spyan rapa gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong ngam dge
98a6(rgyud): 'am/ dge bsnyen nam// dge bsnyen ma'am/ sems can gang su yang rung bas dpal chen ma 'di meng bcu gnyis shes te 'char ba dang / klog pa dang / sgrub par byed pa dang / brjod par yang byed na de dbul po spangs nas
98a7(rgyud): drug po chen por 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung ba'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du lhur cig ces smras so// dpal rnam chen mo'i ming bcu gnyis ni 'di lta ste/ bkra shis gdapal ldan ma/ bad ma'i phreng thog la la/ nor
98a8(rgyud): das/ dgapags sa// klags chen ma/ 'das spyan mnga'am/ grags sa/ 'od cenam/ khas sbyin ma/ rin chen pod ldanam// dpal chen mo ma// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// spyan ras gzig pa dang stsags/ 
98b1(rgyud): to// dpal chen pas phyag 'phrul la// 'das ste/ don/ gau/ dgas pa mas cad sgrub par mdzad pa sems na man mo/ dag ga mi shes pa thams cad bsal bar mdzod cig swAr+tha/ bcom ldan 'das kyis / 
98b2(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pyad ngas gzigs dbang thug bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba la mngon par dga'a'o// rapal kyi lha mtshan mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis gajog
98b3(rgyud): t+ya gar rtsi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / zhu chen kye lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ stag lung rgyud 'bus lag tu ga nas nus so// ye d+harma he tu pra b+ha bA he tun te ShAn ta thA ga tod+ya ba da ta te ShAnya
98b4(rgyud): yo ni ro d+ha e baM ba dI ma hA shra ma NaHmaMg laM b+ha ba tu/ shu b+has stu sarba dzA ga taM/ shuk+taM/ yang zhus she/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba karma A pa ra Na bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NA~M/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
98b5(rgyud): dam par skyong ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das me 'bregs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo dA tra yA ya/ a~M ke ka ni kaM ka ni/ ro tsan ro tsa ni/ tro Ta ni troT ni/ trA sa~Mni tA sa na/ pra ti ha na pra ti ha na/ sarba karma pa raM pa rA Ni ma
98b6(rgyud): swAhA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na las gcig na sa gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad dam par dag par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na mtshams mdapal yang
98b7(rgyud): byang bar 'gyur ro// lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na ltas ngan pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / bkra mi shes pa rnams med par 'gyur ro// lus la 'chang ngam/ glegs bam la bris nas mgul du thogs te 'chang na
98b8(rgyud): del dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams gtan du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gang zhig snying rjes non te re dgas dang / bya dang/ midang mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rung ste/ 'chi ba'i na lung du brjod na deng na sang du 'gro bar mi na / 
99a1(rgyud): rang da gi sa dus las dpa na ni 'phong ba'i ming na pa sgos tede'i phyir byams pa dang / snying rjes lan brgya ma/ stong nga 'bum brjorjon sems can desams can dbul bar skyes su na
99a2(rgyud): kyang de'i mod la thar bar 'gyur ro// sa 'am til lam/ yungs kar ram/ chu gang yang rung ba la bzlas brjod byas te she ba'i lus la gtor ram/ khrus byas nas de'i 'og tu bsreg pa'am/ yang na mched kyi nang
99a3(rgyud): du bcug skye banag la/ rigazugs kyang bris te mgo bo la btags na deng na sang du skyes pa yang zhag 'dun gyis gdon mi zabar thar te bde 'gro ma tho ris kyi 'jig rten du phye bar 'gyur ba'am/ yang na rang gi smon lam
99a4(rgyud): dbang gis skye bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig zla ba nya ba'i tshe khrus byas la gtsang mar byas te dus gsum du gos brje zhing kha zas mi za ba 'am yang na zas dkar bag bza' ning sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rted skor bzhin du/ 
99a5(rgyud): gang gi ming dang ldan pas lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na de ngan seng nas thar te gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i res su skyes nas grub pa po'i thad du 'ongs te mchod pa byed cing lus kyang stan la legs so// zhes bya ba yang byin
99a6(rgyud): nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de'i ming bris la gzungs sngags bzlas brjod byed cing mchod tan 'bum byas la gdugs dang / rgyam mtshan dang / bdan la sogs pas legs par mchod nas
99a7(rgyud): mtsho chen po dang / yang na chu klung du btang na des sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa nas thar bar 'gyur ro// yang na de ltar mchod pa byas nas 'jug tu lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten chen po byas te/ gdugs dag rgyal
99a8(rgyud): ramachod la 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la yang mchod ston gsol nas yon yang phul te lags par mchad nas cheg mo zhig gi dge 'i'i rtsa bar gyur cig/ 'di kho nas
99b1(rgyud): nges kyi 'jig rten du skye 'ang gyur cig ces kyang shes par byas na de kho na bzhin du skyes nas lus kyang ston cing legs so zhes bya ba yang byin nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'am/ dam 'i chos
99b2(rgyud): spyo 'am/ 'phags pa sa sru ba btab pa yang rung lta ng+ge shAr rtseg dul ga zungs sngags 'di kris pa ma dzan de'i las kyi sleb thamams cad 'dapar bye na/ 'don pa dang bkras dzod byed pa lta ci smos te/ de bzhin
99b3(rgyud): gas nyid napa des kyi rje na shos rgyas cang gi sang pas gyu // migs pa ma sa nas sa gas / 
99b4(rgyud): gangagatan sa nus dag bac+doMs // yang zhus te/ ga ska du/ AH 'i tum paN+Da tan du/ 'od na du/ 'phags pa rig pa mchog gi rgyud chen po// sangs rgya pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
99b5(rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di ska 'dag gis thos padas gcigan/ bcom ldan 'ad mnyin yodan rdul bu rgya ba byed kyi tshal mgon med pas byin gyi tsun dga' ban bzug pa so// den sa byang chub sems dpa' ma dpal
99b6(rgyud): na la gan nga rig pabyeb thag dmas ston pa/ bcod ldan 'das gal 'ded rkyen pa par kyang las babs // bcomaldan nas kyigabs dpag pos phyag 'chi nas bcom ldan 'das pa lan ga sum
99b7(rgyud): ka tshal nas bcom ldan 'das lal na gsus bskar byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dpang ldan 'byung po bye ba breg du mas bskod nas mkhor de nyid du 'dres par gyur te/ com ldan 'o// 
100a1(rgyud): zhabs da phyag na rdo rje bral go bos phyag tsham das phyogs gcig tu 'dug god nam gdos pa'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa yang 'khor nga nyid du 'dus par gyur to// rgyal ba chen ro ni
100a2(rgyud): yang g.yog 'khor bye ba phrag dubs kun nas bskor te 'kho de nyid du 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyinapas la mgobos byas byab ta phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na dongs ma/ 
100a3(rgyud): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la' de logs bu thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
100a4(rgyud): sems can thams can kyi don ci du du bdag gsang sngags kyi tshig 'chad par gnang bar mdzad du gsog bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lagan rdo rje la zhi na ce sa bka' stsas to// 
100a5(rgyud): khyod ni shin du ma ngas pa/ lag na do khyod ni shin du brtsam pa med pa/ shin du gtum ba yin na/ ci ltar sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsang sngags 'chad/ lag na rdo rje khyod ni dam tshig shes pa yin na/ sems can
100a6(rgyud): gang dag dam tshig mi shes par 'arjod pa rnams dado rjes mdzar byed pa yin na// khyod ci ltar gsang sngags 'chad/ gsol pa com ldan dra da da ste ga mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag rig pa mchog 'di'i don
100a7(rgyud): 'don pa dang 'chang ba dang mchod pa bgyid pa de dag ni bdag gi dam tshig 'tshal ba lags/ bdag gi dkyil 'khar du zhugs pa lags pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan
100a8(rgyud): 'das la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po las na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi yi ge bani bzhes bkyi ba 'di ni rig pa'i chog thams cad kyi snyi por hU~M rang la mang po rab tu sgrub pa/ 
100b1(rgyud): stobs dang pa ga gdon pa dpag tumam ches pa bstan pa gogs ma mchi bste/ bas ldan 'das rag pa'i rgyamapa' da par bgyi'o// ci kye lha yu la dang sa dang rgyal gnas pa byung tso chogs rnams khyed / 
100b2(rgyud): cig tu kyis la nyon cig/ rjes mgo bkas par gyur ta de/ de nas lag na da rjes rang ge rege pa'i tshogs la bltas nas gsang sngags smras pa/ na mo bA tra yA swa nAm sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra bA NId+ha/ ma hA rak+Sha sa nA pa ti \u0f7f/ mahA Tha
100b3(rgyud): pad+yAt+te ma ya rtse mi ni du rmi ni li swAhA/ da nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'dar yang yer nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
100b4(rgyud): skyeb tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag la bskyab tu gsol// de nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig/ rig
100b5(rgyud): rgyal podron par gyis shig ces dbugs phyung ngo // de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lagan dong // 
100b6(rgyud): lta bu'i gsang sngags kyi chog dag 'chad pa na ma tshar to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dag pa'i rgyal po gang na gnas pa dang mchod par 'tshal lo// bu klog pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa dang / sgrub pa'i rig sngags
100b7(rgyud): nga de'i brtson pa bskyed par ba kyi'o// bka' dul ba/ rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i las ni 'di lags te/ srad bu 'amathal ba'amatshul lan cig 'arjod pas bsrungs par bgyur
100b8(rgyud): e ga gas tshananan pos na/  dzod na pa da/ ngan drug ga zug thams da na u so+o/ nag ma dzin sngags cid bar gyur to/ 
101a1(rgyud): bo nag brgyad la 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bkyi sa la rig sngags gang yi ge ma tshang ba'am dran pa nyams pad lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de/ rig pa'i mchog gi snying po dang ldan
101a2(rgyud): cig tu lan gsum brjod na rmi lam du ston to// ci ste las bcad par gyur na rba ku shas byab par bya ste ngogs par 'gyur ro// lagan rdo rje'i mdun du lan bzhi brjod na dge ba dang mi dge ba ston par 'gyur ro/ 
101a3(rgyud): ci 'dod pa bzhin du sbyor babakyi sa nal pa rnams su 'gyur ro// gdon tshar gcad na thal ba'am chu 'a ma dur khrod kyi sol bas bstan no// yang ni gzug pa bgyis te sdug ma bzlas na gtong bar 'gyur ro// yang na
101a4(rgyud): pa la gzugs bkyis te dur khrod kyi sol bas lag mthil la rdo rje bris te lag pas pa
101a5(rgyud): bkyis na yungs kar dgal lan bdun bdun sngags te bskrun namakha' 'grom thams cad ma drangs par 'gyur ro// dpa' par babyin rna bar ba blang 'jod bzhi'o// yang na can dan dmar pos dkyil la badzi/ 
101a6(rgyud): gas la rje rtse lnga pa bris te gu gul gyis bdug pa dang ma tog/ rnams kyis dba' po// phyag rgya gzhig na chu'am thal lcags sapa/ so bag gi dum grwa rnams kyis so// dug la la g.yon chu'am/ ma bu'i mdongs
101a7(rgyud): samanu kri'am mye long gis so// mang ci yogag bcu bzhinas la gan daji mdun du gagagasum bsrung bar byal la lan brgyad stong bzlas pad ba gyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la ga nga sa das pa rtsom par
101a8(rgyud): gyur te/ de'i 'og tu dug gso ba la sogs pa dang sas gzhan rnams kyang bgyi'o// gal te mkha' 'gro sa rnams shin du bcad par 'tshal na/ 
101b1(rgyud): na 'breg pa 'i ngan pagan rdo rjes ji nan shad pa bzhin du tshaci tsam 'dod du' par rig sngag thams cad mdungs par 'gyur ro// de snang gardo rnga bkyis te rig sngags 'chang gi ming nas 'jo dralal la ldan cig
101b2(rgyud): ga na' bshigapas krung sti dbyin ci dge sngags mang dwa'i gsang sdugs rnam pa ma 'jug go/ ren sngags gcad pa rab byed 'ardza na/ rig grags 'chang gi gzugs ba kyis pa gzhan bcad pa banyis pam thu
101b3(rgyud): / rig sngags pa shig par babyed rgyal 'ang rig sngags de rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig brjod na rig sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur te lang mi bgyid do// rig pa 'jug pa tsham bas ma kyi kya
101b4(rgyud): nyid zhag gcig bsnang bab kyi sa la lagan rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pabakyis te/ 
101b5(rgyud): bkyim na bzlas 'arjod byas pas chog ste/ tshig ma'i rag pa la gnod pa mdzod cig ces ba kyis na rig pa de las mi bgyid do// rig patshar gcad par bgyid thal ba la gzugs 'gyi ste/ rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan ci/ 
101b6(rgyud): 'arjod pa rkang pa gdon pas kyang phyis na rig pa smad pa dang nyams par 'gyur te las mi bgyid do// gal te rig sngags 'chang gnag par 'tshal na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig sngags 'chang gi ming nas brjod demar ma'i snying pa ma
101b7(rgyud): sde dang babs 'badud sbyin sreg sa ces na dag sngags 'chang ba shig par 'gyur te bsodonams kyang 'jig// srog kyang 'jig go/ rig sngags 'chad de'i che rtse tsam par gsang sngags rnams mi 'grub po// srang gsor / 
101b8(rgyud): ma na pa sa zhugs pa khyon sren pa cingasas te sus gcigs da sa du phyin drug pa na sa gru // las de nin bsgras yang da / 
102a1(rgyud): te kha zas po skyo 'thung zhing lan 'bum ba zlas brjod bgyis na rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur te de la bu ci phyags gsung bar 'gyur ro// des bcom ldan 'das las
102a2(rgyud): thams cad mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de zhin du kar cig ces brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyung ngo ro// den du yid kyis bzlas 'arjod bkyis na rig grags 'char yang 'brug go// srog mkhar gyis las sprul
102a3(rgyud): ces te sngags kyis btab na klu thams cad 'chi'o// dbang du yang 'gyur ro// gseg ma la lan bdun sngags te mtshor por na mtshe skam par 'gyur ro// 'bab chu chen por bor na 'bab nu chen po skam par 'gyur ro// 
102a4(rgyud): du bor ba de snyam par 'gyur ro// bdag gi rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni rig pa'i rgyal po sems cad dang rig pa thams cad kyi mchog tu 'arjod pa'o// gal te rig pa gzhan dag gis las mi 'tshal na lang sbyor ba 'das
102a5(rgyud): gapa thams cad sbyor bar bkye'o// las thams cad bgyid do// las bgyid na rig pa'i rgyal po dang lhan cig lan gsum brjod la 'ga' zhig ma mchis na/ de'i mgo dum bu zin thig le'i skem bzhin du 'gas par 'gyur ro// 
102a6(rgyud): ngagi tshe gas ba pa rnams kyi gsang sngags grub pa de'i tshe las thams cad tu rig pa'i mchog bzlas brjod pa gyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te lagan rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa
102a7(rgyud): kyis la bskrad su 'thun gyi mang sar blangs te/ mar sar des med ldeng gi mer lan brgyad stong sbyin pasreg pakyis na rig pa'i mchog rig pasgrub pa rnams ladam pa snom par 'gyur ro// gang gi cil ros 'bros
102a8(rgyud): par gyid pa tshal na lungam lam san brkyed snang byin sreg bya'o// seMs ga gis tha mang ngan sras par 'gyur ro// mang gyi nyin na// gcin bskyed pa khyis tel gan rje mdun du mda'i zugs bu sa lda 'o// 
102b1(rgyud): da rgyud stong srid srogs kyin tan c-ig d+ha par 'gyur ro// ma byo zhag bcu bzhin sa zhig gi ngas bskyed pabacos tal gan rje ba mdun du ma rtag ku mu dang na dang snang rgya dang mar la sgrags pa khri ma'i nang du/ 
102b2(rgyud): nyi theg pakyi san tsha bar 'gyur ro// rgyamatsho'i smra ba dang tu spos dang sdong dros rnams cha mnyams tem bya ma khris pa dang ri lu kun ma tsam du bgyis te/ lagan ni rje na mdun du rig pa'imachog lan brgyad stong bzlas
102b3(rgyud): rjod 'akyis la sbrul gyis zin pa la tshul btab na 'dzag pos zin pa yang 'tsho'o// srin bus zin pa dang bal srogs dang 'bras/ phreng ba 'gyur ba la cha bskol nga las btang ngo // sbrum mabum phyin pa la ni na ra las btang na/ 
102b4(rgyud): debar btsa' bar 'gyur ro// bus pa gdon gyis zin na gdug bas bdugs pa gtong bar 'gyur ro// bud med byi nad la ni dang ba la btang ngo // phug tu 'jug na lus la
102b5(rgyud): cad las thar bar 'gyur// lagan do rje'i mdun du srad bu la reg pa'i mchog brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis te lag pal btags nas g.yul ngor zhugs na pha rol gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i thal ba'am/ 
102b6(rgyud): shal ba gtsang mas khas por bkang la rig pa mchog bzlas 'arjod pa cis na rkun po gang na 'dug pader mche'o// gang gis reg pa'i rgyal po 'di 'id kyis 'azlas brjod pa kyis 'di la dbang phyug ched podod dbang phyug chen po
102b7(rgyud): tshogs dang bgags dang log 'dren dam mkha' 'gros dang / sbyin po dang sha ba dang gnod sbyin dang 'thung po dong grul bus dang sbal po dang mdangs 'phrog pa dang gdon 'argyan sa dang ma mdo la gan rdo rje'i phyag brnyan dang gang gis
102b8(rgyud): grags mi da kyil na rdo go shes pa so// bcom ldan 'anas kyi / ba ma phyogs gtsang par mdzad pa pa kyis te bu sha'i mdung ca gsum pa sogs ma zungs kang dang rgod dgang rtsed ma bsreg
103a1(rgyud): thugapasan te shu \u0f7f gcig sbyin sreg pa cining nyin bdun dus gsum du gces bur ba bzhig la ba gyis nor stsol bar bgyid do// ma pon gduganas pabartsams ta mtsho bram dum chis / 
103a2(rgyud): mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad pa'i bar du yangs kar dag las sbyin srag lan brgyad stong ba kyisan nor dang gos rnams stsol bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal pa'i mchog sgrub pa ni ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas mgod
103a3(rgyud): pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon ci rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bri bar bgyi'o// galas phyogs su la gan rdo rje snyan nang tshangs can gyi steng na mchis par bri'o// la gan rdo rje'i 'og tu rig pa'i mchog bri'o// 
103a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ni gser gyi/ khadog lta bu'o// lagan rdo rje ni sngobasangs te rgyan thams cad kyis 'chan pa'o//

103a6(rgyud): 'o// me kha las me rtog su la bar bgyi'o// gdod dkar kyis srung ba ba kyi'o// rjesang mos khrus kyi'o// nagasog khyabya cing bar bci lo/ bkren du lha ba'i gdong gis phyogs bcing b.rab kyi'o// derje'i srang
103a7(rgyud): 'i kris 'dug paras 'o// dong ldan mas bgegs gzhos par bgyi'o// shugs ldarnams slar gshegs lugasos so// phyi sa rig pa mchog gi mi'i gzugs kyi mdun du su sul ci ri lu rgyad stong sbyin sreg

103b2(rgyud): nyid nug gcig bsrung bab kyis te shib sa tu'i 'od ba kyi steng du nga ngos pan zhal gyi phred kyis nams gesu mthub pan phred du baN+Dal la dra ba kyi'o// dri bar gyu na rkang pas mchi'o// du 'phrul na mi snang ba dang

103b4(rgyud): a rka kASh+pe ag+ni pradz+wa le/ ru d+hi ra a ga ta na Na ta lA nI aSh+Ta sa ha sr-i drA du yad rA dzA bA sho ba ti badz+ra kA ma pa saM hi ta ma/ ci ste dgragasad par 'dod pa na/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sed ldeng gi thugs bus la yungs kar dang
103b5(rgyud): khrulas lan brgyad stong du sbyin sreg 'gyes na dgra 'chi'o// gnod par sems par bgyid na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du yi dgas kyi shing gi zhugs su bus la til nag pa lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na gnod par sems
103b6(rgyud): par bgyis par 'gyur ro// mar gyi po nag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba ba kyis te lagan rdo rje'i rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bongal bzung sa/ de'i ming nas byung ste bzlas 'arjod ba kyis na 'phral du dgrar mi 'gyur

104a1(rgyud): shAd na du na nga rnam pa ra dag par gyur mo ga k+Sha da so
104a2(rgyud): don ga dgul lag na rje mdun du rig pa mtshon gis ske tshe'i 'brul lan brgyad steng bzlas brjod pa gyis na khyim phung por 'gyur ro// lagan do rje'i mdudan dum dang bsril ba'i rtso 'drulas pan brgyan mong/

104a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bdag rig pa'i rgyal por mchog 'di ni dag pa thams cad kyi gtsong 'o// bdag bsrung na gos kyis na mar mdud pa dor ro// gzhan bsrung na skye gtsug tu sgram dud dor ro// chu srin bu m+b+hi 'i khab cing phyogs

108a3(rgyud): yang kyang zhag brgyad lanag/ cig bskyang ba ba kyis te la dran rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa pa skyes 'asal 'o thos pa'i dong ba nag ste/ de'i rnyed par shing la ga ng+gA'i lomo bdun pa nag la dro'i steng du ldong ngos pan/

108a5(rgyud): sa kyi sum ma dong mchod pargya cher ba gyis pa der 'dug ste slong des byan ma tsas cig khar dradrag la ni srid du pa'i dang dugs par gyur pa de srid du bzlas brjod pa kyi'o// de nas dngas chub tu 'gyur te shig le

108a7(rgyud): pa'i ma rmas ma nyams pa blangs te/ dede ser mo'i sngags bzlas brjod pa kyis pa bcu'o// de rje nye par smos stsal bar bgyi'o// de rje me/ kha las me tog/ sul par bkye'o// de nas de'i snying gar 'dug su me do
108b1(rgyud): bu 'bags kyi bar du rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig bzlas 'od ga rkyen du 'phags pa thag tu pang rog tu lhung ngo // srung sa bu myed bcunye par gnas par 'gyur te/ de dag g.yog 'byor rnams la

108b3(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang du yang 'gyur ro// mar gyi po nag brgyad dam bcu bzhi la skyes pa shi ba'i ro bzhag pa'i khyogs kyi g.yas rol kyi nur shing khyer te song la/ byem mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la de mdung
108b4(rgyud): rtse gsum par bkyis la spangs mo po'i bas bza' zhing rig sngags 'chad bzlas brjod pa'i'o// khyim mar gyi 'onag brgyad nas / ga gsum bskyang ba bkyis te dur khrod du song la mdung rtse gsum pa la mchod pa cu
108b5(rgyud): bgyis te/ mdud rtse gsum pa lag pa g.yas par thogs la/ rig pa'i mchog lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod pa kyis na mdung rtse gsum pa las 'od zer 'byung ste de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// mtshan myong tsugs na
108b6(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bud med dag 'byung ngo // skyes pa ci la ma reg par ches bdag kyang nye bar gnas so// gang bsams pa thams cad rnyed do// phyung na thams cad med par 'gyur/ 'byung po rnams kyang phyi/ 
108b7(rgyud): na du 'gyur ro// cho ga kang la blangs pa chog de nyid la bsgrub par bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bani la zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te lagan rdo rje'i mdun du ci nus kyis mchod pa bkyes la de'i mdun du 'bras chan
108b8(rgyud): kyis mim bkang sre 'gag 'bras can me snang bar ma kyang kyi bar du bzlas brjod pa kyi'o// de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te phyis 'bras can la 'pho bar pabyed do// ngas kyang 'pho bar 'gyur ro// 'brur rnam pagan/ 
109a1(rgyud): sa/ nag yun gag sa kyis sa kyis pa shi / sa 'dags /  chog no/  na gyu
109a2(rgyud): dzad pa ces dag gis sa rgyangs gras parjo kyis pa kyis na pa //  bo gis bdug su ni na gras brjon pa che na gto sbyi //  na
109a3(rgyud): nan na byu ba sa sa nga shing de zugs thus pa'i kyang gi bags pa pas zugs khyo mi zhes 'dzid sbyin breg pa san pa gra rnams rgyag// skyes pa'i dom sna // 
109a4(rgyud): mas bablangs te nu 'gras kyi phyogs gtsigags/ skams gtsang ma pa'i ma rnams kyis bsu thams cad bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags tsho nyi ma'i phung tshigs la mi ma go shar phyogs su bstan
109a5(rgyud): phyogs bzhir bsnyen bkur bgyid pa bzhi bzhag par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang de'i snying gar 'dug la khang
109a6(rgyud): ltang na lo stong thub po// rkang pal bslus na lo lnga brgya thub ste 'di ni dngos grub po// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin nag gcig bskyang ba bgyis te lagan rdo rje'i mdun du bal sha'i shing gis zhugs bus la shing
109a7(rgyud): ngal pa'i lam sreg shing no dang skad rtsi dang mar le sngags pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi zheng ming nas brjod na thugs chung rnyed do// gal te ma rnyed na thugs chung 'chi'o// dgra gang ldan gyis bdab bar bgyid
109a8(rgyud): 'tshal na du tu btags pa bdag gi tshus pabril pa 'dres pas gas na/ par byangogs brgyad papa mdudu rdzo shing gaslobs kyi pa/  des pan myid nga sbyin sreg pa kyi dmigs
109b1(rgyud): dzin ban 'das so//  da med du ga gragagis bdag pas bdugs pa rigasugs kyang chu stong gas brjod pa kyis nags pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// ra gyi pon// gcig sa mdza/ 
109b2(rgyud): 'dub rba klung krugs la bsas rgya mya cu shing zla b.ra'adra bags brjod pa san yul gro thob po// khram zed par du brkyen par byed rjes draganas brgyad kyi bar dungs gsum dul gan do mdun du pa'i// 
109b3(rgyud): me tog la lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bces la tham bzhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis na/ skyes pa'am bud med kyang rung ba dbang du 'gyur ro// mar gyi do nag brgyad la zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du'i
109b4(rgyud): shing gis thugs bus la yungs kar gyi 'bru mar dang bsres pa'i til las lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi zhing ming nas brjod na dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med yugs sa mo dbang du bgyi na nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba
109b5(rgyud): bstis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ang+ga'i shing gi thugs bus pa aR+Ya'i me tog mar la skyugs pa lan brgyad stong sreg pa kyi zhing ming nas brjod na dbang du 'gyur ro// dus gsum du khrus pa kyi shing la gan da rje'i mdun
109b6(rgyud): du shed mad pa'i cher me las len brgyad stong sbyin sreg 'gyis na nag gsum gyis dbang du 'dran ro// sangs 'byung bar 'tshal na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la dur khrod du songal dur khrod kyi shing gis thugs thus la ngag
109b7(rgyud): rlon pas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg ba gyis ni mings 'byung ngo // zhi bar bgyen yar kyi po zhig brgyad la zhag gcig bskyang ba bgyis te lagan rdo rje'i bdun du shing thamal pa'i tshugs pus la ut+pal la no dang sbra

110a1(rgyud): / na bskyed pa jog go// dbyeb dgas bdud dus gang mang bag ga sung las brgya go sbyin sregs ces dud theb pakyi drar ngo // ngas cag gis cho gargyas pa smra ba ra / 
110a2(rgyud): 'chal bas gam kI thogs pa bdama'i rdzing du sang ste/ mamra hel reg par da ma 'bru phral dang 'i pa'i rgyal popo che garing gi gzugs son ti la buni bya zhes smra'o// das bcom ldan 'das chog rgyas pa'i das // 
110a3(rgyud): ma du gsol zhes brjod pa dang de 'dzin bya'o nas brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ngo ro// de rdzog byas pa las 'byung ba'i las rnams cad dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// gal te des las grub pa des kyu da de'i 'o k+Sha lnga 'di na/ 
110a4(rgyud): dngos grub kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// yar gyi donya nas bzung ste phyi ma'i nya'i bar du mi smra ba'i bcu bzhugs kyis zas su'o skyo 'thung nying de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du 'bum bzlas brjod pabyis na de bzhin gshegs

110a6(rgyud): mgo 'ong bsrung bar bgyis na rgya mar non cing kyad kyis chung po don no// yid garungs par bgyi dgral khub ma dang cham nyams 'apar gyi do dag bcu 'di la nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te lagan de rje'i nga/ 
110a7(rgyud): dulan brgyad snyed bzlas brjod pa rgyas pa 'thungs na thos pa'i dzin par 'gyur ro// yang kyi de chos zhag gcig nas brnams te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mang dang 'om bsres pa la ldan gyi rgya brgyad bzlas brjod pakyi pa/ 
110a8(rgyud): bgyis na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// yang byeng nyal nyin nag gcig baspang ba byas te la gan do rje'i mdun du yang gzhi'i mi tog brgyad mang sbyi sreg pagyis na nyi ma gas
110b1(rgyud): 'gyu ro// nag bdun na lag na rdo rje'i kha nas 'ad zer 'gyur ste ga sngags 'chang la bskor ba byas nas gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang ci ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'thur ro// lo sum stong thub par
110b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mar kyi dag bcu la la gan do de'i mdun du snga ma'i me tog brgyad stong yul na gnas ston par 'gyur ro// cho ga byas bsgrub pa pos nya dang sha dang ti da dang sran chan kyabag dang lte ba shos dang / kha 'da' dang la phug dang

110b5(rgyud): so rnams kyi pa las rnabs kyi'o// bstan bkung gyis parnams kyang bzung bar bgyi'o// de nas la gan dnga'i mdan dung dus pa/ dra kyis tesang ge'i sgra byin gyi bar du bgyi'o// seng ge'i sku thos nas snyam yin gyi

111a1(rgyud): / 'byin te sang ge'i sgras mtshon pa thams cad dpag tshad brgyad khyer mchi'o// reg sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gang dag seng ge'i sra thos pa de dag thams cad sa ma srung ngo // mtshon cha de dag thams/

111a3(rgyud): phyogs su gnod sbyin gyi gzugs bgyis te/ de la me tog dmar po dang gtor ma dmar po sbyin no// pon mo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o// phyogs gcig tu gnod sbyin thams cad la me kha las me tog dkar/ 
111a4(rgyud): grub du 'gyur te// nyin re tin range re bul lo// dpon g.yog bdun gyi zas dbul lo// las 'di bsam par bgyi ste gtsang mar bgyis la lan cig bzlas brjod bgyis te bdag sem smad sru 'thun gyi 'ob blangs pa/ 
111a5(rgyud): tham pa'i bums bsgrubs par mang blangs te mar kyis dranag bcu na la phrag gsum du 'asrung ba bgyis te/ mtshan gcig yod pa phrul rgan do rje'i mdun du songs shing a shwang+ka'i dom bdun phrengs te de dag gsung
111a6(rgyud): gnod byin gyi gzugs mthe bong gi sa tsam zhig pa kyi ste/ de nas 'bul gyi bar du bzlas brjod pakyi'o// de nas sol ma reg par med do// de nas dngos grub du 'gyur te de nyin ten nge dbul lo// dpan g.yogs
111a7(rgyud): gnyis kyi zan dbul lo// 'di ni dngos grub po// rig sngags gang gzhan la byin pa'i rig sngags de phyi dro bzlas brjod bkyis la/ phyi de nyin rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig bzlas brjod bgyi
111b1(rgyud): srab ba par gyur gyi gsang sngags supa 'gyur ro// denas 'byung ba'i bdag po dbang rgan gyis bcom ldan 'das pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po la skye ba na pa ni bskal pa bzhir gnas
111b2(rgyud): pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang che gam rungs pa/ gtum pa drag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das mang brjod pas bdag la gnod pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

111b5(rgyud): lo// le gre bzhi pa 'di yang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mtshungs pa med pa blo bskal pa bzhir gnas pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mang ni mdzad nas bzung ste bshad pa'o// 'byung ba'i bdag po/ 
111b6(rgyud): de bos na sems cad gang dag mtsham su med pa byed padang cang sems can myal ba chen po me dang med par gyi bde ni gnas ma na rig skabs med de/ reg pa'i rgyal po chen po rig pa mchog gis nan de yin no// 
111b7(rgyud): degs par na/ nor bu rin po che chen po'i rgyal po gzug ter ldan zhes bya ba mthong ba tsam gyis nad thams cad med par 'gyur zhing ga do thams cad kyang 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'thung po'i bdag pode

112a6(rgyud): ma pa slong byas te/ de dang shA po'i yang bcom ldan das kyi s+ya/ sngar dang ga nas/ bcom ldan das pa di ska ces gsoto// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad rnam gyis du 'phrul che'i nas dang/

114a1(rgyud): ste/ lagan de dag yog 'khor dang bcas shing chen mdang 'a khor dang bcas pa byung nas dam chog chen po dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khong du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pa shes sgron

114b6(rgyud): glang po'i bdag po dbang ldan kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rig pa mchog gi las stsal bar bgyi'o// mgod pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs
114b7(rgyud): ka kha dag lta ba 'dir sprul to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas phigs sul gan de nga mdog sngob sangs spyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// lag na rdo rje'i g.yas rol du po nya mo bcu gnyis te/ dral ba'i blo gros ma dang
115a1(rgyud): ste/ ngonya mo thams cad kyang rgyad thams cad kyis brgyan par 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon ro dudabang phyug chen po mdog dgar po la pa can mtshan ma bsgreng ba/ dka' thur
115a2(rgyud): thogs dang lhan cig phra bar brtse'o// 'byu pa mdog dmar po mi sdug pa bzhi yang zla bar bya'o// phyis rig sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du khrus pa kyi gang zla ba gcig gi bar du brgyad brgya brgyad brgya
115a3(rgyud): 'azlas brjod rtse zhing bas sra nu skyo btung bar bgyi'o// tha mar lus sbyang bar bkye ste/ de'i 'og tu zhag gsum bsrung ba bgyis la/ gnas bzhir bsnyen bkur byed pa bzhi gzhag go// pho nya mo nams kyis wa/ 
115a4(rgyud): thams rad bgyi'o// ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar rtswa ku sha sbams pa'i steng dul
115a5(rgyud): gzugs kyi spyan sngar ang+ka'i shing gre zugs bus la/ me tog dkar po no dang sbrang rtsi dang bar la bsgrags pas me tog dag byung gi bar du sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu ut+pal sngon po lta bu'i ral kri byung
115a6(rgyud): bar du ljags phyes sbyin sreg brdzi'o// de blangs pa thag tu sA lung lor 'khyim bar 'gyur/ lo bcu drug blta bur 'gyur/ nyi ma 'char ba'i 'od ltar 'gyur/ dpon g.yog drug nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// 
115a7(rgyud): khro nyas stong thu pa gyur ro// de bzhin du grogs rnams kyang dpag cad stong du gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'og ma dbang phyug chen pa'i ral gri bsgrub par bgyi'o// gzhan yang ral sre bsgyur
115a8(rgyud): zlab gcig slongs mo'i bas bzhipa/ phyis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du pho nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o// zhag gsum snang ba bgyis te ral krim chag cing 'phan med pa
115b1(rgyud): blangs la la khril ga pa ga pas na thogs teng bar gyi bar da zhas brjod bkye'o// de blangs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'phags pa// labacwa drug yod pa lta bur 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang stong gi bdag por 'gyur
115b2(rgyud): ro// lo kr-i nyis sdong thub par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'khor lo po sgrub pa bshad par bkye'o// slongs ma ngas pashed byis mar kyi po nag bcu ldan la zhag gsum sbyang bab kyis te/ lag na rdo rje 'i mdun du mchod pa rgya cher
115b3(rgyud): 'chis la gtor ma dang lha bshes kyang shin du rtsas pa sbyar cing po nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o// lcags sna gsum la 'khor lo rtsigs bcu drug pa'i gyis la shing a shwat+tha'i lom bdun gyi steng du bzhag
115b4(rgyud): la'abar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas sa g.yo bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad skrag par 'gyur ro// des blangs pa tsam gyis sgra lcang lo dkyil bar 'gyur ro// lobacu drug yon pa lta drar
115b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mdog nyis ga ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// rig sngags chang gi 'khor los snang bar 'gyur ro// bud ma dab rgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dpon g.yog bcu drug 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang ban//

115b7(rgyud): 'gyu ro// kho brjede khra rbab po// nga gi tshe 'chi bde'i cheg na kyi'o// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po pa da kyil bshad par gyi ste/ brtag par bgyis paganas mnyams par shes rab can gyis kyi
115b8(rgyud): 'char dra'o// ldan bcu gnyis slong nas// de shin du ni khru brgyad pa// des lagapar bri ni// rim pa gnyis pa dpar po ste/ des pa gsum pan dpa'o// kyil la lo ni'i byang phyogs sa// sangs rgyas bcom
116a1(rgyud): dan the sa che// de zhin gshegs dang da de// bco ldan pagad // de rdzogs shing ma pas bstod// nams kun du bsrung bar brtse// rgo zhi tho rnams kyi'o// sha8
116a2(rgyud): phyogs su ni drag pa dang // gzhon dung ni ma mthe// so phyogs suni kyang 'dra' dang // hi rba dang ni tshangs pa bre/ nub phyogs suni ga shin rje drung // t+ya bum ga N+Da ma tho kri/ khyed phyogs su ni b+ha mdo la de / 
116a3(rgyud): / mod pangs can bri// lha rnams 'di dag thams cad ni// ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bre// khyaram bum ma gum chings can gyis bskor zhing sde sgor yang bzhag go// dbus sug tun shed slang srad bu dang bcas pa
116a4(rgyud): rajug gi ni 'khor lo'o// zla ba dang ni nyi ma'i gan// tshangs pa'i ril pa skyi thugs so// gshin rje lo ni brtson no// gzhan dag mtshon chamam la pa'o// thugs ni rab tu bus nas su// brgyad brgyad tshang por

121a2(rgyud): rnams ni mo ga 'dags myong bzung 'ang la god pa'i ngas la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis sangs kyis kyi sku gzugs bribar ba kying // de'i g.yas rol du ku dka' bdapa// g.yon bul ga 'dong dal so
121a3(rgyud): ba bri bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ni gser gyi mdog can no// kun dga' bon sngob sangs so// lagan de rdza yang spob sangs te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lagan pag por pokya/ 
121a4(rgyud): bar bri'o// de nas yar kyi don la dgung gsum sang pabakyis te/ ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du lung thang gi shing gis thugs bus la snga ma'i me tog mar la bsnyugs pa larab rgyad
121a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpral ba las 'od zer 'a gyur ste/ de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// des med kyis gang bsams pa de 'byor par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dam/ rig sngags 'chang nyid ni ma gtogs
121a6(rgyud): / gtor ma rgya cher stsal par bgyi'o// ma bsrubs kyang las rnams su 'gyur ba lags te/ lan bdun pa zlam brjod pa kyis pa'i thal ba'am/ bras bu'am/ chu sa ni bkru bar 'a'i'o// grogs bsrung na spyi bor mdu
121a7(rgyud): do // banag ma pa zlas brjod sa pami mul 'a khor bsrung ngo // gsegs sa lan bdun pa zas 'arjod bkyis pachab tu stsal pas chu then gram 'i dang / chu srin ba cing // paphags ni mas na

121b2(rgyud): 'gyung da dbang du 'gyur ro// chang ma drungs par 'am bar 'atsal na yan 'dun bzlas brjod pagyis pa'i gsegs/ khyim gyi sgostong dong ngo ro// chas la mi 'bying b.ras kyin/ shing sha kya ka'i 'bras bu la lan bdun da zlas

126a8(rgyud): dang mdung rtse gsum pa zhig zab pa/ stor na yod kyis 'di snyam du sems can gang bsodo nams chung ba de'i sgor grang snyam du bsam la reg sngags 'chang des sbyin sreg partse'o// yang na lags bkan te ma du/

285a5(rgyud): dad pa'i me// de dag gis ning mthong shing // rag 'gyur sems can de dag ni// nga'i rigs su gtogs pa yin// mA ma kI ni gang gis mthong // stobs chen de dgang yig nas// yid du'/ 
285a6(rgyud): bar smra par 'gyur/ gang gi tshe chog rgyas pa de'i tshe bla ma ma yon bral nas shAm kI bslang bar bya'o// thams kyang ut+pal ni mtshan dang ldan pa'i sngags kyis mA ma kIni gzugs song bzhi pa byas

291b6(rgyud): dbang du byed pa zhes bya ba yin te/ cho ga rgyas pa 'di khang stong gtsang mar gdon par byed pa gang yin pa de la ni lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin du mA ma kI'i tshogs dang bcas par nges par 'grub par
291b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// nang par langs nas tshogs rnams dang / mA ma kI dang bcas pa'i ming yang dag par dran par byed pa gang yi bye ni mtshams med pa'am grol bar 'gyur te/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams / 
291b8(rgyud): ri 'gyur ro// de nas pA pa sde bsgrub par bya ste/ thos mar gzugs pazang mas las byas pang nas blam kI bzlas brjod byes/ der bA ma kIs bstan na lnga thams cad 'ong bar brang bde dgal
292a1(rgyud): gzugs bzang mas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rig sngags 'chang gis bla ma la mchod pa byas nas mA ma kI blang bar bya'o// 
292a2(rgyud): thams kyang sems mnyam par bzhag pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la rig sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas brjod byed bzhin du sbyin par bya'o// de nas rig sngags
292a3(rgyud): 'chang gis mA ma kI blangs nas dngos grub blangs par byas te/ bla mas gang smras pa de de la 'grub par 'gyur ro// lha rnams ngas kyang mA ma kI blangs nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs
292a4(rgyud): su rdzogs par byas so// rig sngags 'chang mA ma kI'i mchod dam 'chang bar byed pa gang yin pa de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro// ba rol tu phyin pa drug
292a5(rgyud): mngon du phyogs par 'gyur bas rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa yang med par 'gyur ro// mA ma kI la phyag 'tshal zhing me tog gis mchod pa byed pa dang / dri

292a7(rgyud): gang gis nA ma kI'i sku gzugs byas la cho ga snga ma bzhin du bzhag nas ku sha'i stan la 'dug ste/ rI ma bzang bal pad ma stong yis bsnun na mA ma kI'i khong nas 'od zer cig 'byung /

292b1(rgyud): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'i nyi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das pa/

292b6(rgyud): bya'o// bla ba la dad pas kyang rdo rje la mchod pon phul nas bla ma la yon phul te phyag rgya blta bar bya'o// mthong na lag/ rdo rje mthong ba yin te byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rnams la bstan par bya'o// sdig pa byed
292b7(rgyud): rnabs la bstan par mi bya'o// sdig pa gang yin pa de dag gis ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi ming yang mi shes te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa gang yin pa de dag gis ni phyag rgya 'di thob par 'gyur ro// nga'i phyag rgya re
292b8(rgyud): dben par blta par byaste/ phyag rgya mthong ba gang yin pa de dag sa ni reg pa mchog gcog rgyas pa gsang ba dang bcas/ gas chen dang bcas pa lag tu son pa yin no// 
293a1(rgyud): reg tugs 'chang gas kyang phyag tu'i tshogs kyi drung du bla ma la dpag tu med pa'i yon phulal bla ma'i laganas dag pa mchog ni cog rgyas pa nod par byaste/ blam pa dang pa la mngon par
293a2(rgyud): dka' ba'i dngos grub sbyin par bya'o// de ltar byas na bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes kyin pa yin te chog rgyas pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bla ma'i la gnas phyag rgya mthong ba tsam gyis sbyor ba byas na ne byag
293a3(rgyud): rgya gu ba spyad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas sa ma/ su gdung gi gnas su phyag rgya'i tshogs bkod nas phyag rgya la lta ba gang yin pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par rargya bar ts+yai d+d+hi
293a4(rgyud): thangs cad kyi byag bya ba yin no// da ga na 'dug pa de phyag tu gnas pa/ phyag tu gang na gnas bden nga 'dug ste/ da mthong bas de dag nges par phyir ma ldog pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lus

293a6(rgyud): dbyibs pu bye bar byas// de mthong nas chog bzhin du phyag tu cher pa bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sams dpa' chen po lag na do rdu 'khor gyi nang nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das
293a7(rgyud): ngan pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po gsang ba dang bcas
293a8(rgyud): delags kyis bcob ldan 'das rgyam ma'i po brang phung po con du mchis pa sems can rnams gdu bar 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
293b1(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po sog na rdo rjel 'di srad bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje gang khyod kyis rig pa mchog sacag chen po 'od bshad pa ni khyod gtum pa yin/ bstan par dka' ba yin/ shin tu thub par dka' ba yan/ 'phags

293b6(rgyud): 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad del bsrung ba mdzad pa dang las oM kye dngos grub kyang tshurol pa bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lagan rdo
293b7(rgyud): com ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bing brgyad pa gsang ba gsang sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rnams gang
293b8(rgyud): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rdzangs bshad kyis nyon cig/ 'di tu khyod ni glang po'i na ba can yin/ khyod ni h+yan babang po dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni rnam par gnod par yid/ 
294a1(rgyud): khyod ni yon tan rin po che'i 'byung khungs yin/ khyod ni bden pa'i sprin yin/ khyod ni gzugs sdug pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni 'bar ba'i me lce dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni gzugs
294a2(rgyud): mdzes pa yin/ kyod kyi ming 'di dag mkhas pa gang gis thos na bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun gyi bar du sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang

294a6(rgyud): / sod 'di/ ga sang chen bka' stsal pa/ gang lags pa ni bdag lags te bcom ldan 'das de de legs so// de da legs te/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog gi bsgrub pas 'bras brjod bkyis pa dang /

294a8(rgyud): 'tshe bklags na rmi lam ngad pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ngo ro// sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du lan 'bum bzlas brjod pa kyis na sdig pa thams cad las/ 
294b1(rgyud): / mtshams med pa rdza gyis pa yang bskal bababang bar byang chub sems dpar 'gyur zhes bdag 'chi'o// de nas yang san 'bum bzlas brjod pakyis naslob dpon du 'gyur te/ de'i dzin tu/

296a8(rgyud): rgyalas su mo gnyis kyir bya mas pa ga shesas pa'i byas pa cheg rnas parten par / ma gyig thos kya ba no// sring zhing bad da
