344a5(rgyud): mthong na don yod zhi pa dang // gsum mchog bstan mi bzad dang // 'byung po thams cad rab zhi byed// yang na rdo rje stobs pa che// nor gyi bdag po rnam thos bu// gnod sbyin kun gyi mnga' bdag
344a6(rgyud): gnod sbyin gang dag ri la gnas// sa ti dang ri bo che// zho gdong dang ni gdong rgyas dang // 'dod pa'i don sbyin gnod sbyin gang // mtshon cha 'thab cha sna tshogs can// stobs ldan rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / 
344a7(rgyud): rkyal dang rnam par rgyal ba dang // pad ma dkar dang dgra 'joms dang // rgyad phreng rgyas dang rgyan phred che// bdud rtse snying rje snying rje grong // gnod sbyin chen po lngas rtsen dang // gnod sbyin nal ku be ra// nor bu
344a8(rgyud): susu can gnod sbyin gang // nor bu babang zhes grags pa dang // rdzogs ldan dang ni rdzogs bzang dang // rab tu bzang dang bzang po nyid// bdag gi snying pos bkug pas na// de dag thams cad 'dir
344b1(rgyud): gshegs sheg/ ma smos gnod sbyin de dag dang // bdag gi don grub de dag dang // rtag tu dge dang phan byed dang // gnod sbyin gdon ni skyed byed dang // gnod sbyin mo de 'phrog ma mo// bu ma khyod ni 'dir sheg ceg
344b2(rgyud): gas chen snyan gang stob tsho 'o// lud dag kyang 'ad shAg ceg// khyod ni/ gtsuganod sbyin dang // phul lakhong dang na cemaH// margan de rjes rab bsngal pas// las rnams thams cad bgrub par
344b3(rgyud): kyis// dgra yi phyogs dang mdza' bo'i phyogs// de bzhin rgyal pos gang dang // nags dang brag khrod rdzong rnams dang // g.yul du rgyal bar bya ba dang // rgyas pa yi ni las rnams dang // rtsod pa dang ni 'bab pa
344b4(rgyud): dang // bsrung ba'i las dang dbang bsgrub dang // bag ma dag ni len pa la// lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin// rdo rje dbyug sogs lhan cig tu// dam pa 'chang ba'i 'og pa gams// don rnams thams cad
344b5(rgyud): krur te cis// sU tra the dan/ a ma la/ le la le ni ma le snang gsus hi te/ ha na ha na/ sar sa ra/ a sha ne bai nA ma ti shwarA dzA dA ti de bad+yAd+he/ yak+Sha dA ti badz+ra d+ha d+hi sarba kra ha nA sha ne sha tra bra marda ni brda d+hA
344b6(rgyud): i/ bAnA te ba d+hes dak+Sha k+Sha Na mas pa da sha d+huHkak+Sha n+tu ma d+hi saHka sam/ su mu la sem ma/ sha t+yA ho/ nA thAb+hAn+Da ma pa ma thAb Na i pa~M d+hA deH/ a pA rA dza li me thab tubal ba/ 
344b7(rgyud): b+h+ra me ma te d+he ta mno zla ba ni/ a ma le me kA kye/ ma rari he ti/ sem gyi/ de shaha ti/ ma gas ma re hi tAM bi ma le/ na shi hiH/ den+ta ka rma n+te hi dan la g+hA bA shi ne pra she hoti/ sarba rA drA dA be rA dzA ni a pa
344b8(rgyud): ti/ sahA yak+Sha tri de la ba ta ne/ a pa lA me bA bi mam dus ras ra ma rba lak+Sha hr-i da yA ne a be pa 'i sa so ni so na/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ma la ma du slar/ a yAn/ yan sa cal ne/ sarbaM le k+Sha hr-i de pI ne/ han / 
345a1(rgyud): da ha da ha/ ba tsa pa tsa/ b+hany+tsa b+hany+dza/ b+han b+ha na/ mu ru mu ru/ tu ru tu ru/ b+ha ba b+ha ba/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ma karma d+hA ti ma ma karma/ pra b+hi sha/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha naM/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ma ma pA d+hA ya/ 
345a2(rgyud): an+ta me/ katsas da rbaT+TaH/ res sngags da ga pas rgyan// gnod kyin can gyi snyeng po skye/  grags pa// shes ldan don bshad pa yin// dkyil 'khor can pas
345a3(rgyud): mthong dang // dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa byas pa yas// dkyil 'khor che ge de bzhin du// las kyi dkyil 'khor mchog mchod nas// nyin zhag gcig tu spyang par bya// yang na zhagagasum sdung byas la// 
345a4(rgyud): / gtsang mas gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su// gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor rab gastsal bri// yang na zhag gi ngo gnyis las// gang 'dod pa yi mtshan ma ne// bru bana'i lham pa sgo bzhir ldan// thu brtsi pa la dbyibs
345a5(rgyud): legs pa// sangs rgyas dbu gsum shar phyogs gzigs// yang na chos kyi dkyil 'khor bri// de yi g.yon phyogs rig sngags kyis// stobs 'chang lag na rdo rje bri// sangs rgyas rtson g.yas logs
345a6(rgyud): // nor ci dbang phyug gnod sbyin bcas// de dag mdun du 'phrog sa ni// 'og pa ga rig sngags sna tshogs mchog/ de yi ga sngags tshogs kun ni// g.yas phyogs ngos su gnas par bya// rgyal po chen
345a7(rgyud): po yul 'khor sbyang // dri ma mchog gi dpung gis bskor// shar phyogs sgor ne rab gnas shing // nub phyogs su ni blta bar bya// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po// grul bum mchog gi dpung / 
345a8(rgyud): //  phyogasas na san// rgyu phyogaseMnas de byang sa/  na kyi pa /  dang rnams 'jug/ chog rnams can nas sa//  phyogs pa
345b1(rgyud): gang /  na po bar// gan sbyin mchog kya nga gis bskor// byang phyogs can ston gnas//  phyogs phyogs su ga khar bya/ mau khor yug thams cad nas// gdas
345b2(rgyud): brgyad brgyas bskor bar bya// me rnams cad ni shin tu dkod// bshos rnams kun du dgram par bya// de nas gan sbyin gtor ma yang // shabacas dkyil lakhor nang du dgram// mang mel sog pa nas/ 
345b3(rgyud): dang // me tog 'bras bu kun gyis bskor// de ltar byas na reg sngags che// rgyal mo yi ni dam pa 'di// bzlas brjod byed na bshos rnams dang // 'dug pa dril sogs pa dbul// bzlas brjod bsnyen pa grangs med
345b4(rgyud): par// bzlas brjod byag kun nas mchod// bdug pa thags cad nang du bsreg/ bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bkra shis pa// mkhas pas sngon du byas na ni// de nyid bsrung ba'i mchog yin no// de nyid rab tu
345b5(rgyud): bslab pa yin// phyogs bcing ba yang de nyid de// de nas 'di me bzlas brjod rnams// bcu rtsa brgyad ni bzlas par// bsgrub pa'i 'phrog ma 'gul ba dang // sa gzhi dag kyang g.yo bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin rnam
345b6(rgyud): bsna tshogs dka/ kun nas der ni snang bar 'gyur// g.yo zhing sgra 'byin lta bar byed// rab tu 'du zhing 'thungs pa dang // 'jigs pa'i gzugs rnams mthong 'byung zhing // gzugs so cog ni du mar ston/ 
345b7(rgyud): sa 'jigs mi bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni drung dag \u0f7f// re ge sngags tshogs ni bzlas brjod bya// rig sngags rgyal po ba 'bar ba/ rdo rje 'og pa ga rnams bsgrags pa// de tshe bdag nyid 'ong bar gyur/ 
345b8(rgyud): thong de ni spen pa cas// mkha' ba rtsu ba'i mchog tu 'gyur // gzhon nul sogs gnod na kyi// tshogs mchog kun gyis de la mchod// gnod sbyin pazhin du'ang rga ba dang // nga bzhin thobs dang bla par
346a1(rgyud): /  sri dug kyid pagasad pa gan/  na pa 'dzi // rnam pa kun gyis ga sngags pazlas// mgrub na yang gan mags
346a2(rgyud): phar byed pa chu// med cig shes bzlas kya pa// de rnams das sna sa pa// thams cad kyang ni 'asgrub rgyas tug tu bzlas 'arjod rkyen byeg dang // mchod mthun dang mnyas
346a3(rgyud): dang // ngag tu mchod bdag pa yis// don namam byams cad bsgrubs par bya// rdo rje 'og bag can gyi chog rdzogs so// de nas sngags 'chang kun gyis mchod// lag na rdo rje sras gtum go// 
346a4(rgyud): mthong na don yod nas so// gtum po rdo rje 'dzin dgarab/ 'bar ba chen po mchod sbyin mchog/ don kun grub byed bshad par bya// na mo snga tral sa/ na mo ma hAs tras/ 
346a5(rgyud): satwa satwA s+ya/ a ti pa la s+ya/ a pra me/ ya ba la s+ya/ badz+ra sa nA ya s+ya/ badz+ra ka ma das+ya/ tu ru tu ru/ badz+ra se nA la sA hA/ ku ru ku ru ma hA se rA ya sA hA/ shwa ru trA ru/ sarbi satwa/ bu do tA ya swA hA/ 
346a6(rgyud): u/ hA kA pA d+ha ya AH/ mA ru mu ru/ mahA pra ru shA ya swA hA/ ma hA sa nA pa tA ye/ sarba karma dA ya sA ne/ sas ya dza sa/ dA ya mAH/ sa mad+hi dA ya mAH/ sarba dA na dI ni rtsi
346a7(rgyud): swAhA/ badz+ra sa~M A ya swA hA/ a pra ma ya ku rA la swA hA/ sarba ba te sar+b+ba pU dze tA yaswA hA/ pra ti gr-ih+Na bI rak+Sha mo sarba kA pad/ sarba kya ya ma me pA rA ya swA hA/ 'di yi tshig bshad par bya// ngas pashad
346a8(rgyud): tshig bzhin du rdo rjesde// re re'i gzugs ni brgya byas nas// sdug pa'i mchod pas btsod bya nang // bak+ku ram tartag tu bzlas brjid bya// sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rter ra/ 
346b1(rgyud): thug drung yod pa dang // tsa nus kyis de nga bsgrubs te/ snga ni bsten pa 'di dag bya// de nas tha byed yang na gcig/ bang nagag ni 'dun rang rung // dus gsum khrus byas dkar ga badz+rar/ NAn
346b2(rgyud): bzhag rtag tu bzlas brjod bya// kaso sbyong yan lag brgyad ldan pas// nas kyi kha bas dus gsum bzara'// shin du mnyam bzhag dus gsum du// brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzlas brjod bya// der ni mar gyi mang
346b3(rgyud): gnyis// ma shi bar ni bzhag par bya// sbyi nang banag pa'i snying 'aH// zla ba nyal rab bsnyems te// bapa' dang btung bang po nges// skab shos mnyam par bzhag pas dbul// cho ga dam pas bzung ba zhes
346b4(rgyud): par 'gyur// na kun yang ni med byed cing // 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed// srungs kar nas dang lan d+ha dang // shru ti de ga'u shang dang //  yang krudang shu dag rnams// mnyam par bzhug pas
346b5(rgyud): bdun du// seng sdeng ma dag mdud med la// de 'i ming smos sbyin sreg bya// zhag bdun par du lan gcig ni// dus gsum du ni brgya rtsa brgyad// sbyin sreg rab tu legs byas na// skal chung gis kyang
346b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// rgyal 'dis sbyin sreg byas na ni// sems can kun kyang 'khrugs par 'gyur// don gang yid la bzhag nas ni// stobs chen 'di na bsgrub byas na// de le las te byed 'gyur te// 'di la dbyad
346b7(rgyud): pa med// cho ga gzhan yang rtag tu yid la lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te/ 
347a1(rgyud): ngas 'bral par 'gyur te/ 'ad ni de'i rtsa ba'i bsgrub pa yin no// nagags ltung ba byas te/ 
347a2(rgyud): gzugs byas pa/ snu pa'i me tog gi phreng ba phyogs bzhir spyan drangs nas/ gnod gtor ba dang / can dan dmar po dang / kAr rje dmang po dang // rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dgags
347a3(rgyud): cang sku gzugs mchod par byas la/ lu yul dang / a ka ru dang / du ru shA'i bdug pa bsregs shing / mar me dang / dri dang / me tog gi phreng bas mchod pa rgyas par byas nas/ dus gsum
347a4(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ yar gyi ngo chos gcig la brtsams te/ tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi'am/ nywa'i bar du dus gsum du grangs med par bzlas brjod byas na don grub
347a5(rgyud): par byed so//  'i skyeng po rdzogs so// na mo d+he mya ma thA pra rbu shwa ka k+She b+h+ya na ras pa log pab+ha be sh+tsA ba~M/ UM shwa R+Sha a masta la k+Shas na da ye pra bar dA la/ ma hA tA la yin
347a6(rgyud): mapa ny-id rje rnal ma/  / thab rnam pa/  ba la ba n+d+has/ sams A~M/ dz+dzad+hI mthal na 9/ dz+ra la barba/ 9
347b1(rgyud): ka de/ baN+Da la swA hA/ dAd thA karAn ma e kur+tha N+Da rAg tu/ pra d+hi pre tA na ma mar// nam sas ka rma pa bad/ sa rba ga ma ma me dA la/ da ha da ta/ bcas ca da me bA tsas d+ha la sA hA/ sa phyogs ga
347b2(rgyud): pa'am/ bdag gi khyim dungs mnyams pal tshon rtsa sbyin med pas rdo rje sde bre bar bya ste/ gzhon nu'i gzugs 'chang ba gser gyi mdog can rgyan phreng dang / do shal dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / 
347b3(rgyud): n+da lnga tshogs kyis brgyan pa pad ma rtsa ba dmar po'i steng na 'dug ste lag pa g.yon pa na pad ma bsgreng ste 'dzin/ lag pa galas pa dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du 'jug pa bri/ de'i steng du 'du byed thams cadan
347b4(rgyud): me rtag pa'o// 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba'o// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes rtogs pa brjod pa rnams bri bar bya'o// de nas par gyi ngo ches gcig pa/ 
347b5(rgyud): rtsam ning bsgrub par bya ste/ des de'i drung du dri thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor byugs la me tog dri zhim po dang / bdug pas mchod nas bstod pa dbul bar bya'o// mar gyi mar me gnyis kyang dbul bar bya
347b6(rgyud): / gcig ni sangs rgyas la/ gcig ni gnon nul dbul lo// dus gsum du srin sre tham cu rtsa gnyis gnyis bya zhing / 'om dang / bur ma sbyang ba dang / zho dang bur ma sbyar ba dbul par bya'o// til bang/ 
347b7(rgyud): 'byung po'i bas kyi gtor ma yang sbyin no// bas su 'o ma'am phye'i 'de gu'am/ domathun pa'i 'di subazhed / nas dang / sungs kar dang / rba ti dang / nye'u shing dang / bu ga dang / brilang bu dang / 
348a1(rgyud): nges pa med par bzlas brjod bya'o// bzlas brjod byas pas thams cad bsrung ba la sogs pa byed do// cho ga gzhan yang mar gyi ngo gag bcu bzhel kha zas mi bza' bar byang chub kyi shing
348a2(rgyud): drung du/ ba rog mo'i lcib sa la ma krung bas rdo rje'i gzugs byas te/ banub phyogs su bltas nas 'byung po'i gtor ma byas la/ me tog dri zhim po phul te mar gyi mar me gnyis kyang mtshan mo sbar
348a3(rgyud): la/ shar phyogs su kha bltas te 'dug nas/ thog mar shra te dang nye'u shing dang / grangs kar dang / nas rnams mar dang sbyar ba'i byin sreg lan gsum bya'o// de nas gu gul dang bil ba dang / a
348a4(rgyud): ka ru'i bdug pa rnams kyi sbyin sreg lan gsum bya'o// de nas lan sum cu rtsa gnyis byas te/ dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ma thung gi bar du kA ra bI ra dmar po'i me tog la lan re bzlas brjod byas
348a5(rgyud): pas mtshan rangs par snying gar bskrun na des 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas mo'i gtso bo'am me chen po dbang du bya bar 'dod ni nyin gcig bzhin du lan tshwa las de'i gzugs byas/ rkang pa g.yas
348a6(rgyud): pa nas brtsams la sbyin sreg lan sum cu rtsa gnyis byas te/ thog mar ni shu ti dang du ru s+ya/ mar dang sbyar bas lan gsum sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas gu gul mar dang sbyar ba'i bdug pas lan
348a7(rgyud): gsum bya'o// de'i reg tu sbyin sreg sa na sum cu rtsa gnyis byas na/ zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro// rdo rje sden blo ldan gyi// gsang sngags gnyis pa 'do dag ni// snga ma bzhin
348a8(rgyud): bsdam byas na// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// de skad sngar bshad sman rnams kyis// sbyin sreg sum cu rtse gnyis bya// zla ba gcig tsam byas na ni// 
348b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur // dri dang me tog ma sogs pas// lha dang lA man klu rnams dang // sems can kun kyang dbang du 'gyur// zhag bdun bar du dus gsum du// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas shing // bzlas
348b2(rgyud): brjod brtson par byas na ni// rgyal po'i yid du 'ong ba dang // 'jigs pa kun las bsrungs pa dang // skal ldan nor rnams 'phel bar byed// de bzhin me tog 'bras bu dang // dri dang 'dug pa la sags
348b3(rgyud): dang // zas dang skom la sogs pa rnams// sngags nus gang dag byin pa yi// sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur// sngar ba shad sman rnams bzlas brjod byas// sems can gang la phye mA gtor// 
348b4(rgyud): yang na gang la phye mas gtor// yang na gang la zas skom byin// de ni dbang du khugs par 'gyur// yungs kar nas dang lan tshwa dang // shu ti dang ni nye'u shing dang // pri yang ku dang shu dag rnams// cha ni
348b5(rgyud): mnyam par byas nas kyang // seng ldeng mdag ma dud med la// de dag gis ni sbyin sreg bya// zhag bdun lang na zla ba phyed// dus gsum khrus byed nges par gnas// dus gsum bcu rtsa brgyad byas na/ 
348b6(rgyud): sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur// yang na zla ba gcig tsam gyis// don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyung // cho 'di dag nyid kyis ni// lha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang // dri za me dang ma'amaH/ 
348b7(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag pas dbang du 'gyur// snga ma bzhin du 'di bsgrub na// snga ma bzhin du 'dod kun sbyin// 'di ni bsgrub par ma gyur kyang // las rnams thams cad byed 'gyur te// rnam pa gang dang gang dag/ 
348b8(rgyud): / gang gi las ni gang kang sgrub// rnam pa de dang de dag gis// de yi las de byed par 'gyur// rdo rje sde yi chad pa 'di// don yod gzhan gyis mi thub la// las rnams thams cad byed pa dang // 'dod pa/ 
349a1(rgyud): / thams cad sbyin pa yin// bum pa zhabs med mi gnag pa// byed nga sman rnams thams can ldan// rin chen kun dang ldan pa dang // sa bon kun gyis mchod byas shing // go cad nus
349a2(rgyud): dkris pa 'am// de mi gzhi la bizhig nas ni// lan grangs brgyad stong bzlas nga \u0f7f// brnams shing migs pa gnas kyis nas// de rje la ba bsgoms te// dril sogs pas legs mchod na/ 
349a3(rgyud): zla ba nya la mnyam bzhag pas// bum pa des ni khrus kyang bya// bum pa des yis khrus byas nas// mtshungs pa med par skal ldan 'gyur// de yi don rnams thams cad 'grub// rgyas shing dpal yang skye bar
349a4(rgyud): mig dang can dan dang // bzla dang ni sdong po dang // na gsus pa bsnga dang // de bzhin po la brgyad pa ste// 'di dag chan mnyam byas pa// ma skye ba sor btag par bya// rgyal gyi dus la byab/

349a7(rgyud): nas sh+tsa N+Da badz+rarmANeH/ mahA la k+Sha sen pa tiH/ 581re/ kats+tshe hwA bA Na/ shIg+h+raM b+hA ba na bsngon du tu ka la ka ra ye/ a mra kAn naH/ gas sur mi ne ron / ba shems/ kra sri bi sha/ 
349b1(rgyud): grags pa ste// gzhal med khang na gnas par grags// dkyil 'khor cho ga mthong ba yis// don kun rab tu sgrub byed pa// 'di yi las rnams mi bzad pa// ma zhing
349b2(rgyud): dpa lnga ci nas yod// de las gces pa bsdus pa 'o// mdor bstan pa ni bshad par bya// nor 'dod pas ni bsdams byas nas// rnga mkhan 'jis 'i sang mthongs// che ge mon 'di yin zhes// de nas dpe
349b3(rgyud): thugs brnyar bya// gtsang mas 'bras brjod byed bzhin du// bramam bu blangs nas ni// de yi lte bar gzhag par bya// da yang snod kyi nang du gzhug/ rig sngags mchod pa la sogs bya// de yang phan stong
349b4(rgyud): sa ldan pa /  kya yo ya gag pa tha //  / yo du na na bzhin
349b5(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas// sgra chen mtshan gyi steng du gzhag/ khabs 'dod pas kha zas dag/ gang 'dod de ma thag tu 'thob// zong khye chung du 'gro 'dod pas// bzlas brjod byas pa'i rdza
349b6(rgyud): gags//  mi sem par bsnun byas// grong byer bsgrung pa 'akra shi// de ni 'ag rten rnams ca kyi// med du nga bar der 'gyur ro// tsud pa dang ni 'amab // shags pan yang na
349b7(rgyud): gyur// bud med yang ni skyes pa kang // dbang du bya bar 'dod na no// reg sngags blon mo gtum mon// zhag gcig spyang bya ba zlas brjod bya// po'i gang ka/ le lam sreg shing // bzang po stong phrag
350a1(rgyud): brgya rnams kyang // zhag bdun par du dus gsum du// rgyun me 'chad par sbyin sreg bya// dbang du bya 'dod gang yin pa// de dag dang yang phrad par bya// lan cag zhag ni bdun gsum
350a2(rgyud): / byung bsngas //  yong sa \u0f7f/ swA/ na / swA / cho ma na
350a3(rgyud): bcas me tog sbyin sreg bya// de bzhin pa'i kAng ka taTi shing // brgya stong yang ni sbyin sreg byas// ci sta gzhal med khang mchog gam// ci ste ri bo man da nga'i// steng na rig sngags rig sngags / 
350a4(rgyud): byas nas nges par dbang du 'gyur// arga ye ni lam sreg shing // gzhag par bya ba'i dam pa yin// sne hA dang ni dri ldan kun// maM sreg shing rnams sngar bshad pa// gzugs kyi drung du 'dug nas ni/ 
350a5(rgyud): de bzhin rgyun du skyen sreg pa// keru yang gis ni lus byugs ma/ lha rnams kyang ni dbang 'gyur// de bzhin grazugs kyi drung 'dug cing // sbyin thig drun tu byas na ni// mig bu mig ni dam pa la / 
350a6(rgyud): mig tu bskus na dka' bar 'gyur// gyad rnams brdab pa'i mchog yin te// bzlas brjod byas nas batshal na ni// gnam lcags blag la bapa pa bzhin// des ni kyang zla bcom par 'gyur// 
350a7(rgyud): rnyan red par gdags pa'am// skud pa sngon po bzlas brjod byas// de bzhin tshon skud btags na ni// de yang rgyal byed srung byed mchog/ las rnams rnam pa sna tshogs pa// ci yang rung ba gang

363b7(rgyud): khras dang sbyar bas dus gsum nga lan nyi mu Na re re sbyin sreg pasan pag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'jigs par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyi sa thu bskyed par 'dod na sgo gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du 'dug pa dag moho
363b8(rgyud): la las bu kha mar rgyas bkang ste/ sman tham mecad dang sa pon thams cad dang dbyig rnams thugs pa lan brgyad brgyal smras brjod byas nas ram mnyams pas smad gsongs byas te/ khrus byas na sdig pa thams ca
364a1(rgyud): / dag com pas rgyad// na ma gan pa/ la yom sum pa po dag padu rtson me pa dang / drod ta dgas ha ra pa la sa/ ngob pa myong bad ga
364a2(rgyud): 'ju da spyad nas rgyun chad par lan spod sbyin sreg bya ste/ skar ma rgyal la mig bslus na de ma thag tu 'jig rten thams cad pa dbang snang bar 'gyur// de nas dus mi snang bar 'dod na mig sman gong me de nyid drugs las
364a3(rgyud): zugs byas pa'i spyi bo phug la de'i lto ba mig sman gyis bkang ste lcags kyi bur bus btab nas nag gsum spang ba byas la mar kying zhag bcu bzhi'i mu mo bzlas brjod byas te/ ro bsregs pa'i me 'brar ba'i nang
364a4(rgyud): nam/ 'byung po'i gtor ma thams cad phul la grang nges pa med par bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas rmi lam du mi nag pa mthong bar 'gyur te/ grub zin no nas zer ba dang nang par langs te des mig bslus na lus mi snang bar
364a5(rgyud): la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te/ gdong bslus na rgyal po'i pho brang dang rtsod pa'i nang du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ don yang grub par 'gyur ro// gsal snang bya bar 'dod na smyung ba byas la bdug pa dang / me tog dang / tre
364a6(rgyud): bshos sus te mche bong tu phyogs kyi thabs mdog bcul nas dri zhim pos bgos pa'i ti par gyis bskus te/ byis pa byed pazang ba do nag pa byed du bcug nas/ rig sngags dazlas brjod bya na nges par
364a7(rgyud): thung mo// yang sa mas ldang bya ste mi gas ga so//  dang can thams cad pa yang sngags kyis /  pa'i chos dog s+ho// des wA na byu rnam/ gan do ga rlu d+ha
364a8(rgyud): lusu klud grags pa// bdag gis rab tu bshad 'ang bya// de nas lag na rde dzag/ bcoldan 'dasal 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig sngags kyi
364b1(rgyud): don thams cadapa rgyal lags sa kyi yang smin pa dang / skye bo mang po la pa de bskul pa dang / dge song dag / dge slo ma dag / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnamasas sman pa gang lags pa bdag gi 'di bcom ldan
364b2(rgyud): 'das kyis gzhes su gsol/ sa'i steng gang na/ bdud sdig can gyi dbang du gyur pa dad pa ra la sme la 'dod pa na spyod pa'i bar gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la brdegs bgyid sa de dag gzhom pa'i slad du rig sngags rdo
364b3(rgyud): lu gu rgyud ces bgyi ba 'di bgegs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ las thams cad bgyid pa/ thams cad gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa 'di'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis
364b4(rgyud): bdag 'i thugs rtse bar mdzad du gsog// rkyen largan rdo rjes rig sngags kyi chog rnamam la ltas so// de nas ri gtugs de/ sngags kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das gangan pa deng po skye
364b5(rgyud): na nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phan gsum bskor 'byas te/ de'i tshe ched du brjod pa 'di che
364b6(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gas rab ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'dzin gnod sbyin gyi sde don chen po 'khor dang bcas pa g.yog dang bcas pa/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la
364b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// de nas rig thugs kyi rgyal mo chen mo rdo rje su bu chud bshad par bya'o// rdo rje lu gu rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje mdzes pa la gan 'khor lo dang rdo rje bogs pa la
364b8(rgyud): ma// / gas rdo rje rigs su rtogs par phyag 'tshar lo//  rdzagags pa dang / dngas su su pa phyag 'tsha lo// do rnam par rgyas pas bya 'tshal lo// de drig pa byed pa bya 'argya 'o// na du rje
365a1(rgyud): // 'od phyug la'o/ sa dag / ning chud ba kyi te dang / bya dang / rdo mangs pacwa chags can sa phyag 'tshal la/ thams cad kyis phyag rgyab shing bstod pakhyod khyag 'tshalalo//  ba mam cad kyi
365a2(rgyud): pakhyod pa phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis brjod pa khyod pa phyag 'tshal lo// nod sbyin thams cad kyis phyag byas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'byung pos brjod pa khyod la phyag batshal lo// 'jid rten skyong gis brjodapa
365a3(rgyud): 'phyag brgya'o// ji sngags thams cad kyis byas byas pa khyod khya 'tsha'o// dbang pod gshin rje da cu sgra dang bume dag su da/ drang srong bdun gyis byag byas pa byug 'o// ga mas kyig rgyas pal
365a4(rgyud): dri len gyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tsha'o// nag mos phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ma matang yis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tsha'o// dbang pos phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal// khya
365a5(rgyud): khyas byas par byag rgyal// gzhon nus kya khyam pas phyag 'cha'o// nyi mya dang zlams phyag byas pa phyag 'tshare/ khrim ces phyag byab pa la phyag 'tsha rdo dro grong gis mchod pal phyag 'tshal lo// rlu rgyas
365a6(rgyud): gzus pa la phyag ma'o// nas bcom ldan 'das gan du tshogs kyil da la snang bzung to/ com ldan 'das kyi da kyis pa N+Da la rab d+ha rgya mtsham 'a ma sa
365a7(rgyud): ga rgyam la da 'du dpa rgyu chen sa bya la /  dpa di/  gyis ga rgyud me ge/ sa drem cas 'aM ri tan pa sa 'a dpa
